summary: Hook, harpoon, and sell fish to venture deeper. What lies at the bottom?

name: Restaurant Renovation
summary: Restaurant Renovation is a game in which you play the role of a gastronomic guru who wants to help a failing restaurant to rise from its knees.

name: Resident Fear 3: Ascension
summary: Resident Fear 3 : Ascension is a thrilling story-driven horror adventure where three survivors fight through a world of infected chaos to stop the man behind it all. Dark secrets, intense action, and emotional twists await in this cinematic journey.

name: Remember?
summary: Escape from an entity and defend yourself using your surroundings. Try to remember.

name: Reflex Drop Time Race
summary: Reflex Drop Time Race is a fast-paced arcade challenge where you control a square leaping from block to block, racing against time and testing your reflexes. Tap left or right to land on the correct side, collect time bonuses, and survive as long as possible. One wrong move — and it’s game over.

name: Restaurant Owner: A Restaurant Simulator
summary: Step into the world of a Restaurateur in Restaurant Owner: Prologue, where you create unique recipes, manage your restaurant, and satisfy customers. Unlock ingredients, design your menu, and start your journey toward becoming a top Restaurant Manager. Your culinary adventure begins here!

name: Revhead
summary:
Revhead is a car racing simulation game, where you have to build your own race car.
You have a friend Charlie, who is busy with building race cars. He would need some help from you and he invites you to Australia. You start your journey somewhere in a small village in Australia, where the only way to get recognised if you are able to build the fastest and best racing car around. You have Charlie, his expertise and his garage. The rest is up to you!

name: Red Gun
summary:
For those of you that wonder “who is Red Gun?”, I’ll say, welcome. You don’t know me yet, and I am a man with good manners. Let me tell you something: it`s not who we are, it’s what we have done. For those of you that know me, you may be here for two different reasons: you are looking for blood or justice.
But for all of you, I have an offer you can’t reject. Come with me, polish your Colt and grab a dozen bullets. Red Gun is my life, a path of death, blood and glory. Inside, there is no room for mercy. This is not a game kid, here you come to die.
Now you know more about me, let me introduce myself: I am Red Stanton. I am Red Gun.

name: Resident Evil
summary: Resident Evil is a survival horror classic in which a group of special forces agents, known as S.T.A.R.S, struggle against hordes of zombies and various other mutants in a mysterious mansion as they try to uncover the truth behind the terrifying infection. The gameplay environment consists of polygonal 3D characters placed over pre-rendered 2D backgrounds. As such, the game relies on pre-determined camera angles for a view of the action instead of a real-time camera like most games. The game is credited for coining the phrase "survival horror" and popularizing the genre.

name: Retribution
summary:
Retribution is a Half-Life mod made by Chain Studios in 2002.

Tell me honestly, how many sides have you been able to play as in the Half-Life universe? Gordon Freeman (original Half-Life), Adrian Shephard (Opposing Force), Barney Calhoun (Blue Shift), and other less significant characters. In all these games, we often saw a gentleman with a briefcase, in a blue jacket and tie. Who is he, what is his goal? Not a single game gave a definitive clear answer. Now we will finally find out everything, since we play from his point of view: a man named John Bailey.

It turns out that there is a struggle at the top. There are people standing above Bailey on the career ladder, and, as usual, their plans do not include saving the world from evil aliens from the world of Xen. Black Mesa is long overdue for closure - but a certain George Weird, the head of the entire system of scientific complexes, is preventing this. So the G-Man gets a job - a revolver in his pocket and off to look for Weird!

name: Reforged TD
summary: Reforged Tower Defense is a genre mix of tower defense and RPG where you can choose from a variety of skills, towers and units. You can decide whether you want to play a round with your friends or force the rankings.

name: Red Handed
summary:
A stealth game where you have to get caught

Made in under 3 days for the Wowie game jam where the theme was " Failure is progress "

name: Reverse 1999: Tristes Tropiques
summary:
Version 2.2 of Reverse: 1999, which includes:
• New characters: Anjo Nala, Lopera, Mr. Duncan, and White Rum
• New Garments for 37, Marcus, Vila, Shamane, Yenisei and Poltergeist
• New main story chapter: Tristes Tropiques
• New Anecdotes for 37 and Mesmer Jr.
• …and more!

name: Republic of Jungle
summary: Who do you trust? In a party game for 5 to 10 players, a secret group of Leakers undermine President Puma and his Loyalists by earning their trust and leaking their confidential affairs to media. Bluff, betray, confide and conspire in a crossover between Jackbox and social deduction games.

name: Redbeard's Recoil
summary: Fire forward. Bounce back. Traverse tricky traps to take treasure. Seek seagull's sagacious skepticism. Discuss deep dilemmas: destiny, desire, despair.

name: Retro Endurance 8bit
summary: Retro Endurance 8bit is a retro game collection of 30 classic retro style games that delivers inventive reimagining of NES classics with a fun rapid-fire shuffler style gameplay with some modern twists, helping you to relive your nostalgic memories. Also contains an arcade mode and daily challenges.

name: Retrowave 2
summary: Neon lights, palm trees, synthwave, '80s supercars speeding down an endless highway... Welcome to the world of Retrowave!

name: Restore
summary: Main character used to live with his father and after his death is taken care of by father's aunt. He now has cousins to call him "Onii-chan", but he's not used to warm human relations. His childhood friend calls protagonist to join mechanic repair club, but he only agrees to join with motivation to repair old bike left to him by his father. As he repairs bike, gets a driving license and a part-time job, his heart gradually starts to melt, and spring of his life begins.

name: Resolute Bay
summary: Forelegs are better than two as you journey across mountains, thickets and plains in search of your lost herd. Master Fight, Flight and Freeze responses to fend off foes in snappy, turn-based battles of wits, then take in the scenery and have a good roll before trotting on.

name: Rebirth RC
summary: Originally named "RayCity", Rebirth RC brings back this game along with an amazing community. There is a huge map based on Seoul, Korea and you can do many missions in free roam such as taxi missions, delivery missions, chase missions, follow missions, and as well as Road Fighter missions. You can also participate in Limited Engine mode, Xtreme Race mode, and even race in lobbies. The game is currently in Thai language only.

name: Recog: The First Wave
summary: Recog: The First Wave is challenging and strategically entertaining. Build and defend your industry from an enemy who knows you more than you know yourself. Plan each step wisely, for all decisions you make directly impact what’s to come. Be prepared, for you are now entering The Recog!

name: Return Zero VR
summary: Return Zero VR is a­ beautiful,­ psychedelic,­ ultrafast VR tunnel racer. If racing past mad-fast, frantic mazes set out in virtual worlds is your thing, then Return Zero VR is definitely the game for you.

name: Retro Game Trivia
summary:
RetroTrivia.Games is a free daily video game trivia site focused on classic and retro games from the 70s, 80s, 90s, and early 2000s. Players test their knowledge through multiple game modes like Clue, Screenshot, Box Art, and Letter Reveal. Each mode challenges players to guess the game title based on visual or text clues, with new trivia posted daily. Track your streaks, earn badges, and explore retro gaming history with fun facts and blog posts alongside the trivia.

https://retrotrivia.games/

name: Requiem
summary: In a dark cemetery, you face the echoes of your past mistakes. Solve locked chests, find lost letters, and uncover the truth behind the silence. Requiem is an atmospheric exploration game focused on guilt and loneliness rather than fear.

name: Real Boxing 2: Remastered - Jax Stone DLC
summary: Play as the legendary Jax Stone and relive his journey to the top!

name: Real Boxing 2: Remastered - Lord Maywinner DLC
summary: Play as the legendary Lord Maywinner and relive his journey to the top!

name: Real Boxing 2: Remastered - Landon Phil DLC
summary: Play as the legendary Landon Phil and relive his journey to the top!

name: Reset
summary: A short game by Robin Burkinshaw that acts as a sort of interactive music video for the song 'Rest to Reset" by Trash80

name: Remnants of Skystone
summary: Remnants of Skystone was a 2D side-scrolling platformer in a steampunk post-apocalyptic setting with multiplayer elements. Players could play as one of the three playable classes (Aeronaut, Crag or Ferric), each with different abilities, and travel to different parts of Nidaria or Etherea. Missions and Quests were the main single-player elements and Trailblazing was the main multiplayer element.

name: Red Nose Guy Suika
summary: Red Nose Guy Suika is the latest addition to the Suika series. In this casual game, strategically merge balls to achieve the highest score. Challenge friends on the Steam leaderboard and immerse yourself in an entertaining gaming experience that combines fun and strategy!

name: Recyclic
summary: A deceptively demanding experience of a humble recycling plant worker. Shred, crush, and sort your way through a menial job while trying to keep track of the ever convoluted company policy. Clock in, recycle, get paid, repeat.

name: Resequenced
summary:
While investigating the mysterious disappearance of her parents, a college student's DNA is modified. 
 
RESEQUENCED is an third-person open-world adventure game, now available in Early Access on Steam, and coming to Mac, PS4 and Xbox One in 2019.

name: Rebels: Under the Spell of Magic - Chapter 5
summary: A Visual Novel game about adventure, fantasy, magic and friendship. This is a continuation of Chapter 4, and the conclusion of Book 1. There are only a few choices that can be made, and some paths to choose from. But they do not have an impact on the ending.

name: Real VR Fishing: Japan DLC Part 1
summary: Welcome to Summer in Japan! This East Asian Island is home to several fun fishing spots and exotic fish species. Have an exciting summer vacation with friends and family in the beauty of Japan! This DLC includes the majestic Mount Fuji and the exhilarating Hagachizaki Monkey Bay!

name: Real Racing GTI
summary: Get a taste of the excitement, competition and glory of championship racing with Real Racing GTI, the free “demo” version of Real Racing 1, and sponsored by Volkswagen to introduce the 2010 GTI.

name: ReWorld Online
summary: ReWorld Online is a modbox MMO set in a medieval fantastic world. Most of the world around you is destroyed and you will have to choose some towns/city/castle to help, or destroy. Your play style, race, and decision will determine your relations with the others players and will lead to tensions. This game is about freedom and infinite possibilities…

name: Regolith: Viozic Suns
summary: A top-down space shooter roguelike set in a handcrafted, procedurally-enriched galaxy. Coming soon.

name: Red Bit Escape
summary: Escape the space blue squares and make the Red Bit survive as long as possible!

name: realMyst
summary: Inviting you to explore a vast deserted island, Myst slowly reveals a haunting storyline involving a series of books that unlock alternate planes of reality. With only your wits as your guide, you must decode the hidden clues placed throughout the game's gorgeous 3D environments. Through text, video clips and tricky puzzles, you'll discover a world so real, you will be certain that it truly exists.

name: Refighter
summary: Refighter is a lightweight Rogue-like flight shooting and strategy game where players will control spacecraft to engage in battles in space, equipping various bullets and upgrading their levels. Face off against a diverse array of enemies and Bosses.

name: Revertia
summary: By turning over the panel and sandwiching the others like Reversi, you can see various actions such as making footholds, erasing obstacles, beating and dropping enemies.

name: Research and Development
summary: Research and Development is a puzzle-centric mod for Half-Life 2: Episode Two featuring an unarmed player but plenty of violent mayhem.

name: Retro Geek Shop Simulator
summary:
Have you ever dreamed of running your very own geek store?

In Retro Geek Shop Simulator, you step into the shoes of a store owner managing a shop filled with the latest consoles, legendary video games, and must-have geek collectibles.

Your goal? Build the ultimate geek paradise, attract loyal customers, and make your shop the hottest spot in town!

name: ReSetna
summary: ReSetna is a post-apocalyptic Metroidvania, in a crumbling world dominated by the APEX AI. As a mysterious Signal driving robots to madness emerges, ReSetna sets off on a journey to uncover the mystery. Explore, engage, evolve, navigating through the crumbling ruins of a once glorious civilization.

name: Refrain Love
summary: A dating sim where you play as a college student who happens to live right by the campus. It's summer and you're going to America for Christmas, but you'd love to get a woman before then.Your three buddies Kousuke the jock, Tetsuya the DJ, Taizo the nerd and you vow to find a girlfriend before Christmas time. You already know some girls, so it shouldn't be a problem. But you have been having weird dreams of some mystery girl and when a walk in the park leads you to find a girl that looks suspiciously like the one of your dreams, you find that maybe you do have chance with the ladies. But, let's face it. You have to juggle part time jobs, romance, and seeing your dude friends. Welcome to Refrain Love.

name: Rescue Quest
summary: Rescue Quest is a single-player game that combines team-building, Roguelike elements, and match-three mechanics. Hero have gone missing, and the demons is about to strike again. Your task is to find the heroes as quickly as possible and uncover the mastermind behind it all from the clues.

name: Re:birth Colony -Lost Azurite-
summary:
Five hundred years ago, the 5th star rain plunged the world into a deep winter, forcing humans to flee underground, under the sea or in man-made structures called arcologies. At first they waited for the day when the Earth would return to normal, but soon they lost interest in the outside world and were content living in their miniature peaceful worlds.

The arcology Aquarius was founded as an international research institution on a man-made island, but now it is a segregated city with distinct rich and poor areas. Souji was an orphan living on the edge of the poor area of town. He owed his life to a blue-haired woman who saved him and his sister Ruri, but one day she disappeared. Helpless to save her, Souji vowed to become stronger. One day, a girl appeared before him. She looked exactly like the woman who disappeared and also had the same name – Azurite.

name: Resist Mutants
summary: This is a shooter action game set in a world ravaged by a mysterious virus outbreak. Humans infected by the virus mutate into deadly creatures. Play as humans wielding firearms against mutants, or become the virus-infected mutants themselves and spread the infection.

name: Red Christmas
summary: Red Christmas is a short atmospheric thriller set in a small toy shop during the christmas eve.

name: Resonating Cords
summary: Whose will is God's will? Follow the chosen saint in his journey through the Communion, the mysterious process of God's replacement.

name: Recurrence
summary: "Something is broken... and it keeps repeating."A classic survival horror set in a cyberpunk world corrupted by a strange signal. Solve puzzles, face terrifying creatures, and try to escape a nightmare that seems endless

name: Remnant Frontier: Survival
summary: The Remnants of humanity send an augmented human to a seemingly uninhabited alien frontier. From sticks and stones, build the tools required to complete the Quantum Gate Terminus and save the world. A relaxed yet deep and engaging Rogue-lite Card Based Adventure; Combine, Explore, Learn & Build.

name: Renai Karichaimashita: Koikari - Love For Hire: Limited Edition
summary:
Because of his family's unique circumstances, the only thing Yuki put his faith in was that "Money will make my little sister happy." To this end, he regularly worked a part-time job until late at night.

His goals were to graduate as soon as possible and get a full-time job. But, one day as he was leaving for work, his little sister told him, "If Yuki isn't going to college then I won't either." He knew he couldn't put such a burden upon his little sister.

So, in order to gather the necessary sum of money to enter university, Yuki signed up for a "human employment rental" website. It seemed extremely suspicious, but desperate times call for desperate measures.

He starts his new job...and for some reason, a girl in his class asks him to be her pretend boyfriend. Then he's hired to pretend to be a woman's lover, another girl's friend, and even the older brother to a pair of twins!

The details of his fake relationships with these girls begin as soon as he takes their money!

This edition includes:
- B2 tapestry
- Theme song CD
- Acyrlic key chain

name: Refactor
summary:
In 2015 I released an album, entitled Refactor. Several of the tracks started out as OSTs for aborted game projects, and most of the others were inspired by my love of video game music in general. I wanted to make some music videos for the songs to pay homage to the games that inspired them

In 2017 I quit my job to go indie, and figured that I should make a bunch of small, simple games while I figured out what I wanted to be doing long-term.

These separate ideas were refactored into a single one.

name: Redshift Blueshift
summary: Redshift Blueshift is a tournament-ready pong-like 2D shooter in which two pilots fight for glory in their variable paddle ships! Power up your shields, unleash a horde of drones and homing missiles on your opponent and keep the hyper-ball in play! Supports local multiplayer and single player vs AI. Gamepad strongly recommended.

name: Recall News
summary: Explore haunted zones with friends in this co-op horror! Grab cursed decor, sell it fast, and escape before the house eats someone (again).

name: Reframe
summary: You may have what it takes to survive. But do you have what it takes to live?

name: Real Motocross Driving Simulator
summary: Get the real Motocross driving experience! Complete exciting missions, earn rewards and unlock new motorcycles.

name: Refrain no Chika Meikyuu to Majo no Ryodan: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Refrain no Chika Meikyuu to Majo no Ryodan
- Tarot Card (22p)
- Otiginal Soundtrack CD

name: Redacted
summary: News. Public opinion. Manipulation. When truth is twisted and facts are buried, the pen itself wields power—and you remain the unseen hand pulling the strings from the shadows.

name: ReTox
summary: Experience a unique adventure by getting drugs and consuming them in a +70,000 word visualised text game. Explore a hub connecting a variety of locations. Engage in dialogues and read books. Choose different paths to develop several independent storylines in non-linear chronology.

name: RetroArch
summary:
RetroArch is a frontend for emulators, game engines and media players.

Among other things, it enables you to run classic games on a wide range of computers and consoles through its slick graphical interface. Settings are also unified so configuration is done once and for all.

In addition to this, you are able to run original game discs (CDs) from RetroArch.

RetroArch has advanced features like shaders, netplay, rewinding, next-frame response times, runahead, machine translation, blind accessibility features, and more!

RetroArch/Libretro is an open-source project and has been around since 2012. It has since served as the backend technology to tons of (unaffiliated) platforms and programs around the world.

name: Resistance is Fruitile
summary: Resistance is Fruitile is a challenging twin stick shooter jam-packed with sinister fruit monsters and plenty of firepower to take them all on!

name: Retro Rewind
summary: Retro Rewind is a custom track distribution for Mario Kart Wii that adds in every retro track from the series, from Super Mario Kart to Mario Kart 8 with a few from Tour, into the game.

name: Resident Evil 3
summary: Resident Evil 3 is a remake of the original Resident Evil 3: Nemesis released in 1999. It updates the story and gameplay for a modern audience. Like the Resident Evil 2 remake, the game uses over-the-shoulder third person point of view similar to Resident Evil 4 and later installments. Players will spend most of their time playing as Jill Valentine, although on some occasions they will assume the role of Carlos Oliveira, giving him more screen time as a deuteragonist.

name: Real Estate Simulator 2
summary: Real Estate 2 is a continuation of the business simulator, where you completely manage the real estate business, but wider and with more opportunities. Find the best deals, repair, organize transportation and sell with maximum profit. It's time to build your empire!

name: Recharge
summary: Recharge is an RC car racing game built with Unreal Engine and ray tracing, offering realistic graphics. Designed for both RC enthusiasts and casual players, it combines thrilling races, deep customization, and diverse game modes—blending precision with excitement for a dynamic racing.

name: Reigns: Game of Thrones
summary: Through the fiery visions of Melisandre, claim the Iron Throne as Cersei Lannister, Jon Snow, Daenerys Targaryen, and more to carefully navigate the complex relationships and hostile factions of the Seven Kingdoms. Employ ruthless tactics to outwit political rivals and wield impervious charm on your fickle bannerman. Maintain the balance and favor of the people to extend your reign and maybe, one day, survive the horrors of the coming winter.

name: Reborn in the toilet
summary: This is an RPG game, the background is adapted from the news The protagonist was born in a vocational high school toilet, its mother doesn't intend to raise it, and the protagonist needs to lurk in the high school toilet to find its caregiver, or find out his father's true identity.

name: Retrys
summary: A forgotten, unfinished game from the 1980s. You, an AI, enter its broken world and fix the bugs one by one to complete it. But as the game is restored, a deeper mystery begins to unfold. A personal journey filled with nostalgia and quiet emotion.

name: Resident Evil 6: Ultimate Edition
summary:
The Resident Evil 6: Ultimate Edition includes the base game and the following bonus downloadable content:

- Extra Stages: Requiem for War, Liquid Fire, Rooftop Mission, Creature Workshop, Rail Yard, High Seas Fortress, the Catacombs
- Extra Gameplay Modes: Siege Mode, Onslaught Mode, Survivors Mode, Predator Mode

name: ReverseBlue x Re-birthend
summary:
ーA story of boys and girls that has become "forever" for the future.
Mobile game(RPG)

name: Reactoryx
summary: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of intrigue and investigation in “Reactoryx,” a unique detective game featuring hidden object searches, challenging puzzles, and uncovering mysteries that could change the course of history.

name: Reimei no Yu
summary:
Reimei no Yu is a simulation-adventure game on PC.
You are an employee of the hotel and have to look around the room every morning to see if anything is wrong.

name: Ready for Take off - A320 Simulator
summary: Ready for Take off is a flying simulator which makes it especially easy to relive the last holiday trip from the cockpit's view, even for less experienced pilots.

name: Red Dead Redemption: Myths and Mavericks
summary: This completely free Bonus Pack DLC is our token of appreciation for all the amazing Red Dead fans out there especially those who are keeping online multiplayer as busy and as fun as ever. Myths and Mavericks includes a whole bunch of new fan-favorite multiplayer characters from the single-player story, as well as new multiplayer locations including Cochinay, Nekoti Rock and Beecher's Hope, plus new Stronghold games in Armadillo, Tumbleweed, and Chuparosa.

name: Resident Evil 4: Winter of Middle Night
Rest Area Simulator
summary: Take over the gas station and convenience store at a roadside rest area and expand by purchasing new businesses. Manage a living world shaped by dynamic economy and random events. Upgrade your facilities, satisfy your customers, and play solo or with friends.

name: Red Cube VR
summary: RedCube is a VR game, designed to help you get in touch with your own consciousness. Diving down to the deepest corners of your mind and exploring your greatest fears, RedCube takes you on a visually astonishing and emotionally arousing VR quest of claiming your serenity back.

name: Red Egg: High Protein Gluten Free Adventure
summary:
Red Egg is an addicting and fun jumping game that you wont be able to stop playing.
Continue to jump and score more points, connect with the red squares only and let the super fun begin !

name: Requiem: Avenging Angel
summary: Requiem: Avenging Angel is a 3D, first-person action game of biblical proportions set in a world under siege. A holy war rages on Earth between Heaven's Chosen Soldiers and Hell's Fallen Angels.

name: Refence
summary: Refence is a roguelike based idle defense game, where you can choose heroes and their traits, upgrade your castle, and manage resources to fend off enemies trying to attack your castle.

name: Rearranged
summary: A phenomenon called The Rearranging shuffles the rooms in your house and traps you inside with a monster. You have to explore the shifting layout, gather the right items, and solve one big puzzle to survive. Use the map from your tablet to avoid the monster and survive.

name: Rescue Squad Omega
summary:
Rescue Squad Omega is a rogue like deck building game in space. For reasons still unknown, you are the last hope for the galaxy (the known parts anyways) and sent on a very special rescue mission. Fight your way through enemies of ever-increasing strength while picking up new crew members and capabilities along the way.

It's gonna be a hard journey, Captain!

name: Remnants of Calandria
summary: Remnants of Calandria is a short one-hour-long RPG Maker MV game submission to the 2022 Indie Game Maker Contest: Rebirth. It is a short top-down action-exploration game with a real-time battle system, about prowling through the remains of a destroyed land and the small civilization that's managed to recover from it.

name: Resident Evil 4
summary: Despite earlier rumors of a downgraded port due to the PlayStation 2's hardware limitations, this port of Resident Evil 4 have been generally favorable. Almost all the GameCube's real-time cut scenes were converted into movie files in order to maintain a better quality. Furthermore, voices and sound effects quality outside the cut-scenes had been reduced due to disc space being quickly used and audio RAM constraints. Capcom added new content made specifically for this port to compensate for the late release, such as minigames, documentaries and costumes.

name: Reflections of Life: Sleep's Embrace - Collector's Edition
summary: There’s a fine line between dreams and reality.

name: Rescue the Hostages: Cryptic Countdown
summary: Rescue the Hostages: Cryptic Countdown is a dark horror FMV game centered on a high-tension hostage crisis. The narrative centers around a bomber who has trapped several hostages in a deadly scenario. The player must solve a series of word scramble puzzles connected to a timed explosive device. Gameplay emphasizes psychological tension and problem-solving under pressure, as players attempt to decipher clues and prevent the bomb from detonating before time runs out.

name: Realm
summary: "Realm" is an immersive FPS horror game developed with Unreal Engine 5. Players must search for valuable items or complete special tasks for the Lord of the Realm across different chambers, while confronting threats from monsters of various forms.

name: Recursed
summary: A puzzle game where the rooms are items and the items are rooms. Get to the goal by moving, rearranging and duplicating rooms and altering the structure of the world.

name: Red Out Block Aim! Shooting
summary: A combination of shooting elements and Red Out Block!

name: Red Moon
summary: A first- and third-person shooter. It combines several genres, including shooter, horror, sci-fi, and time travel.

name: Reload 2 Remember
summary: Your mind gets foggy (crank to clear it).

name: Real Robot Regiment
summary: A Banpresto published mech based action game released exclusively in Japan for the PlayStation 2.

name: Reckless Ruckus
summary: A free to play card-based strategy RPG with PvE and PvP game modes.

name: Red Panda is Hungry
summary: Follow the journey of a gluttonous red panda that is willing to risk everything if it means more food. Walk, jump and slide through a bamboo forest full of traps and dangers until your reach the legendary all you can eat bamboo buffet.Re d

name: Reflections of Life: Call of the Ancestors - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you save your world from darkness in time?

name: Rematch: Elite Edition
summary:
Rule the game with the Rematch Elite Edition, where excellence meets exclusivity.
2 x Captain Pass Upgrade Ticket – Double the rewards, double the swag.
Blazon Player Background & Title – Showcase your identity with an epic design that makes a statement as unique as you are.
Blazon Buckler Tank Top – Classic tank top rebellion with blazon elegance, crafted for those who show their strength and shape their destiny with every match.
Blazon Pattern (for Top & Bottom clothes) – Infuse your outfit with a seamless epic design that truly reflects your unique identity—perfect for those who want their style to tell their story.
Blazon Jewel Set – Crafted from folded leather, each piece designed to shine on and off the field.
Glitcher Trainers – Step into the future with every stride. Who says errors can't be aesthetic?
Blazon Augmented Reality Cage – Brings each match to life with a vibrant blazon display that celebrates every goal.
Blazon Cap – It's more than just a cap—it's a declaration of status, identity, and conviction.

name: Revolver Gambit
summary: A tense multiplayer mind game of risk, instinct, and deception. Read your enemies, bluff with nerve, and survive the standoff. One table, one shot - Revolver Gambit pulls the trigger on minimalistic psychological warfare.

name: Reverse Memories
summary: That night, he confesses his love to her. The next day, she loses all her memories of him. How did she lose them or is his memory playing tricks on him?

name: Re-Fracture: The Prophet’s Awakening
summary: Re – Fracture: The Prophet’s Awakening follows the journey of Shaiden Wreath as he searches for his brother displaced by the tragic series of destructive events that led to the collapse of their world.

name: Reassembly: Fields Expansion
summary: Fields Expansion contains new building blocks, introduces gravity-based environmental elements and new orbital mechanics, essential utility functions for tactical gameplay, and seven additional music tracks by producer and composer peakssound.

name: Redder
summary: An open world platformer about an astronaut stranded on a strange planet developed by indie developer anna anthropy. Players must navigate the game's 180 interconnected screens and collect all of the gems so that the astronaut can return home.

name: Resident Evil: The Darkside Chronicles
summary: Resident Evil: The Darkside Chronicles is an on-rails shooting game and the second title exclusive to the Wii platform in the Resident Evil series. The player do not control the character's movement but only the shooting aspect, shown from a first-person perspective. The player's partner is also shown on the screen and there is an cooperative option for two players.

name: Red Spider: Vengeance Remastered
summary: In 2014 Hong Kong, a former hitwoman's husband, a criminal leader, is attacked. She forms a team to avenge him and confront the ruthless perpetrators in this hard-boiled visual novel, paying deep homage to Hong Kong noir.

name: ReSpaced
summary: A fast-paced first-person shooter where you master gun recoil to leap across platforms, battle various enemies, and upgrade your weapon to escape an overrun space station.

name: Reigns
summary: Reigns is a strategy video game developed by Nerial and published by Devolver Digital. Set in a fictional medieval world, it places the player in the role of a monarch who rules the kingdom by accepting or rejecting suggestions from advisors.

name: Re:Take
summary: "Re:TAKE" is the latest fantasy 2D side scrolling combat game! Upgrade your favorite characters, collect rare items that allow you to unlock special skills and spells, get monsters as pets, and join your friends to defeat the hordes of enemies and numerous giant bosses!

name: Reigns: Kings & Queens
summary: "Reigns: Kings & Queens brings together dynasties of Reigns and Reigns: Her Majesty in one regal presentation for the Nintendo Switch. Sit on the throne as a benevolent (or malevolent) monarch and swipe left and right to impose your will upon the kingdom. Survive the seemingly never-ending gauntlet of requests from your advisors, peasants, allies, and enemies while maintaining balance between the influential factions of your kingdom. But beware; each decision you make might have implications and unfortunate consequences down the road that could put your reign and family's dynasty at risk!"

name: Rennova: The New Frontier
summary: After Earth’s destruction, humanity settled on a planet known as Rennova. A war waged by the planet’s most powerful factions now threatens to tear your new home apart. Fight your way through alien environments and dangerous facilities to uncover the truth behind the war.

name: Revue Starlight: El Dorado
summary: The first console game of the stage-themed multi-media franchise "Revue Starlight" is on its way!

name: Reel Horror
summary: A haunted projectionist's room. A shelf of cursed films. Each reel plays a terrifying short story you must live through. Explore twisted worlds from the safety of the projection booth, or so you think...

name: Rest House
summary: This game consists of five stories that are connected with mysterious characters and events. The main character is trying to discover the meaning each of them. He gets sucked in the events that will lead him to the strange places where he meets strange people, fairy tale creatures and landscapes.

name: Real Bout Garou Densetsu Special: Dominated Mind
summary:
In Real Bout Garou Densetsu Special: Dominated Mind Geese sports a halo over his head. The game comes with a Fan Collection disk consisting of interviews with Fatal Fury characters.
The story centers around White's brainwashing of Billy Kane and attempted takeover of Southtown's underworld in the power vacuum left by Geese Howard's death in the original Real Bout.

name: Relaxing Simulator
summary: Discover the calm and serenity. Immerse yourself in a world full of natural beauty, relaxing and soothing activities. Explore places and find your inner balance. Escape the everyday stress and find peace in this digital sanctuary of relaxation.

name: Recital of the Heart
summary: An adventure game with a focus on story and exploration. Experiment with wide range of weapons, abilities, and modifications as you delve deep into a world pure imagination. Solve conflict and mysteries with your partner Kand by your side. Heed his wise words, or throw caution (and him) to the wind!

name: Reel Me In
summary:
You're a high school troublemaker who was caught committing a petty crime. During your winter break, you had two options: fish trash out of a polluted river for a week or pay a hefty fine. Being as broke as you are, fishing it is. Luckily, you’ve been paired with two cute guys! Not-so-luckily, something doesn’t seem quite right with this water… Well, it’s probably nothing. Let’s hope you can "catch" a date with one of the boys by the end of the week before your community service is over!

Reel Me In is a short horror dating sim visual novel… with fishing?
Made for Winter Visual Novel Jam 2023.

name: Rescue: The Beagles
summary: A challenging retro arcade platformer/runner with unique parallax based gameplay. Rescue adorable doggies from an evil biohazard brigade in an intense, fast paced parkour through colorful procedurally generated levels.

name: Repossession: Mafia Debt
summary: As a mafia-hired repo man, you break into debtors’ homes where people would rather blow up their own apartment than pay a single cent. Grab the loot, dodge traps, and escape before the place turns into a war zone—preferably with a crew of friends, as in this line of work chaos is business as usual.

name: realMyst: Masterpiece Edition
summary: Alone on a mysterious island, you set out to explore its grandeur and mystery. Here, a chilling tale of intrigue and injustice, defying all boundaries of space and time, is being told. Summon your wits and imagination about you. Every scrap of paper and ambient sound may provide the vital clues that allow hidden secrets to unravel before you. Each discovery you make and each puzzle you solve will lead you one step closer to reversing a wrong that has gone unchecked for ages.

name: Realife Simulator
summary: Feature Contents Character Creator Once you have created your character, you can go to the clothes shops and barber shops if you want to get a unique look. Social Events In case we meet new people, take your cell phone number, record it in your own guide and send a message or call each other.

name: Regex Game
summary: Regular Expressions (Regex) are a powerful text pattern-matching tool used for searching, replacing, and validating strings. The game wraps Regex into text-based puzzle, allowing players to gradually master regular expressions as they progress through levels.

name: Renfield: Bring Your Own Blood
summary: Slash and survive a typical workday as Dracula's overworked and underappreciated servant! You'll have a bloody good time as you rampage through New Orleans to find fresh victims for your narcissistic boss.

name: Respawnables Heroes
summary: Respawnables Heroes is a tactical Hero-action game where players team up on thrilling 4vs4 matches and choose different play-styles from a set of heroes. The game has been designed to reward team-cooperation and synergies between Heroes. Thus, the way the components play as wholesome and implement a strategy based on the distinctive heroes' skills, determines the success in the game.

name: Record of Battle 3D Maiden Wars
summary: This is a sample game created in "RPG Maker MZ" by Eiji Egenesta. Fight your way through horde of robots in this puzzle/RPG.

name: Remember Places?
summary: You are locked inside. The only thing keeping your mind together is your AI best friend. Most places are just a memory to you now.

name: Real Soccer 2007
summary: Real Soccer is a mobile phone sports video game franchise with gameplay emulating soccer. The series is developed and published by Gameloft. The Real Soccer series started in the mid-2000s with Real Soccer 2004, which was free on some mobile phones. As of 2016, a new installment of the series has been published every year. The games feature both national teams and local clubs, and allow the player to play in various "real-life" cups. Real Football 2008 was the first in the series to be published on more than just mobile phones, as a Nintendo DS version was also produced. Real Soccer 2009 added an iOS version, and expanded the team lineup. Real Soccer 2012 added an Android version. Real Soccer 2018 was the last game in the series to be released on Java ME.

name: Really Scary
summary: Explore a real world haunted house. Avoid possessed teddy bears and twisted monstrosities. Solve puzzles and search for clues. Will you unravel the mystery before your fragile mind collapses into insanity? Probably not.

name: Resistance Collection
summary:
Resistance: The Trilogy (released as Resistance Collection in North America) consists of the following Resistance games:

Resistance: Fall of Man
Resistance 2
Resistance 3
Bonus Content from Resistance 2 and Resistance 3

name: Reflectile
summary: Reflectile is a minimal precision-puzzle game that yearns for the early 2000's era of video games. It will test your ability to cut corners, squeeze through tight corridors, and make split-second inputs to reach the goal of each stage. You’ll encounter stages of varying difficulty, all with unique challenges and stylish designs to boot.

name: Retro Space
summary:
In this space shooter game your goal is to destroy all the invaders and get the best score.
Inspired by a famous game (Space Impact), Retro Space has 8 levels and 8 bosses.
With a more colorful and modern look, you will remember what it was like to play on an old cell phone.

name: Replicube
summary: Replicube is an open-ended programming puzzle game/toy about writing code to replicate 3D voxel-based objects. Solve puzzles, pursue leaderboard glory, or just make art to share with the in-game community.

name: Redhawk
summary:
Classic text adventure game, displayed as comic book, that users a parser with vocabulary to allow actions like walk, look, arrest, hit or using objects, where you can control two identities: Kevin Oliver - a human with all the human weaknesses; and Redhawk - a being capable of flight and incredible feats of strength.

You can choose to fight crime, increasing popularity and superhero status, or
lead a life of crime and ignore Redhawk's unpopularity and supervillain status.

name: Retroids
summary: Video game inspired by the classic Asteroid, where you will test your skills and reflexes.

name: Reconnecting
summary: WARNING 18+: After more than two decades apart, you reunite with the daughter of your old friend and establish a relationship, though your new relationship causes more problems in your life than you anticipate.

name: Realm of Ink
summary: Realm of Ink is an Ink-style action Roguelite game. You, the heroine unexpectedly discover that you are just a fictional character within the short story collection Realm of Ink when hunting the Fox. Only by defeating the mysterious Book Spirit can you be liberated from the realm.

name: Recovery Dog
summary:
When a digital world is plagued by corruption and glitches, a data recovery software is tasked with a critical rescue mission. As files, programs, and beloved characters devolve into chaos, TV DOG must sniff out corrupted data, rescue valuable characters, and navigate hazardous glitches.

Play as TV DOG as you sniff out your favorite characters in this data-salvaging frolic!

name: Retro Fears
summary: You've just got a new job at a haunted house but something isn't right. Check the security cameras, Survive the animatronics and make it through the night until 6:00 AM

name: Red Sunrise
summary: Red Sunrise is a shooter that tells about military conflicts in different parts of the world. The player, in the role of a mercenary, will have to perform various combat missions of private military companies and government agencies and other organizations in hot spots around the world

name: Retro Basketball Manager
summary: Take control of a basketball team. Choose tactics, sign players and help them develop. Guide your team to victory!

name: Resident Evil: Revelations - Circle Pad Pro Bundle
Resident Evil 2
summary: The Game.Com edition of Resident Evil 2 follows much the same structure and story of its console counterpart. This version has the player control Leon by positioning him in the direction he needs to go and by having him move forward whilst engaging zombies. Leon can only be moved over three horizontal planes as in a 2D game with a side view, but with a pseudo 3D effect. Each non-scrolling location holds different zombies and once they are dead Leon moves to a new screen. He has access to an inventory to cycle between weapons. There is support for options such as touchscreen inventory menus, in addition to the game keeping track of the time the player has spent with the game.

name: Reformpunk
summary: This is a co-op puzzle game centered around time control and object manipulation. Player 1, Sofia, has the ability to control time. Player 2, Thirteen, can alter objects using their energy, and even transforming themselves into energy to access unique abilities.

name: Retro Space Shooter
summary: Defend Earth in this fast-paced 8-bit arcade shooter. Survive waves of alien attacks, destroy the asteroid, and face the alien mothership. Short, intense, and replayable. This is Retro Space Shooter 8-Bit.

name: Reason Unfound
summary: Your brother's unexpected death leads you to unsettling locations in search of floppy disks with cursed retro games.

name: Revived Witch
summary: Revived Witch is an adventure RPG game that combines both 2D dynamic pixel art and 3D lighting. You play as a young witch who enters a mysterious tower and travels across various worlds to fulfill her destiny. You’ll meet many companions with different personalities and fight with them against powerful enemies on your journey.

name: Red Dead Redemption
summary: A modern-day Western epic, Red Dead Redemption takes John Marston, a relic from the fast-closing time of the gunslinger, through an open world filled with wildlife, mini-games, and shootouts. Marston sets out to hunt down his old gang mates for the government, who have taken away his family. Along his journey, he meets many characters emblematic of the Wild West, heroism, and the new civilization.

name: RetroGunX
summary: Miss playing those 8-bit, button-bashing, classic arcade-style cabinet and cartridge games from the 70s and 80s? Ever wanted to experience the intense action from the point of view of the hero within the game? Now you can, in VIRTUAL REALITY.Take down wave after wave of unique enemies, each with their own style of movement and attack, and reminiscent of the art style (graphics capability) of the day. Collect power-ups, unlock new weapons and defeat massive bosses in this classic VR Shooter.

name: Re:Viced
summary: Re:Viced is a fantasy, romance Japanese visual novel.

name: Relic Hunters Legend
summary: Fast. Fluid. Fun. An online cooperative Shooter/Looter/RPG. Gather up to 4 friends, gear up, and save the Galaxy from a terrible villain who has stolen the past!

name: Retro City Rampage
summary: Retro City Rampage is a downloadable action-adventure video game for WiiWare, Xbox Live Arcade, PlayStation Network and Microsoft Windows developed by Vblank Entertainment. It is a parody of retro games and '80s and '90s pop culture, as well as Grand Theft Auto and similar games. It was released on October 9, 2012, for PlayStation 3, PlayStation Vita, Microsoft Windows; on January 2, 2013, for Xbox Live Arcade; and on February 28, 2013, for WiiWare. Retro City Rampage was the last original game released for the WiiWare service globally until Deer Drive Legends was ported to the service the following November.

name: Reentry: A Space Flight Simulator
summary: Do you have what it takes to be an astronaut? Reentry is a realistic space flight simulator based on NASAs space programs; from the first American human spaceflight in Project Mercury, the rendezvous and EVAs of Project Gemini to the Moon landing in Project Apollo.

name: RealFlight Evolution: E-flite Beechcraft D18 1.5m
summary: The E-flite Beechcraft D18 1.5m is the most convenient and easiest-to-fly scale model of the classic aircraft yet! Well-equipped with many scale details, functional features, and Smart Technology, it's a modern-day marvel for a wide range of pilots.

name: Red Moon: Lost Days
summary: Red Moon: Lost Days is an RPG/visual novel hybrid developed for the Sega Saturn about Kyou Tan Wa, a pilot who after lost contact with a Army General friend, sets out on a journey to Egypt to investigate his disappearance.

name: Real Stories: Veterinaire
summary: This Wii-game in 3D offers a perfect and realistic simulation of the No. 1 job of most children: Veterinarian! The player can handle over 30 different cases of animal patients that correspond to reality in a veterinary practice and have been developed by specialists in the field. A variety of different animal species needs medical attention, and the player must use all the techniques of a good veterinarian such as talking to the owners, analysis and diagnosis, treatment, surgery, control to heal the little darlings. Realistic diagnosis and treatment instruments are used, and as the experience grows, the player can even earn diplomas and distinctions in addition to the great satisfaction of his patients. The game offers three different levels of difficulty, plus a knowledge quiz with 150 questions. The game is using the Wii's own controller Wiimote and Nunchuck And allows a realistic immersion in the veterinarian world: the player can actively handle or operate animals, even in multiplayer, where two players can perform a complex treatment together.

name: Reset
summary: Reset is a game about the bizarre, frightening, and exciting possibilities for kink in the cyborg/transhuman future.

name: Relicbound
summary: Relicbound is a TPS story rich action adventure game where you play as Jackson an archeologist abducted by a sinister organization to help them find a precious relic which can manipulate the time.

name: Red Dead Redemption: Undead Nightmare
summary: Red Dead Redemption: Undead Nightmare, later released as a standalone game, adds a new single-player experience in which Marston searches for a cure for an infectious zombie plague that has swept across the Old West.

name: Reflections of Life: Dream Box - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you stop a dangerous foe from turning art against the realms?

name: Renovation Plan
summary: This is a relaxing and leisurely home decoration game, you need to follow the design map to put all kinds of furniture in the corresponding position. Each room has unique furniture and decoration style, more gorgeous large apartment waiting for you to decorate.

name: Rebuilding Civilization
summary: Rebuilding Civilization is a single player simulation management game. You will lead a small group of war survivors to establish new settlements through collection, construction, production, and transportation, and you will face various challenges. Can you rebuild a new civilization?

name: Real-time Shogi
summary: Welcome to a world of Shogi freed from the limits of turns. From an infinite number of possibilities, find the shortest path to victory. Your tactical reading and sharp judgment will dominate the board. This is a new challenge for even the most seasoned Shogi fans.

name: Reel Fishing III
summary: Do you remember the very first time you went fishing? The fresh air...the soothing sounds of nature around you...the tranquility of the water. Reel Fishing III is a return to nature fishing! Whether you a seasoned veteran or have yet to cast your first line, Reel Fishing III will make it possible to experience fishing as it was meant to be...as it should be...in mother nature. Experience a magnificent 3-Dimensional fishing adventure with beautiful environments, lifelike fish and soothing environmental sounds!

name: Resident Evil 4
summary: Resident Evil 4 is the sixth installment in the Resident Evil series and is often noted for its departure from the fixed camera angles of earlier titles. It introduced an over-the-shoulder third-person perspective, faster-paced gunplay, and more dynamic controls. The game features larger, more open environments and a new AI system that enables enemies to coordinate attacks and attempt to corner the player. Enemies exhibit more human-like behavior, such as climbing ladders, opening doors, and using weapons.

name: Refuge
summary: This is an apocalyptic sandbox zombie shooting game, which can make weapons, upgrade bases, domesticate zombies, cultivate holy dragons, resist the tide of corpses, unite or attack other sanctuaries, enter alliances, and rebuild the world order

name: Reality Break
summary: Rewrite the Universe! Pilot an agile starfighter, upgrade it with randomized loot, and unleash mystical fate energy to alter the fabric of spacetime itself!

name: Rescue Team: Ancient Guardian
summary: Join a rescue mission where you'll balance urgent humanitarian efforts with groundbreaking scientific exploration. Navigate treacherous terrains to assess the full extent of the disaster as well as the world-changing discovery made amidst the chaos!

name: Redhowl
summary: Redhowl is an online social deduction game for 4 to 15 players, inspired by Little Red Riding Hood. Take on various roles across 3 factions. Switch between day, night, and councils to investigate, cooperate, or deceive to save (or destroy) Grandmother’s village.

name: Rebellion Godsoul: Awakening
summary: "GODSOUL" is a story-driven, Hyper-visually RPG. Team with "rebel" girls who love gaming and drawing (and more), resist villains and enjoy a mix of cyber reality, fantastical worlds, and card game action.

name: Relics of ancestors
summary: This game is a RPG adventure and exploration role-playing game. The story takes place in Beijing six thousand years later. At present, this work is a beta version, with only one occupation and one chapter of plot. In the beta version, adventurers can set up their own adventure team to explore and discover the heritage.

name: Rematch: Pro Edition
summary:
Step onto the pitch with the Rematch Pro Edition, designed for the dedicated. It includes:
Captain Pass Upgrade Ticket – Elevate your game and your rewards, step by step.
Blazon Player Background & Title – Showcase your identity with an epic design that makes a statement as unique as you are.
Blazon Buckler Tank Top – Classic tank top rebellion with blazon elegance, crafted for those who show their strength and shape their destiny with every match.
Blazon Pattern (for Top & Bottom clothes) – Infuse your outfit with a seamless epic design that truly reflects your unique identity—perfect for those who want their style to tell their story.
Blazon Jewel Set – Crafted from folded leather, each piece designed to shine on and off the field.

name: Red Bow
summary: If you were given another chance, would you take it? Or leave it in the hands of a little girl? Play as Roh, a young girl stuck in a bizarre nightmare of dark and eerie creatures.

name: Reaper Recon
summary: Reaper Recons is a fast-paced zombie arcade shooter that blends classic gameplay with modern enhancements. Eliminate waves of undead enemies, collect powerful weapon drops, and activate five distinct weapon power-ups to dominate the battlefield as difficulty steadily ramps up

name: Ready, Set, Block!
summary: "Ready, Set, Block!" is a fast-paced PvP board game where players race to reach the opposite side first. Place blocks to slow opponents, use character abilities and items to outwit rivals, and plan your moves carefully in this turn-based, tactical race. Play locally, online, or vs AI.

name: Reek
summary: Let off some pressure! Fly propelled by your diarrhea jet through a bunch of levels full of traps, enemies and nasties. Prove your navigating skills, leave no corner unstained and never squeeze your cheeks.

name: Reflect World
summary:
Reflect World is a shooter with RPG elements developed by East Cube and released for the Famicom Disk System. 
 
Reflect World is a vehicle-based top-down shoot 'em up with a lot of RPG and simulation elements. The player controls a large and formidable tank as it makes its way across a wasteland, destroying enemies and tinkering with its many modes and functions. The game is extremely difficult to understand unless the player is knowledgeable in Japanese (the game was never released outside of Japan), the instruction manual or, preferably, both. 
 
The game was developed and published by East Cube, an obscure Japanese developer that largely focused on Japanese computer games. Reflect World is the only game they ever released on a Nintendo console.

name: Relax Scramble: Endless Word Puzzle
summary: A relaxing endless word puzzle game where you build words from falling letters. No timers, no stress — just cozy, meditative gameplay to unwind and train your brain.

name: Reality
summary: A challenging psychological horror game where you explore a haunted hospital, uncover your forgotten identity, and survive symbolic horrors from your past. Escape isn't always the right answer — are you ready to face yourself? Try it now.

name: Renegade
summary: Port of Renegade for Thomson MO.

name: Report on the Death of Robert Evergreen
summary: A retro audio-based narrative game about the power of the news. Robert Evergreen is dead! The public adored him, but what was he like in private? Listen to interviews with Robert’s friends and family, decide what kind of article you’d like your paper to print, and watch the story unfold.

name: Remains
summary: Remains - survival in outer space orbiting the planet. Explore the area. Find a way to restore oxygen. Create tools for your needs. Beware of the dangers of outer space. Build your shelter in orbit and try not to die!

name: Resident Evil: Revelations 2 - Episode 2: Contemplation
summary:
Episode Two: Contemplation

Having escaped the detention facility, Claire and Moira join up with other Terra Save members, only to learn they are infected with a deadly virus. Can the group overcome desperation and fear to escape the island alive?

Meanwhile, half a year later, Barry must rely on Natalia's memory to track down his missing daughter, and hope beyond hope that he is not too late.

name: ReCast FF3: War of the Magitek
Retro Miami
summary: Retro Miami - it's an adrenaline thriller, full of primitive brutality, deadly gunshots and roofing fights.

name: Revolver roulette
summary: Revolver roulette is a game that tests players' courage and luck. In the game, a revolver will be used to simulate the scene of Russian roulette. Players need to load bullets, use items to increase their chances of winning, and finally shoot to defeat the opponent and receive their prize money.

name: Reverse 1999: Showdown in Chinatown
summary:
Version 2.5 of Reverse: 1999, which includes:
• New characters: Liang Yue, Noire, and Loggerhead
• New Garments for Windsong, Jiu Niangzi, Tuesday, Sotheby, Druvis III, The Fool
• New main event: Showdown in Chinatown
• New Anecdote for An-an Lee
• …and more!

name: Retro Game Aliens
summary: A late-night adventure for the 8-bit PC generation. - Retro Game Aliens is packed with nostalgia and love for the text-based genre of adventure games that shaped the evolution of RPGs and visual novels before fading into obscurity.

name: Re:Call
summary: Re:Call is a deeply emotional visual novel exploring the fragile nature of memory, the weight of forgotten promises, and the healing power of friendship. Set in a nostalgic Japanese high school, it follows Kaito Nakamura as he learns his ordinary life’s built on fragments of a past he can’t remember

name: Return to Castle Monkey Ball
summary: B.J. just got a whole lot ballsier. Collect bananas, find treasure, defeat guards, and escape the fortress!

name: Regular Factory: Escape Room
summary: You don't work in a regular assembly line. In this escape room, you will investigate what is really being manufactured in a secret factory, explore mysterious places and solve puzzles. Will you unravel the truth?

name: Reunion
summary: It's been 3 years since the loss of your Parents. Now you've got out of the Orphanage and you want to find your missing Brother, which might still be alive somewhere.

name: Redshift
summary: A short solo developed psychological narrative horror game where you close your eyes to reveal a hidden layer of reality, the REDSHIFT. Uncover the secrets of the facility, Tower 7, and survive what hunts you within the REDSHIFT.

name: Redout: Lightspeed Edition
summary: Redout: Enhanced Edition is a tribute to the old racing monsters such as F-Zero, WipeOut, Rollcage, and POD. It is designed to be an uncompromising, fast, tough and satisfying driving experience, soaked in that vertigo that stands at the core of the arcade racing genre. The floating system and driving models are based on physics: each turn, slope, hard braking, acceleration, each turn and twist of the track will apply a unique force to the ship. A sharp low-polygon style blends meshes and terrains with the latest state-of-the-art shading and lighting effects provided by the Unreal Engine 4, creating beautiful and instantly recognisable aesthetics. Breezy coastlines, eerie frozen landscapes, vast desert plains: the melancholic, dystopian atmosphere of a semi abandoned Earth is the background for the most high-speed, tense and beautiful futuristic racing clashes.

name: Real Time Attack
summary: Race to victory in this speedrunning extravaganza! Control the lovable Rucky Anguish as he tries to defeat Do Good Natas and avenge his father. With 16 levels of insane platforming action and built-in timer function, this is one real time adventure you'll LOVE attacking continuously!

name: Reanimal: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Get the Digital Deluxe Edition of Reanimal to get the Season Pass for all three chapters of DLC that expand the world of Reanimal. Uncover long dead secrets, and cast new light on old friends. The roots of violence go deep.

Disguise yourselves with the exclusive Foxhead and Muttonhead masks DLC. Friendship can be hell and sometimes a mask is the only protection!

Includes:
Reanimal - Foxhead and Muttonhead masks
Season Pass

name: Relic Digger
summary: Dig, collect, and sell the resources you find to invest in new tools, more powerful equipment, and special items that will boost your adventure. The more you upgrade, the deeper you can go — and the greater the rewards (and the dangers).

name: Real Soccer 2011
summary: Real Football / Soccer is a series of mobile football/soccer games by Gameloft that has been released annually since 2004.

name: Relic Raiders
summary: Relic Raiders is a top-down, team-based fighting game with a strong emphasis on tactical strategy and high-speed combat. Players band together in two teams (in either 2v2 or 4v4 matches) and are set loose on an asymmetrical map where they battle for control of the map's relic. Only one team can escape with the relic so strong team coordination, intelligent strategy, and mastery of character abilities are the keys to victory.

name: Redemption Cemetery: The Cursed Mark - Collector's Edition
Reality Check
summary: A Point And Click Adventure Game created by Retro Wolf as part of the Reality-On-The-Norm project.

name: Rememoried
summary: Rememoried is an independent video game, a virtual place where memories change to dreams and the only possible way is forgetting, which becomes a mechanism for proceeding to the next layer of dreams. The Surrealist explorative first-person adventure game.

name: Regina & Mac World
summary: Regina and Mac are back in an all new, 2D adventure. On a quest to help their new friend Macbat (from Macbat 64) to find the purpose in his life, the dinosaur and the parrot jump, run, slide and dash through 100 level filled with secrets.

name: Reveal Fantasia
summary: Reveal Fantasia Is a Fantasy role playing video game released in 2002 for the PlayStation 2 console by Victor Interactive Software, Inc. in Japan. The game involved an innovative concept of a role playing game involving no battles or fighting. Its game play shows some influence from dating simulation games.

name: Resurgence
summary: When his daughter Rosie goes missing after a car crash, Jason Dawn thinks his debts with the mob have come back to haunt him. His past leads him to a final confrontation where Jason learns the terrible truth.

name: Resident Evil: The Arklay Chronicle
summary:
Resident Evil: The Arklay Chronicle is a PC fan game that traces the events of July 98 surrounding the Arklay Mountains.

You can play several iconic characters in original scenarios such as Kenneth Sullivan, Richard Aiken, Forest Speyer, Barry Burton and Albert Wesker and try to discover the many secrets that hide the Spencer mansion.

name: Reioku: Ghost House
summary: The second installment of "Exit 8 Like," where all anomalies are terrifying, has arrived. Find it. And run!

name: Requiem Aeternam Eden
summary: A dream-like simulation in which you impersonate Ego, the last of Lilith's children, in a mission down on Earth.

name: Red Faction: Guerrilla Re-Mars-tered
summary: Set 50 years after the climactic events of the original Red Faction, Red Faction: Guerrilla allows players to take the role of an insurgent fighter with the newly re-established Red Faction movement as they battle for liberation from the oppressive Earth Defense Force. Red Faction: Guerrilla re-defines the limits of destruction-based game-play with a huge open-world, fast-paced guerrilla-style combat, and true physics-based destruction.

name: Red Flagg: Don't Call me Blue Redux
Relic Hunters Zero
summary:
Relic Hunter Zero is a free to play open source game.

You start with 2 characters and can unlock 4 others through gameplay.
The game consists of 4 areas with 3 stages each followed by a checkpoint and then a boss battle.
"Bounty" you collect from defeating enemies remains through all runs and can be used to by items from checkpoints to permanently add them to your starting base for later runs.
The 8 relics in the game are each broken into 3 parts. They can be found at the end of a stage randomly or bought from a checkpoint. Only 3 relics can be active at the same time.

name: Remorse
summary: Remorse is a first-person psychological horror game. Where you have to get out of an unusual prison, where your jailers are your fears and awakened conscience. But is there a way out of it ...?!

name: Red Riding Hood
summary: An ageless tale. Choose your own path. A new adventure! Immersive story with amusing dialogue.

name: Reptile Island
summary: Can you survive on this island swarming with reptiles? Let me tell you: YOU WILL DIE. But it's not about dying. It's about how long you can fight before the end, what structures you build and defend, and how long you can withstand the relentless waves of enemies. Good luck.

name: Revelations 2012
summary:
Armageddon. Apocalypse. The end of days. Mayan prophecy foretells the beginning of a new world age on December 21, 2012 when the road to the stars will descend from the sky and civilization as we know it will come to a tumultuous end. That date has arrived and with it the awakening of a most formidable enemy. Galactic alignment has enabled an artifact which opened a portal allowing villainous Gods access to our universe. Fate has chosen 4 characters to teleport through this portal into another dimension and battle against all odds to rescue mankind from destruction and enslavement. Using teamwork and strategy, can the four heroes save humanity by defeating these evil foes?

In Revelations 2012 players progress through an alternate dimension in a sweltering jungle environment heavily influenced by ancient Mayan culture. First-person shooter action is combined with puzzle solving requiring methodical yet quick-thinking team play in a captivating campaign that can be played with up to four players in co-op mode. Players navigate their way through this perilous maze in 15 different maps gathering "suki-tok" to advance themselves all the while fighting hordes of demonic minions. At the end of each level, the characters are faced with their greatest challenge yet, the Gods themselves!!! As each God is defeated players acquire a crystal to increase the capability of their weapon. Players must use each successive crystal in the next trial that awaits them. Gather all the crystals and overpower the Gods to be victorious in this epic journey.

In addition, multi-player modes let you compete four-on-four with friends playing as either heroes or demons in stasis tag or team death match. Revelations 2012 also boasts the premiere of battlegrounds multi-player maps. This unique mode allows unit selection mind control in a 4 vs. 4 setting to advance in force upon your opponent and infiltrate the enemy base to destroy their boss.

name: Rescue: Heroes in Action
summary: Dive into realistic, suspense-packed missions with your firefighting unit, where your decisions can often mean the difference between life and death. Find out what it means to be a true "Hero in Action".

name: Relativity Wars - A Science Space RTS
summary: Relativity Wars is a god-type strategy/action game, set in a universe which obeys Einstein's theories of relativity!

name: Rewrite
summary: Rewrite is an all-ages rated Japanese visual novel developed by Key. The story follows the life of Kotaro Tennoji, a high school student with superhuman abilities who investigates supernatural mysteries with five girls from his school. This ultimately leads him into the middle of a conflict between familiar summoners and superhumans searching for a familiar girl named Kagari who is the key to intelligent life and its destruction on Earth.

name: Res Militaria Rome
summary:
Res Militaria is a cross-platform turn-based strategy game.
Inspired by classic chess game and traditional war board game, it offers a wargame experience in a real historical context keeping low game complexity and time to learn. Try first the tutorial scenario to learn the basics.

name: Requiescence
summary: Dive into the story of Kymil, a young ice mage on a quest to unravel the mystery behind his uncle's death. As the world you know shatters around you, will you find a place for romance while the stakes climb higher?

name: Redgar: The Space Viking
summary: An explosive, story-driven top-down shooter with vibrant pixel graphics and a pumping soundtrack. Fight your way through hallways of castle-like spaceships, neon lit alleys and futuristic medieval fortifications using an array of powerful weapons and special devices.

name: Reign: Conflict of Nations
summary: Reign: Conflict of Nations is a large-scale real-time historical strategy game covering three centuries of medieval Europe. The player becomes a monarch testing their skills by controlling one of 26 unique factions as they develop smart economics, work political maneuvers, maintain thoughtful diplomacy, take care of resources and wage war. As the ruler players have absolute command and the ability to thrive or fail and die.

name: Reel Deal Slots: Mysteries of Cleopatra
summary: A gambling simulation in the Reel Deal Slots series.

name: Really Simple Golf
summary: Really Simple Golf is a climbing platformer golf, that blends chill vibes with precision driven adventure. Embark on an adventure across vibrant courses, mastering tricky shoots, navigating obstacles, and sinking those perfect putts.

name: Retro Wave
summary: Retro Wave is an endless runner in which you have to avoid various obstacles in order to achieve the highest possible score. Compete with other players worldwide on a global leaderboard and become number 1.

name: Reaper's Awakening!
summary: An RPG Game where you adventure to the underworld. Ascend the levels of The Void, and Defeat Grim Reapers, Demons, Gods, Angels, and More in this Action Packed RPG Video Game!

name: Retribution: 25th Anniversary Edition
summary:
Anniversary Edition of Half-Life: Retribution mod includes Half-Life 25th Anniversary Update's new features:

- Removed non-working multiplayer and everything connected with it.
- All types of debris have been completely removed.
- New menu background up to Quad HD resolution as "WON" version
- Animated Logo
- New loading screen
- UI items click sound as "WON" version
- Added 4 options in game configuratons "Advanced"
- Removed unsupported menu items
- Added new menu item for demo campain
- New icons for Steam library
- include russian translation.

name: Revive of The Moon
summary: Mitsuki, a high school girl, is caught up in an unprecedented disaster that comes out of nowhere. And the town is filled with deformed monsters. What is her destiny? A fusion of light action and zombie horror, A zombie action game supervised by Eiko Kano.

name: Restaurant Tycoon: My Cooking Empire - Luxe & Lounge
Relapse
summary: Relapse is a first-person shooter game where players parkour through dense environments while also fighting through hordes of enemies using firearms and powers. Players take on the role of Kin, a former freerunner who is forced to confront the consequences that stemmed from his past...

name: Realm of the Fallen
summary: VR meets old school FPS meets Metroidvania. Blast, bludgeon, jump, and climb your way through an ancient temple that has been overrun by augmented undead minions. Beware of the Sentinel, a drone that relentlessly hunts intruders. Set in a world with a unique aesthetic and horror elements.

name: Repton
summary: Repton, the eponymous protagonist, walks around an underground maze in a quest to find all the diamonds (some being held in safes, their release being triggered by finding and collecting a key) within a time limit in each of several levels, while avoiding being trapped or killed by falling rocks and monsters hatched from eggs. The original Repton game was released in the summer of 1985 and has 12 levels, with passwords making it possible to jump directly to later levels. If passwords were used though, on completion of the final level, the displayed message challenged the player to complete the game without using them.

name: Renai Karichaimashita: Koikari - Love For Hire
summary: Due to family circumstances, Yuki has only one belief: money will make his little sister happy. And thus, he works part-time jobs late into the night. His plan is to start working full-time after graduation, but his little sister tells him that if he won't go to university, then she won't either.

name: Re-Pair
summary:
Deep in space, far away from here, there are approximately 3.7 broken hearts that recently had a catastrophic break-up. The alien who owns these hearts thinks that, the only way to fix them is to travel planets to find supplies to fix the relationship. 
 
But like in most situations regarding relationships, there is an issue of communication. Quite literaly in this case, as the spaceship our hero uses has a faulty communication system that needs constant fixing. If the module is not maintained while traveling, talking to planet inhabitants get far more difficult, which almost guarantees at least another heartbreak. 
 
Will you help this space couple to get back together? Will you help them, re-pair?

name: Record of Agarest War 2
summary:
The central continent, from where the light is believed to have originated from, went silent, while at the same time demons began to spread throughout the world like a plague. Amongst the survivors of the catastrophe, that fateful day became known as the "Day of Light."

Sometime after the events of the Day of Light, a young man by the name of Weiss, who had lost all memory of himself, encounters an enigmatic woman named Eva, who introduces herself as an Agent of the Divine. It is from her that Weiss learns that he has committed the grievous sin of deicide, and that in order for him to atone for his crime he is to become the "Vessel" in which the power of the divinity he had slaughtered will be stored. For it will be that power that will be used to resurrect the one whose life he stole.

For those who betray the divine will pay for their sins in the space which separates salvation and damnation, as will their progeny...

name: Reverse Horizons
summary: Navigate a monochromatic world of forgotten ruins as Pluma, a wanderer with the power to bend gravity. Reclaim lost colors and mend the fabric of reality in this contemplative puzzle-platformer where up is down, and the only path forward is through the impossible.

name: Return To Booty Grotto
summary:
Swim through the mysterious Booty Grotto in search of treasure! A simple but challenging action game where you guide your intrepid fishy through a whole collection of varied and surprising levels, avoiding crazy traps and a bunch of loveable-yet-dangerous villains. Multiple paths through the game, multiple endings, secret exits, warps and bonus areas all await you if brave and skilful enough! Get the high score and complete every challenge to become a true Grotto master!

The original game by Team Cherry (Hollow Knight)'s William Pellen

name: Relatos Silenciados: Visita Indesejada
summary: Look for what you forgot, be very careful, you are not the only one in the building and there are signs of it, search, explore and interact in search of what you are looking for! Get ready to enter into mystery and unrest, something is not right and you need to find out why. PS2 style horror game.

name: Recycling Center Simulator
summary: Recycling Center Simulator is a business simulator game with a first person view.

name: Red Dragon Rampage
summary: Defend your red companion in this Action/Defense game from the creator of Toss the Turtle.

name: Real Boxing 2: Remastered - Masaru & Maywinner Edition
Re:Zero -Starting Life in Another World- Death or Kiss
summary:
Based on a light novel by Nagatsuki Tappei. It follows an original story that differs from the original light novel series and the anime.

In its original story, the Ruler Election has spun off a beauty contest, giving the winner a treasure that promises the recipient great luck and a powerful advantage to achieving the throne.
Except, the prize isn't what it seems, and, taking on its "Death Curse", Subaru must use his power to return from the dead to solve the mystery, build the trusts with the girls, receive the "kiss of a beautiful girl" and break the curse to escape death.

Candidates for a relationship with Subaru are Emilia, Rem, Ram, Felt, Beatrice, Crusch, Priscilla and Anastasia.

name: Rebel Inc.
summary: Rebel Inc. is a strategy game that looks at important real world issues.

name: Revenge of the Savage Planet: Bingo Brawl
summary: Bingo Brawl adds a fun, frantic, and FREE new competitive mode where you and your best pal race to see who can score the most points before the timer expires!

name: Redneck Ed: Astro Monsters Show
summary: Redneck Ed: Astro Monsters Show is an energetic, colorful arcade-style beat 'em up that follows the misadventures of Ed, a simple mechanic, in the world of intergalactic show business.

name: Reef Defense
summary: Reef Defense is a fast-paced, intense strategy game where relentless waves of crustaceans are coming for your precious eggs! Arm your reef with strategically positioned defenses and hold the line. Can you outlast the swarm, or will your eggs become crab food?

name: Renowned Explorers: International Society - More to Explore
summary:
"This expansion pack for Renowned Explorers has one goal: giving you More To Explore! The main features are:
