summary: Relive is a dark yet hopeful action-adventure where you create new plant growth with every step, transform the remains of fallen foes to amplify your magical powers, and overcome deadly challenges to transform the world around you.

name: Remember Easter
summary: Celebrate the special day with Remember Easter, a festive card-matching memory game perfect for all ages! Flip cards to reveal delightful Easter-themed icons like bunnies, eggs, and chocolate, while testing your memory across increasing levels of fun and challenge. With cheerful visuals, cozy music, and endless holiday spirit, it’s the perfect way to make your gaming season merry and bright!

name: Real Man Got 100
summary: A simple platform jumping parkour game

name: Reindeer Racing
summary: Reindeer Racing is a quirky and casual racing game where you race against up to 8 players worldwide. Use falling trees and a variety of other obstacles to hinder your rivals as you race to victory and climb the leaderboard.

name: Revolve
summary: Revolve is a fast paced 1v1 movement shooter where every duel is a test of skill and reflexes. Players fight using only a revolver. With every defeat offers a card that changes how the game plays and enhances your weapon, keeping each match unpredictable.

name: Rescue Bear Operation
summary: Rescue Bear Operation is: a one-level, all ages, child friendly, free to play, mini game designed to create awareness about wildfires. We'll be donating at least 30% of our net proceeds to charitable causes.

name: Redswood VR
summary: Redswood VR is a virtual retelling of the Red Riding Hood story. In this tale, you play as both Red and then the Huntsman, each separately tasked with making their way through a dying and unrecognizable forest from their pasts to the inevitable conclusion at Granny's house.

name: Retrospect
summary: "retrospect" is a novel game consisting of five chapters. Trace the memories of the ghosts and learn about them. That is the only mourning you can do.

name: Red Remover Blast
summary:
Red Remover Blast is the explosive spin-off of hit puzzle game Red Remover.
The gameplay is different this time around. Instead of tapping red shapes to remove them you must use explosions to knock them off the screen. Don't knock any green shapes off though or you'll fail the level. To add to the fun there are 8 planes of gravity - look at the shapes faces to see which way they will fall.
Too easy? Try replaying the game in the extra challenging coin mode!

name: Reverse 1999: 1987 Cosmic Overture
summary:
Version 2.7 of Reverse: 1999, which includes:
• New characters: Hissabeth, Kiperina, and Name Day
• New Garments for Voyager, Argus, Barcarola and Rabies
• New main event: 1987 Cosmic Overture
• New Anecdote for Fatutu
• …and more!

name: Restaurant Rush
summary:
The long-awaited sequel to Burger Rush is here!

Join Heidi in here quest to become a world-class chef by cooking over 50 international dishes such as Filet Mignon, Dim Sum, and Pizza Marinara.

With brand new features such as the Farmer`s Market, Cooking Competitions and Bonus Challenges, Restaurant Rush is 2x as addicting as Burger Rush!

name: Rebloom
summary: No swords, no shields; fight zombies with flowers! Take advantage of mutations and cross pollination to create the ultimate zombie killing flowers. 125 flower types to discover through strategic planting and picking in this action rogue-lite, zombie survivors game.

name: Redviil
summary: Now it's 2143, my name is Alice, I was born in a small town called Gwaine. I dream to continue the work of my great-grandfather: to find a cure for the red plague and release people living in hundreds of bunkers.

name: Remington Super Slam Hunting: North America
summary:
Remington Super Slam Hunting: North America is where arcade action meets real hunting. Whether you are going for Bighorn Sheep in Alberta, Whitetail deer in the US Northeast, Elk in the Rocky Mountains or any of the other tons of animals and locations in the game, the two constants are speed and danger. Black Bear, Mountain Lions, angry Bison and host of other wild animals are all waiting to take you down. 
 
And if that's not scary enough, you can compete with three other hunters at one machine, or the entire world as you post your scores and achievements online. The game also offers a full-on two player cooperative campaign mode.

name: Resort Hotel Simulator
summary: Hotel Owner Simulator is a hotel management game where you start from a small hotel and grow your business by creating beautifully designed rooms, adjusting room sizes and layouts by placing each individual wall, negotiating high prices, and expanding your empire. Lets build, and manage the resort.

name: Retro Rockets
summary: Retro Rockets is a retro-future multiplayer game where you hunt Retronauts and de-orbit space stations as Destructo! Or play as the Retronauts and work together and defend against Destructo by enabling the security systems that will make the killer robot rest in pieces.

name: Reflections of Life: Gone but not Forgotten - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you save the city of Harmoris from the undead?

name: Red Passport: Ticket to Russia - Old Novosibirsk Bus
summary: Hop on a time‑worn Novosibirsk bus and get to the station the old-fashioned way — with plenty of character.

name: Responding
summary:
Responding is a First/Third Person Shooter with emphasis on the daily routine and work of the NYPD, NYSP, EMS and Fire Services in the State of New York. 
While the focus is still heavily emphasized on the city of New York itself, we aim to create a lush and varied outback. Responding, will feature a massive landmass to explore, ranging from islands, forests, hilly and mountainous areas and lush beautiful beaches. 
The game will even let you explore the city of New York.

name: Return to Ringworld
summary:
After saving the puppeteer race from extermination and uncovering some powerful ancient technology in the first game, Quinn, Seeker of Vengeance and Miranda Rees find themselves searched as fugitives by all three major species, so they go to Ringworld to hide. Once in Ringworld they'll try to uncover some evidence to clear their names, but they stumble across another universe-threatening plot. This time U.N. general Carson Teal is out to rule the universe by uncovering Ringworld's secrets, and you must stop him.

Return to Ringworld is the sequel to the Ringworld: Revenge of the Patriarch. Like its predecessor, it is based on Larry Niven's Known Space series of novels. Once again this game is a puzzle-solving point-and-click adventure. This game is much larger than its predecessor, with hundreds of screens, mazes, etc. The player can control three characters throughout the game, a la Day of the Tentacle.

name: Really? Really!
summary:
Really? Really! is the third eroge visual novel in the Shuffle! series created by Navel for Microsoft Windows. It is a continuation of Kaede's path from the first Shuffle! visual novel, and has a linear plot.

In Really? Really!, Kaede has lost her memories and throughout the game the player must fix them. Using keywords acquired from viewing various events in Kaede's memories, the player must fix mistakes in Kaede's past memories.

name: Red Rogue
summary: Red Rogue is a side-scrolling roguelike. Descend into the Dungeon of Chaos, retrieve the Amulet of Yendor, kill all who stand in your way and return with your prize.

name: Ready, Steady, Ship!
summary: Grab a buddy for this chaotic couch co-op puzzler. Use various tools and equipment to assemble the most efficient conveyor belts to keep the goods flowing. Supports single-player but is best played in 2-player couch coop.

name: Reversi Temple
summary: Reversi Temple is a wonderful strategy board game suitable for all ages. Listen to the in-game LoFi music whilst and let it run whilst you study making moves when you need a break. Be able to create your own custom board, such as creating a 3,600 tiled board and play for hours.

name: Resident Evil: Origins Collection
summary: Experience the early days of the outbreak in Resident Evil Origins Collection, a compilation package of two with two Resident Evil origin stories: Resident Evil 0 and Resident Evil HD . Both terrifying games have been brought to new new levels of horror with new HD visuals, improved sound, widescreen support, an optional modernized control system and more.

name: Reflection of a Fallen Feather
summary: In Reflection of a Fallen Feather you are the enemy. Triumph in turn-based battles to transform into defeated monsters - each party member is a fusion of three monster types with near infinite customization. Find hidden treasures used to jump, smash, swim, and manipulate the environment.

name: Realms at War
summary: Realms at War is a turn-based strategy game inspired by chess, where fantasy factions clash in PvP and PvE battles. Equip your forces, adapt to rogue-like challenges, and conquer diverse realms filled with ever-changing foes and environments.

name: Red Cell
summary: A first-person shooter rogue-like game blending fluid movement, fast-paced combat, and strategic weapon mastery. Dive into chaotic, neon-lit arenas, unleash combos, and uncover a gripping sci-fi story in Red Cell.

name: Release Me
summary:
In Release Me, you will control our round hero and try to release the locked power cube in a variety of stage settings and under a limited time.
Along the way, you will encounter various enemies and tread along treacherous paths and moving obstacles which will kill you in an instant hit. You can collect tokens to increase score and a freeze cube to freeze all the enemies for a limited time, and a key to unlock the cage, and release and eventually collect the power cube.

name: Revue Starlight Re Live
summary:
The Adventure Begins on Stage in RPG Revue Starlight Re Live!
A direct continuation of hit anime Revue Starlight, the story of the game picks up right where the anime leaves off, but you don't need to be a fan to enjoy all the excitement and drama that await in this RPG!

name: Redfall
summary: Redfall is an open-world, co-op FPS from Arkane Austin, the award-winning team behind Prey and Dishonored. Continuing Arkane’s legacy of carefully crafted worlds and immersive sims, Redfall brings the studio’s signature gameplay to this story-driven action shooter.

name: Regulus: The Advent
summary: Regulus: The Advent is a real time strategy RPG developed in collaboration of a Thai-based game studio, Jumbo Jumps, and TV Tokyo Corporation. It tells a story of cadets from a Demon Realm's military academy on a mission to save the universe from enigmatic corrupters called the Vespers.

name: Renai Banchou! Inochi Mijikashi, Koiseyo Otome! Love is Power
summary: A PSP otome adventure game.

name: Recruit & Adventure
summary: A deck-building card battler you never played before. Cards, relics, units, flipping and folding. Build powerful deck. Defeat powerful enemies!

name: Religion Inc.
summary: Religion Inc. is a strategy simulator where you create a religion. Will you find a way to unite the whole world under one faith? Create your own unique religion using different combinations of religious aspects! Test if it can withstand the challenges of the times, the pressure of obstacles, and bring humanity together.

name: Reformers
summary: Reformers is a retro Role-Playing Game. There's no guide in the game, but plenty pleasures that waiting your exploration and discovery.

name: Retail Wars
summary: Retail Wars is a friendship-ruining 4 player couch competitive party game. Pickup and throw anything in the store to serve customers and knock out your friends in the fight to become the coveted employee of the month!

name: Redout 2: Winter Pack
summary: Race across the glacial plains and lava-stricken canyons of Mercury in the Redout 2 - Winter Pack, featuring 3 new tracks, 28 career events and new music tracks by Dance With The Dead!

name: Remote Bot
summary:
Beholding the future is not the way the greats do. The greats don’t watch, they make! Seize your chance! Take control of a robot via ssh. Command your robot with a brand new command line interface and make them walk, climb, or maybe even make a cup of coffee!

Platformer games, annoying as never before.

name: Recursive
summary: A recursive incremental game where every system feeds another. Click enemies, unlock towns with unique minigames and currencies, and channel everything into your Giant’s growing power.

name: Rebooker
summary: You just started your job as an Airline Gate Agent. You have the tasks of making sure people get to their destinations safely and happily. Do you best to respond to their requests promptly. You will have various tasks to complete to accomplish this goal.

name: Rememento: White Shadow
summary: Rememento - White Shadow is a turn-based RPG game. Make your own team and build tactics. Explore the vast world and make your own path of destiny.

name: Red Cross - Emergency Response Unit
summary:
Take control of a Red Cross Emergency Response Unit and save disaster victims from certain doom! Explore 11 different high resolution maps, snatching survivors from the jaws of death with teams of volunteers, doctors, engineers, and several exciting emergency vehicles! Working for the Red Cross might be the toughest job in the world, but you can reap the rewards and excitement from your home in Red Cross: Emergency Response Unit! A portion of each purchase will be donated to the Red Cross.

Control every aspect of a Red Cross E.R.U!
Save survivors of earthquakes & droughts
Part of the proceeds will go to the Red Cross

name: Reverb
summary: Reverb is a multiplayer PVPVE extraction stealth shooter with a first-person perspective, set in a fictional Biopunk universe where there is a constant struggle for evolution.

name: ReShot
summary: A fast-paced platformer shooter, but with a twist: You’ve got a time-loop gun. Fire a bullet. Die. Respawn. That same bullet now travels through time, appearing in your next life exactly when and where it was first shot.

name: Reverse 1999: The Prisoner In The Cave
summary:
Version 1.4 of Reverse: 1999, which includes:
• New characters: 37, and 6
• New Garments for Lilya, Diggers, and Sweetheart
• New main story chapter: The Prisoner in the Cave
• New Anecdotes for Charlie and Oliver
• …and more!

name: Religious Idle
summary:
Religious Idle is the tycoon style game in which you will create a new religion using technology. It is the 21'st century after all so how better to find followers then to create an online religion? You will start your religion from scratch with the freedom to define names and attributes of your newly created faith.
As your following grows and more and more people turn to your religion, generous followers will start to donate money to you. You can use this money to invest in sacred relics and holy buildings that will attract more followers and even more donations. Create a religion to be remembered through the ages! Have fun!

name: Reflex Master: Sight
summary: Reflex Master: Sight is a fast and simple reflex game that puts your reaction speed to the test! Watch closely and click as soon as the signal appears. Your total reaction time across 5 quick rounds determines your final score—and your rank! Can you beat your personal best and rise above the rank of Snail? A perfect pick-up-and-play experience for sharpening reflexes and challenging friends offline!

name: Reines Du Sabbat
summary:
Reines Du Sabbat is a JRPG developed by doujin circle Kenix who would later develop Corpse Party, this work became quite infamous on the Japanese internet during the late 90's and early 2000's due to its grotesque content to the point of being "quietly" distributed on freeware sites.

The game takes place in the country of Serfina. In a small hut there lived a girl called Puff, together with her older brother, Lux. Since they've lost their parents at an early age, the older brother had to take the parent role and take care of his little sister. However, one day, Lux suddenly fell ill with a fever of an unknown origin, with no doctor able to help and him gradually losing his strength. Puff heard about a medicinal herb called the Snow Herb that can quickly bring down any kind of fever and went to the forest of Pia to find it. In the forest, being absorbed in the beautiful flowers blooming there Puff lost her uncle.

This is where the game begins and Puff's journey will lead her to witness the cruelty of human beings...

name: Reytrieve Odyssey
summary: Reytrieve Odyssey is a vibrant 3D platformer starring a feisty android girl on a quest to retrieve mysterious data disks! Switch between powerful cartridges, explore giant colorful islands, and uncover the secrets of a broken world!

name: Resistance 204X
summary: Fight against other players locally or cross-play online on this fast-paced footsies-based 2D fighting game. Block! Poke! Jump! Grab! Hit & Confirm at the right moment. Make combos and special attacks without bleeding your thumb. Run and reach the end of the stage to win the match. Rollback Netcode.

name: Retro Runners X2
summary:
The best free 8 bit infinite running game is BACK!
Retro Runners X2 is the ultimate endless run game!

Get ready for the challenge in this awesome race game with a nostalgic retro style 3D universe!
Get as far as you can, jumping, dodging obstacles and rivals, collecting coins and special items!

name: ReactorX 2
summary: Be an android mechanic in ReactorX 2 and restore power to your spaceship after a pirate attack. Navigate 5 sectors, solve 30 levels and use new arm-magnet & wrench mechanics to succeed in this puzzle game. 6 energy types & personal indicator to boost gameplay experience.

name: Resident Evil: Super Bundle
summary: Celebrate the 20th anniversary of Resident Evil with a huge collection of RE titles spanning the franchise's storied history.

name: Ready, Set, Party Collection
summary: Get in the party mood!

name: Related
summary: Related is a game that immerses into the dark but fascinating story of two sisters. Explore the dark locations of an abandoned orphanage, solve mysteries, while immersed in memories.

name: Rest In Peace
summary: A third-person action adventure game in a kingdom overrun with corrupted spirits. You play as Wren, a caretaker for the Autumn Court tasked with cleansing the corruption and returning the recently risen Autumn King back to his tomb.

name: Re:Awaken
summary: Purify negativity from the afterlife and bring together the children of fate! Swear oaths to divine beasts and wield powerful twilight abilities in this anime inspired roguelite adventure.

name: Revenge of the 'Gator
summary: It's pinball....with gators! This arcade-style title brings pinball on the go with the Game Boy! Score as many points as possible, but don't let your ball be eaten by the 'Gator!

name: Re:play
summary:
Ever wondered what you would do if you were given the chance to turn back time and relive your past? In this text-based interactive game, you wake up in a new body and unfamiliar environment, after having just died.

"Replay" starts at birth and ends at adulthood -- that is....if you survive up until that point. There are 9 possible endings. You'll meet many interesting people along the way. Who will be your friend...who will be your foe? You decide.

'What would you do if you were given a second chance at life?'

name: Rescue Shot
summary: Rescue Shot is a shooter developed and published by Namco. On one side, it differences from the famous Point Blank series. The game, in fact, looks more like Time Crisis, which doesn't rely on accuracy less very much, thus letting you enjoying the fast-pace of the game dynamic. On the other side, the variety in Rescue Shot is similar to the Point Blank series.

name: Red Asphalt
summary:
Red Asphalt incorporates both racing elements and combat. Using a skillful combination of both, your objective is to overcome your opponents and face off against Draenek in the Arena of Death -- the fifth and final world. There are 24 tracks in all, spanning apocalyptic city streets and other futuristic settings.

Before your dangerous journey begins, you'll need to choose one of six different characters to play as. Each comes with three varying abilities; the driving skill affects a character's handling ability and top speed, tactical affects weapon lock-on times and aggression is that character's strength. Among the characters is the dangerous Motormouth that thrives on death and annihilation; Thula Crimstone, a future leader of the Starian Empire; Jackal, a war-torn being that wishes to destroy all those that bring war against his people; and the spiritual Hiroki. Throughout the game, they'll earn experience points that increase ability points.

name: Re:Fresh
summary: Restore your town as you run, jump, and dash through cozy locales while helping lovable townsfolk! Become immersed in a tight-knit community of animals and robots while becoming the town hero in this heart-warming solarpunk adventure.

name: Retro-Pixel Color Palette: Color by Number
summary: Retro-Pixel Color Palette: Color by Number is an addictive anti-stress pixel art game. Choose from a variety of fun pixel images and follow the numbers to bring them to life. Pixel Coloring has never been this easy!

name: Red Dead Redemption: Legends and Killers
summary: The Legends and Killers Pack adds to the epic Red Dead Redemption multiplayer experience with a ton of brand new features - including nine new active Competitive mode map locations tailored for multiplayer action, 8 playable characters from Red Dead Revolver, the devastating Tomahawk weapon and more..

name: Rematch
summary: Control one player on your team and compete in fast-paced 5v5 matches from an immersive third-person perspective. Team up with your friends and join the action.

name: REalM: Walk of Soul
summary: One night Iris awakens in a bizarre and perturbing REalM, where she must embark on a journey to uncover the truth behind its mysteries and find herself. Dive into this 2D surreal horror puzzle adventure set in a nightmarish world, filled with mind breaking enigmas awaiting to be uncovered.

name: Red Dead Redemption & Red Dead Redemption 2 Bundle
summary: This bundle includes Red Dead Redemption, Red Dead Redemption: Undead Nightmare, Red Dead Online, and Red Dead Redemption 2: Story Mode.

name: Reincarnation Galgame Become Heroine!
summary: The otaku who died suddenly due to staying up late to play Galgame for a long time unexpectedly reincarnated into the game world and became the heroine?!Explore the game world and become a hero through your own strength!

name: Revelations: Persona
summary: Revelations: Persona is a role-playing video game developed and published by Atlus. It is the first entry in the Persona series, itself a subseries of the Megami Tensei franchise, and the first role-playing entry in the series to be released in the west. The game has been ported to Playstation Portable with the title of Shin Megami Tensei: Persona and featured new cutscenes and a redone localization. The story focuses on a group of high school students as they are confronted by a series of supernatural incidents. After playing a fortune-telling game, the group each gain the ability to summon Personas, the multiple selves within them. Using this power under the guidance of Philemon, a benevolent being representing humanity's subconscious, the group face off against multiple forces that threaten the world. Gameplay revolves around the characters navigating environments around their town and fighting enemies using their Personas. During the course of the game, the player can create new Personae for battle using spell cards gained in battle or by talking with enemies.

name: Resident Evil 7: Biohazard
summary: Resident Evil 7: Biohazard is the first game of the Resident Evil series to switch from 3rd-person to fully 1st-person perspective. A complete refresh of gameplay systems simultaneously propels the survival horror experience to another level. It is as much horror as it is survival, boosting up scare elements and minimizing downright shooting action. The game allows use of Sony's PSVR Headset to play in VR mode.

name: Retirement Home Tower Defense
summary: Step into Retirement Home chaos in this comedic tower defense game. The "Old Folks" have stopped taking their meds, wage war against the onslaught of doctors and stop them reaching the medicine cabinet and putting you all down for an afternoon nap.

name: Realms Beyond: Ashes of the Fallen
summary: Realms Beyond is a party-based fantasy role-playing game with tactical turn-based combat and full character customization. Explore a huge world and lead your companions into the depth of forgotten dungeons in search for lost treasures. Unveil the ancient mysteries of the Realms Beyond!

name: Rewoven Self
summary: Rewoven Self is a narrative puzzle game where fantasy and reality intertwine. Through folding, cutting, and stitching, you rebuild yourself in a cycle of brokenness and renewal— a gentle yet profound journey of emotional healing.

name: Resident Evil: Deadly Silence
summary: Resident Evil: Deadly Silence is an enhanced version of the original Resident Evil for the Nintendo DS. It was made to commemorate the tenth anniversary of the series. The key difference with the original game is the use of the dual screen and touch sensitive formats, among many gameplay additions. A primary map is displayed on the second screen, providing extra help in finding the important areas of the mansion. The lower touch screen can be used to open locks or, in a special 1st person perspective addition, fight off various versions of the evil dead. The game also includes wireless LAN support for up to four players with two different multiplayer game modes.

name: Resident Evil 7: Biohazard - Deluxe Edition
summary:
Resident Evil 7 Biohazard is the the harrowing homecoming of this survivor horror franchise. While Resident Evil 7 draws from the series' roots of atmospheric survival horror, it also delivers a whole new level of terror.
The game is set after the events of Resident Evil 6, taking place in modern day and revolving around a foreboding, derelict plantation mansion in rural America. Players must explore and survive the horrors within the mysterious, sprawling estate.

The Deluxe Edition includes the main game as well as Additional Content 1, 2 and 3 upon their release.
- Add-On Content 1: Four Short Side Stories
- Add-On Content 2: One Additional Story Episode
- Add-On Content 3: One Additional Story Episode

name: Ready Player One: Rise of the Gunters
summary: Ready Player One: Rise of the Gunters

name: Retro Game Crunch
summary: Retro Game Crunch is a series of 7 games, full of the charm and challenge of the 8-bit generation. Each world feels like an authentic NES classic. A massive genre-spanning collection.

name: Resident Evil 7: Biohazard - Steelbook Edition
summary:
Resident Evil VII biohazard Steelbook Edition includes:
Survival Pack: Action Set
- 44 Mag Ammo x4
- Special Grenade x1
- Lock Pick x1
- Solid Fuel x1
- Gunpowder x1
- Herb x1
- Madhouse Mode Unlocked

name: Resident Evil 4 VR
summary: Explore the iconic world of Resident Evil 4 in this all-new version, entirely made for VR. Step into the shoes of special agent Leon S. Kennedy on his mission to rescue the U.S. President's daughter who has been kidnapped by a mysterious cult. Find your way through a rural village in Europe, come face to face with challenging enemies, and uncover secrets and gameplay that have revolutionized the entire survival horror genre. Battle horrific creatures infected by the Las Plagas parasite and face off against aggressive enemies including mind-controlled villagers and discover their connection to Los Illuminados, the cult behind the abduction.

name: Resident Evil 4 VR
summary: Explore the iconic world of Resident Evil 4 in this all-new version, entirely made for VR. Step into the shoes of special agent Leon S. Kennedy on his mission to rescue the U.S. President's daughter who has been kidnapped by a mysterious cult. Find your way through a rural village in Europe, come face to face with challenging enemies, and uncover secrets and gameplay that have revolutionized the entire survival horror genre. Battle horrific creatures infected by the Las Plagas parasite and face off against aggressive enemies including mind-controlled villagers and discover their connection to Los Illuminados, the cult behind the abduction.

name: Retro Game Store Simulator
summary: Build your own Video Game Store in 1984. Everyday until the end of 1989 gives you the opportunity to stock shelves, cycle your inventory, manage your prices, analyze historical trends to make your game store profitable. Use era-relevant technology and systems to prove that gaming has a future!

name: Requiem: Rise of the Reaver
summary: Requiem: Rise of the Reaver is a Free-to-Play MMORPG set in a dark distant world where an event known as the "Thanatos Incident" rendered the world almost unlivable. Create your own biological weapon known as a Temperion and experience the horrors that grip Ethergia.

name: Resident Evil 4: VR Mode
summary:
Experience the ultimate immersive experience as Leon S. Kennedy takes on a grueling rescue mission!

Resident Evil 4 is a remake of the 2005 original Resident Evil 4 reimagined for 2023 to bring state-of-the-art survival horror. Resident Evil 4 preserves the essence of the original game, while introducing modernized gameplay, a reimagined storyline,
and vividly detailed graphics to make this the latest survival horror game where life and death, terror and catharsis intersect.

name: Regency Solitaire II
summary:
Revisit romantic Regency Britain to build a glorious garden, in this charming solitaire sequel. Tour historic hotspots, silence gossips, and host the season’s most anticipated soiree. Play your cards right to unlock bonus levels and a love story. Don't miss the party everyone's talking about!

Revisit romantic Regency Britain and build a glorious garden, in this charming solitaire sequel. Brought to you by the creators of the hit casual card game, Regency Solitaire.

Play your cards right as you tour must-see locations around Britain, from grand houses to vast landscaped gardens and cultural hotspots.

Resolve a tangled web of family secrets to help Bella silence the gossips, and host the season’s most anticipated soiree.

Unlock gameplay features with your makeover project, and reveal bonus 'Collector's Edition' levels and a love story. Don't miss the party everyone's talking about!

name: Rewilder
summary: Rewilder branches out from Match 3 conventions with a blend of strategic puzzle solving, and a zen-like meditative ambiance. Help Naia, the island's defender, harness nature's strength by tracing paths though matching flora and create Essence Links, which you'll use to cleanse contaminated habitats, and turn frenzied creatures into cute allies. You'll adapt to game-changing hazards and discover new creatures to re-populate the restored habitats!

name: Red Passport: Ticket to Russia
summary: Embark on a thrilling journey across Russia! From a cozy apartment to the airport, fly to a new city, and ride a train to Vladivostok. Explore, solve puzzles, and uncover secrets along the way!

name: Resonark X
summary: RESONARK X is an unprecedented rhythm game that offers a different way to play on the desktop and in VR. In desktop mode, the game is played using 7 lanes + alpha and the corresponding keyboard keys. In VR mode, you use hand controllers to clap your hands, manipulate six strings. The performance will be performed while the music is being played.

name: Real Truck Simulator USA & Ultimate 4x4 Offroad & Real Car Driving Simulator Bundle
summary: Trucks, offroad vehicles, and luxury cars – hours of fun await!

name: Remorse
summary: This game takes place in an ascending void where walls flank the sides and platforms of varying lengths rise upward.

name: Reverse 1999: Folie et Déraison
summary:
Version 2.6 of Reverse: 1999, which includes:
• New characters: Recoleta and Aleph
• New Garments for Willow, Lopera, Melania and Erick
• New main story chapter: Folie et Déraison
• New Anecdote for Bette
• …and more!

name: RedCat Spookkasteel
summary: Grizella, the wicked witch, has captured WhizzKitty and only RedCat can save her! RedCat must search in and around the magical haunted castle. RedCat will have to face numerous enemies in five different worlds. In the forest, the castle, the caves, the graveyard, and the castle tower, Brutus and Max are also hiding and will try to thwart RedCat at the most unexpected times! Along the way, RedCat will encounter creepy and enchanted creatures such as giant spiders, red-nosed bats, poison frogs, and brightly colored ghosts!

name: Remnant: From the Ashes
summary:
The world is in ruins. Only a remnant of mankind remains, hunted to near extinction by horrors from another world. As one of the few survivors left, you will venture into portals to fantastic realms to gather the resources and firepower needed to fight back and retake what was lost.

Remnant: From the Ashes is a third-person survival-action game set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by mythical creatures. The game provides players and up to three of their friends with a unique, customizable gameplay experience filled with intense shooting and melee combat, gear and weapon crafting, character progression and dynamically-generated levels that offer an infinite number of ways to explore and take on deadly monsters and epic bosses.

name: Reynard
summary: Reynard is a mixture of procedurally generated action RPG and a Tower Defense genre with roguelike elements. It has been influenced by classics such as Legend of Zelda, Final Fantasy and an indie classic - Binding of Isaac.

name: Remnant II: The Dark Horizon
summary:
A return to N’Erud uncovers a mysterious place preserved in time, where alien farmlands are tended by robots for inhabitants who have long since perished. But time corrupts all, and rogue AI and robotic creations threaten at every turn while travelers search for the secrets of the colossal entity that dominates the skyline.

Features
- New storyline, dungeons and area based in the world of N’Erud
- New Archetype - The Warden
- Many items and powerful weapons that enhance gameplay
- New bosses, characters and fearsome creatures

name: Rescue Operation
summary: Is a first-person shooter game. The game will follow the scenario of the game, and destroy the enemies in its path

name: Rescue Team: Mineral of Miracles
summary: The extraordinary discovery of a mineral named "Immortalite" has sent shockwaves across the globe. Now you are tasked with uncovering the secrets of this powerful mineral and ensuring it doesn't fall into the wrong hands.

name: Rela
summary: This program simulates astrophysics, allowing the creation of stellar systems in the void and the experience of being one of the celestial bodies.

name: Remothered: Broken Porcelain
summary: Broken Porcelain brings an abundance of welcome changes to the series, introducing new gameplay and storytelling elements that breathe new life into the characters and an unprecedented level of immersion in this haunting adventure - perfect for both new and returning fans to the series.

name: Remorse: The List
summary: Remorse: The List is a classic survival horror game where the player must figure out what is happening in the little hungarian town of Hidegpuszta, and your only clue is a list that doesn't make much sense. Exploring every nook and cranny of this place will be the key to unveiling its secrets and get out of there alive.

name: Reap and Sow
summary:
Reap and Sow is a non-traditional Yume Nikki fangame. In many aspects, it is very reminiscent of well-known farming games like Harvest Moon.

In Reap and Sow you take care of a farm during the day. You start with almost nothing except a few seeds, and from there you must expand with more plants and even livestock. You raise crops, care for animals and befriend the locals in town.

There is also another part to this game that is vastly different from the farming. That is, what happens during night time. You explore your dream world. The dream world will be a huge world with everything from factories with robots to magic forests with faeries and everything in between.

The dream world will eventually tie into the real world and you can use some crops that you grow in your farm to affect the dream world (mostly the mushrooms you can grow later). Some items from the real world can also be used in the dream world. The dream world and its inhabitants will be suitably abstract and probably won’t make sense most of the time.

name: Revery Rebirth
summary:
'Revery Rebirth' is the story of a musician just finishing their lessons on a remote island. However, once returning to the main land, things aren't as peaceful as they were before. 
 
A well trained musician in the land of Caarmellum is able to harness the elements of the world with song. You'll be able set fire with brass, change the ground beneath you with drums and several other possibilities. Combine these skills with other musicians you meet along the way and help bring peace back to the land.

name: Reap
summary: One swing. One cut. One endless harvest.

name: Realm of Darkness
summary: Discover a thrilling combat system. Over 300 unique types of enemies roam the lands, each capable of posing their own kinds of threats to your adventure. There are hundreds of possible strategies to lead the group to victory, including the use of scrolls and all types of magic. Great story that will keep you in your seat!

name: Red Laser Z
summary: Red Laser Z is a FPS shooter with a unique weapon that disintegrates everything with one shot. A space station was occupied by aliens, and it's your job to climb up through 10 handcrafted stages full with secret areas, treasures and wacky NPCs to uncover the weird truth behind the invasion.

name: Reky + Brawl Chess
summary: Feast your eyes on crystal clear visuals of reky. Interact with your environment and find a way to reach the finishing...square. Are you ready to become a chess champion? Choose your hero and challenge other players in the game of kings.

name: Realm of Alters
summary: "Realm of Alters" is a turn-based strategy card game. A clear vision of card play orders and knowing which card to sacrifice to generate resources are the keys to victory.

name: Red Baron Pack
summary:
The Red Baron flies again!
Return to the classic Red Baron games with this digital collection featuring the original Red Baron, Red Baron 3D, the Red Baron Mission Builder and high-quality scans of the original manuals, maps and reference cards.

name: Redeemer
summary: REDEEMER is a Top-Down Action game where you will punch, hack and blast your way through enemies using fists, hammers, fire arms and even the environment.

name: Rebel Infernal Path
summary: Rebel Infernal Path is a turn-based, command-driven 3D hack-and-slash RPG. Choose from 10 classes to form a party of 4 heroes and 4 summoned monsters. Battle through dazzling dungeons and vast open fields to overthrow a tyrant. Defeat his minions, craft powerful gear, and conquer all 6 stages.

name: Red Passport: Ticket to Russia - Japan Call
summary: The yacht scene is no longer silent. This DLC adds 5 unique dialogues with passengers. Discover what people talk about while stuck between Vladivostok and Japan.

name: Resonance Solstice
summary: Resonance is a unique real-time trading RPG that combines real-time card battles with train simulation. As a COLUMBA conductor, you'll travel the continent, rebuild and reconnect a fractured world.

name: Reply All
summary: A single-player roguelike deck builder, where email is turn-based combat. Use your cards to compose emails, create combos, and defeat the hordes of middle managers. Climb the corporate ranks by building your deck and strategically navigating your calendar to uncover the corporate conspiracies.

name: Red Moon
summary: The world is thrown into chaos when the moon suddenly turns red, causing its residents to turn into zombies.

name: RetroDrift: Retrowave Online Road
summary: Dive into the atmosphere of the 80's, rushing along the neon roads towards the sunset, letting your supercar drift, enjoying the wonderful tracks in retrowave style.

name: .Redrum
summary: .redruM is a psychological horror game blending realism and visual experimentation. Inspired by liminal spaces, backrooms, and real crime scenes, you play as a photographer uncovering the identity behind gruesome murders. .redruM is the red room where unshared photos are developed.

name: Reese’s Puffs x Ambush Breakfastverse
summary: Explore the future of breakfast in an immersive Reese’s Puffs and Ambush created universe. Collect Chrome Puffs as you travel through a space kitchen, milk world, and Chrome Throne inside the sacred mouth.

name: Red Comrades 3: Return of Alaska - Reloaded
summary: Red Comrades 3. Return of Alaska: Reloaded is a dark comedy, puzzle game.

name: Reactance
summary: Unleash hell with tons of epic upgrades in this “colorblind friendly” top-down shooter with plenty of challenge.

name: RealFlight Evolution: E-flite Carbon-Z Cub SS 2.1m
summary: The E-flite Carbon-Z Cub SS 2.1m makes it easier than ever to enjoy a truly unique and versatile giant-scale flying experience. Based on the original Carbon-Z Cub, it's equipped with an abundance of new convenience, capability and flight performance-improving features.

name: Revenge: Jane The Killer
summary:
Revenge: Jane The Killer is a sequel to Reunion: A Jeff The Killer Game.
After the events of Reunion, Liu went back home. What he doesn't realize is that there is still one more person to worry about.

name: Reef Light Conundrum
summary:
Reef Light Conundrum is a standalone realistic urban exploration simulation mixing themes of the paranormal & lovecraftian horror.
A 90s VHS Found Footage Urbex Sim horror with emphasis on atmosphere, unpredictability, realism and a non-linear design, focusing on the feeling of exploring a old haunted ship.

name: Real Soccer 2010
summary: Real Soccer 2010 is the seventh entry in Gameloft's annual series of mobile football games. Like with previous releases the game is played from an isometric bird's eye view. The gameplay works the same as before and has the same controls with the same moves being possible to do. This includes performing lobs, flip-flap tricks and one-two passing.

name: ReallyGoodBattle
summary: ReallyGoodBattle: Fast-Paced, Action-Arcade, Platform-Fighter with an early-Atari inspired minimalistic design. With 2 buttons and a joystick, defeat your foes (or friends) in a simple, yet satisfying way. Run along the walls and approach from all angles to land satisfying, one-hit-kills to win. With heavy emphasis on being accessible to all levels of skill yet maintaining its capacity to be played competitively.

name: Report: Stas
summary: Report: Stas is a prequel to the second part of the Report series. It will tell you a story, about a former Black Mesa security guard by the name of Stas. Events take place 2 hours before Gerald's arrival.

name: Report II
summary: continuation of Gerald's adventures only within city 19, but 20 years after stasis. New secrets, new acquaintances, new villains are waiting for you in the second part.

name: Reflection Link
summary: Locked inside a facility that erases memory, seven people must recover what they've forgotten to earn their freedom. Explore escape-room puzzles, piece together broken relationships, and uncover the truth behind the sins none of them remember committing in this branching path visual novel.

name: ReBlade: The Death Spiral
summary: You are a condemned Synthetic, marked for destruction and trapped in endless resets. In a cyberpunk world inspired by Chinese mythology, harness weapons, chips, and augments to cut through mechanical creatures. Each run brings you closer to breaking the cycle and unravelling the truth.

name: Realm of Chaos 2
summary: On October 31st, 1996, The Macintosh Team released Realm of Chaos, the first Mac-made megawad. Now, in a rare opportunity, 2 of the original mappers, Steve Duff and Rob Berkowitz, and his son, Leo Berahovich, along with a team of veterans and fans of RoC, have combined to create Realm of Chaos 2: The Revenge of '96! The style of this megawad is oldschool with occasional fashion-forward maps. The mix is eclectic, similar to the original RoC, with broadly defined episode themes. Difficulty ranges from mild to challenging, especially in the episode-ending maps.

name: Recycler's Terminal
summary: To be a recycler newly recruited, you have got your major assistent of recycle work, the Recycler's Terminal. Please use it to do your job, recycle resources, manufacture products, trade on the market, complete mission and so on.

name: Residiuum: Tales of Coral
summary:
Explore a universe rich in personality and full of mysteries.

After the sun went mad and exploded, all that was left of the world was the Auric Earth. A region divided between the Elite with their suited men and their experiments and technologies with the multi-purpose gas Sig, and the less fortunate who must deal with gangs of criminals of various kinds and a hostile environment full of toxic and poisonous substances.

name: Refactor
summary: Refactor is a light strategy tower defense game that tries to keep the core fun of the tower defense game as simple as possible, honing every detail of the rule design while making it a strategic and entertaining experience.

name: Red Nose Guy Gauntlet Inc.: The Burnout
summary: WHEN WORK DEVOURS YOU… FIGHT BACK! In Gauntlet Inc., Red Nose Guy falls into burnout: his office becomes a nightmare of killer printers, living files, and deadly deadlines. A frantic twin-stick shooter where every floor is a hell to escape… or destroy!

name: Rescue From Goblin Deep
summary: This is a dungeon-bashing storytelling puzzle-solving fantasy extravaganza, starring Jack Bedlam, a rogue of some renown, and his adventuring team - who have a habit of getting themselves into sticky situations.

name: RentPoly
summary: RentPoly is a roguelike city-builder board game. Build your own real estate empire, squeeze rent from tenants, and become a billionaire!

name: Rebel Moon
summary:
The game takes place in the middle of the twenty-first century as rebels of the Lunar Defense Force (LDF) prepare to wage a war of independence for the moon throughout twenty-some colonies settled there. For decades, the lunar colonists had felt oppressed as they began to hold less and less sway in trade policies and executive decisions carried out for them on the behalf of the Earth. Though their numbers and armaments small, the beleaguered lunar colonists had finally reached their breaking point, and declared themselves independent of the Earth.

The United Nations, who had assumed total power over the lunar colonies, was furious and desperate at the development. The lunar colonies were absolutely necessary to feeding of the citizens of Earth, and due to this the United Nations could not possibly stand to accept anything but total victory over the Lunar Defense Force. However the LDF does not plan to lose: To them, they are fighting for their homeland and plan to defend it at all costs. That is where you come in...

The game features many different styles of mission goals: objectives ranging from sabotage (where the player must find and destroy enemy infrastructure), seek-and-destroy (where the player and other LDF soldiers must eliminate an enemy stronghold), and even defense missions (where the player and an allotment of LDF soldiers must successfully defend a Rebel objective). Depending on the type of mission, the player will be allotted a specific number of LDF soldiers in reserve to back up the player's main force. Managing the numbers of those reserve soldiers could spell victory or disaster in some missions. The player has a large arsenal of futuristic weapons at his/her disposal, ranging from laser pistols to chain-fed rail-guns and plasma rifles.

name: Red Light
summary: Red Light is a retro-styled extraction shooter where you take a mission to raid an abandoned Soviet R&D Institute filled with mercenaries and living results of human experiments to solve the mystery of your disappeared brother.

name: Retro Classix 2in1 pack: Bad Dudes & Two Crude Dudes
summary:
BAD DUDES: "President Ronnie has been kidnapped by the ninjas. Are you a bad enough dude to rescue Ronnie?" The Bad Dudes must pursue the ninjas through the streets of New York City, a moving big rig truck, a large storm sewer and much more, in order to save President Ronnie.

TWO CRUDE DUDES: Play one of two hulking mercenaries hired by the American government to stop the 'Big Valley' terrorist organization. Take back control of post-apocalyptic New York City.

name: Realm Traveler
summary: Realm Traveler is an epic fantasy adventure game set in a world of boundless possibilities. You will take on the role of brave explorers, venturing through mysterious realms filled with magic, mythical creatures, and ancient secrets. Choose your hero, be it a powerful mage, a skilled warrior, or a cunning rogue. Complete quests, defeat formidable enemies, and uncover hidden treasures while shaping your own destiny.

name: Rei Galo TD
summary: Protect your kingdom in a game that combines Tower Defense and Action RPG. Build your perfect defense with towers, skills, hero, upgrades, and research to face 200+ different enemies. Evolve your hero, unlock new abilities, and expand your inventory to prepare for the greatest challenges!

name: Resident Evil
summary:
The Sega Saturn version, released in July 1997, added an unlockable battle mode in which the player must traverse through a series of rooms from the main game and eliminate all enemies within them with the weapons selected by the player.

It features two exclusive enemies not in the main game: a zombie version of Wesker and a gold-colored Tyrant. The player's performance in the battle mode is graded at the end. The game's backgrounds were touched up to include more detail in this version. The Japanese version is the most gore-laden of all the platforms; after decapitating a crawling zombie with a kick, the head remains on the floor, and Plant 42 can cut the character before the game over screen; though the live-action footage is censored in the U.S. version.

The Saturn version also features exclusive enemy monsters, such as a re-skinned breed of Hunters known as Ticks and a second Tyrant prior to the game's final battle in Chris's game. Exclusive outfits for Jill and Chris were added as well.

name: Redout
summary:
2560 AD: Humanity moved to Mars and some of Titan’s moons. The most followed and expensive sport is a high-speed racing class employing magnetic hoverships, the fastest humanity has ever engineered: a sport named Red:Out.
Red:Out is developed in Unreal 4. Controlling a nuclear-powered ship hovering about two meters from the ground going over 400 km/h is no piece of cake Now, imagine doing the same in a vicious curve upside down, or in a double loop-the-loop. Your ship will never race on rails. Each input will apply a physical force!

name: Resident Evil Village: Cloud Version
summary: Resident Evil Village is a first-person survival horror and the sequel to Resident Evil 7: Biohazard. The game maintains elements from previous Resident Evil games, with players having to scavenge environments for items and manage their resources. However, it adds more action-oriented gameplay, with higher enemy counts and a greater emphasis on combat.

name: Resident Evil 6: Survivors Mode
summary: Adds the Survivors game mode to the Extra Content menu of Resident Evil 6! It's a battle between agents, and only the last man standing can be the victor. This mode supports up to 6-players in individual deathmatch, or team battles!

name: Resident Evil Assault the Nightmare
summary: BIOHAZARD A.T.N. ASSAULT THE NIGHTMARE is a video game in the Resident Evil franchise. It was released in 2002 for NTT DoCoMo's 504 and 505 phones in Japan. It was sold as part of a subscription to 'Capcom Party' at ¥350 per month. Later, the game was adapted for western mobile phones as well. Following talks with European phone operators, Capcom released the game internationally in mid-2004 under the title, "Resident Evil Assault the Nightmare".

name: Resident Evil Village & Resident Evil 7 Complete Bundle
summary:
A bundle including the following content:

• Resident Evil 7 biohazard Gold Edition
• Resident Evil Village
• Resident Evil Re:Verse
• The Trauma Pack for Resident Evil Village

name: Re:Burn The Bonfire of Taiwan
summary: A classic Asian drama series is reborn in anime style, and you’re the director with power to guide the clash between rival families! Re:Burn The Bonfire of Taiwan puts you in control of the narrative, allowing you to guide the beloved characters to endings from the original show.

name: Reclaimers
summary: In this single-player roguelike, control an army of RECLAIMERS through a dangerous procedurally generated world. Recruit troops, collect resources, and craft upgrades to advance your army to fight orcs, trolls, and more monsters. Defeat enemies in battle & fight the Orc King!

name: Real Hentai Situation! 2
summary: When chronic daydreamer Tooru’s dastardly diary is discovered, classmates old and new won’t give him a moment’s peace! Featuring eye-popping art, intricate animations, and multiple moonstruck heroines, this ’20 Moe Game Awards-winning comedy VN also received its own hit anime adaptation.

name: Recycling Center Simulator: E-Waste DLC
summary: This DLC adds a new e-waste recycling chain, letting you turn discarded electronics into products like solar panels, batteries, and other electronics. It also adds two new maps-the Solar Plant and Electronics Junkyard-where you can collect materials for your recycling center.

name: Retronaut
summary: A rogue star pilot lost between galaxies—upgrade your ship, harness ancient artifacts, and survive relentless alien hordes in this cosmic action roguelite.

name: Remorses
summary: Learn terrifying witchcraft and investigate. Sanity? Open windows, or lose it.

name: Reality Noclip: The Backrooms
summary: A research organization has finally found your lost tape. With that tape, it is proven that you weren't missing because you got lost, you noclipped out of reality. You have to get out of this place, an infinite maze with little to no escape. How will you escape this reality noclip?

name: Revelation of Decay
summary: Zombies have taken over our homes! Pick up guns, organize a brave team, and fuck up those monsters! Farm land, scavenge a large apocalyptic world, and fight various of zombies! Modify your weapons, defeat scaring bosses, and finally uncover the truth behind the zombie outbreak and save our home!

name: Resident Evil 4: A Nightmare of Evil
Remember
summary: A PS1-style psychological horror game about memory, identity, and fear. Explore eerie environments, uncover disturbing truths, and try to remember what you've forgotten — before it's too late.

name: Rectifier: In Bloom
summary:
To the world of Aelyria, you are known as an Angel, but to you, you're "Rectifier".

Regardless of the terminology, your role is the same. Save humanity from itself.

You find yourselves in a party of 7 men, all with their sinful...quirks.

name: Rest in Paws
summary: Explore the touching story of Kebab, a rural cat, as she copes with grief following her passing from old age. Delve into her world and discover the story of her life, from her adoption by a loving family to the meaningful recollections that shaped her being.

name: Reloader: test_subject
summary:
Reloader: test_subject is an experimental "Bullet Counting Reload Action" game that features realistic gun control combined with movie-style cinematics. We were inspired by numerous classic shootouts from movies and the indie game called Receiver.
Experience being a Reloader: having legendary shooting skills and engaging in Close-Quarters Combat. You just have to remember how to use the gun you're holding.

name: Relaxe
summary: Help people to relax by axing their stressful thoughts.

name: Reanimation Inc.
summary: Reanimation inc is a completely realistic simulation - real urgent conditions and diseases, real protocols of care used in an ambulance, realistic simulation of the body! Do you like realistic games about medicine and simulators, games you need to think about? You 'll be happy!

name: Redemption Cemetery: Curse of the Raven
summary: Redemption Cemetery: Curse of the Raven is a hidden objects game.

name: Red Wings: Aces of the Sky
summary: Red Wings: Aces of the Sky is a dynamic action game that will show you amazing battles from the pages of the history in a brand new arcade gameplay style. Use your unique skills to take your opponents down, develop your deadly pilot aim and become the true ace of the sky.

name: Refraction
summary: Refraction is a third-person psychological horror experience where you awaken in a strange room, only to find yourself trapped in a haunting time loop, forced to witness a brutal murder replay itself over and over again.

name: Resurrection Core
summary: Resurrection Core is a fast paced, vertically scrolling shooter game. Destroy enemies and fearsome bosses, collect power-ups and resurrect enemy cores to increase your fire power. Game honors the arcade classics, but also adds unique, modern touch to the game-play mechanics.

name: Re:leap-future City and Futureless
summary: This is a text adventure game about time travel, developed and published by the Scorched Heaven Community. The total text volume of this work is approximately 250,000 words. It also includes more than 30 scenes. This work advances the story through mouse clicks.

name: Reverse 1999: Chronicles of Uluru: London Dawning
summary:
Version 2.3 of Reverse: 1999, which includes:
• New characters: Willow, Flutterpage, and Brimley
• New Garments for Lilya, Semmelweis, Tennant and John Titor
• New main event: Chronicles of Uluru: London Dawning
• New Anecdote for Mercuria
• New challenge mode: Reveries in the Rain
• …and more!

name: Relay
summary: A grounded, analogue sci-fi simulation about isolation, routine, and tuning signals.

name: Reverse 1999: Floor it! To the Golden City
summary:
Version 2.0 of Reverse: 1999, which includes:
• New characters: Mercuria, J, and Pioneer
• New Garments for Tooth Fairy, Getian, Kanjira, 6, Spathodea and Sputnik
• New main event: Floor it! To the Golden City
• New Anecdotes for Sotheby and La Source
• …and more!

name: Reverse 1999: Last Evenings on Earth
summary:
Version 2.4 of Reverse: 1999, which includes:
• New characters: Barcarola, and Fatutu
• New Garments for 6, Fatutu, Kakania, Ms. NewBabel, Necrologist, Mercuria and Mondlicht
• New main event: Last Evenings on Earth
• New Anecdote for Regulus
• …and more!

name: Reverse 1999: Notes on Shuori
summary:
Version 1.6 of Reverse: 1999, which includes:
• New characters: Jiu Niangzi, Getian, and Yenisei
• New Garments for A Knight, Druvis III, An-an Lee, Balloon Party and зима
• New main event: Notes on Shuori
• New Anecdotes for Alien T and зима
• …and more!

name: Reverse 1999: Vereinsamt
summary:
Version 1.9 of Reverse: 1999, which includes:
• New characters: Lucy, Kakania, Semmelweis, and Lorelei
• New Garments for Regulus, Voyager, Jessica, Desert Flannel, Sonetto, and Mesmer Jr.
• New main story chapter: Vereinsamt
• New Anecdotes for Semmelweis and Eagle
• …and more!

name: Reverse 1999: Journey to Mor Pankh
summary:
Version 1.3 of Reverse: 1999, which includes:
• New characters: Kaalaa Baunaa, Shamane, and Kanjira
• New Garments for Pickles, Tennant, Matilda, and Leilani
• New main event: Journey to Mor Pankh
• …and more!

name: Reverse 1999: The Haunted Highway
summary:
Version 2.1 of Reverse: 1999, which includes:
• New characters: Tuesday, Argus, and Barbara
• New Garments for Isolde, Ezra, Blonney and TTT
• New main event: The Haunted Highway
• New Anecdotes for Blonney and Diggers
• …and more!

name: Revolution: The Spark
summary: Fight back in Revolution: The Spark, a story-driven, turn-based tactical RPG. Gather your allies and explore 9 unique districts in the capital of a corrupt Empire whose citizens cry out for your help. Will the city erupt in violent revolution or can you find a way to keep the fragile peace?

name: Reng Azure Requiem
summary: Face the soul guardians in your quest for the 7 master keys in this pixel art Action RPG. Evolve your abilities and rely on the help of your protector raven to explore and fulfill this purpose in the grim world of Tartarius.

name: Reverse 1999: Farewell, Rayashki
summary:
Version 1.8 of Reverse: 1999, which includes:
• New characters: Vila, Windsong, and Avgust
• New Garments for Eternity, Medicine Pocket, Baby Blue, and Oliver Fog
• New main event: Farewell, Rayashki
• New Anecdotes for Eternity and Zeno
• …and more!

name: Relive
summary: Relive is a free sci-fi adventure game about CPR. Its main purpose is to increase the awareness about this topic and encourage people to take a CPR class and be prepared to intervene in case of need. Discover the story and challenge your friends in tournament mode!

name: Revenge of Drancon
summary:
Your girlfriend... She's gone! Kidnapped by the notorious King Drancon.
But this is no ordinary rescue mission. Because King Drancon is no ordinary adversary.
Enter the deepest of deep dark forests. And trek across the burning deserts of 10 different lands. Discover supplies that give you speed and strength. Then fend for yourself against nature's nastiest enemies - cobras, piranhas, bats, spiders and finally, King Drancon's lightning-speed fireballs.

name: Retro Grid
summary:
Retro Grid is a fast paced retro space shooter inspired from 80's arcade games.
It’s an endless arcade game with nostalgic graphic style and modern gameplay.

Shoot the invaders, avoid getting hit and travel as far as you can.
Master the one-touch controls and fight your way through enemies deep in the galaxy.

name: Revenant
summary: Created by a 16 year old game developer, Revenant has you trapped in Camp Hope, you have 7 days to uncover its dark secrets while avoiding the infected. Every night brings new threat, and every discovery brings you closer to the truth behind the second fall of man.

name: Rebound Rush
summary: Duel your friends in a life-sized pinball arena in a high-tension one-on-one sport! Parry a constantly accelerating ball and launch it into your opponent’s goal to win the match. But watch out — the commentator might have a trick or two to spice things up... Good luck!

name: Resident Evil 7 Gold Edition & Village Gold Edition
summary: A bundle containing Resident Evil 7: Biohazard - Gold Edition and Resident Evil Village: Gold Edition.

name: Restoring the Past: The Beauty of Porcelain 3
summary: Unlock 12 brand-new levels and repair these damaged porcelain wares.

name: Realm of Dread
summary: Take a step into the Realm of Dread's world of horror and suspense. Explore mysterious locations, fight for survival within the realm of supernatural entities and uncover the secrets hidden in the shadows. This journey through darkness requires courage and intellect. Are you ready?

name: Retro Glitch
summary: You just got yourself a nice retro game, The Demon Cycle, that you can't wait to try out. Uh oh, maybe it's a little bit damaged...

name: Reversion - The Return
summary: In this final chapter of the Reversion series, you must join the Resistance to defeat the evil Sergio. Buenos Aires is in ruins, but you have a chance to reverse history. Will you have what it takes to save your city before it's too late?

name: Realpolitiks: New Power
summary: New Power injects fresh content and realism into the world of Realpolitiks. A mini-scenario featuring an actual nuclear threat, Non-Governmental Organizations that try to influence politics and new features for creating larger territorial units are all highlights of this DLC.

name: Reverse Fishing
summary: Reverse Fishing is a rage game all about jumping your way back to the ocean as fast as possible!

name: RenewEd3D
summary: 3D Digital Game-Based Learning.

name: RedMoon
summary: RedMoon is a medieval fantasy idle RPG featuring an adorable hero growing under a crimson moon. Enjoy automatic battles, defeat bosses, collect resources, and upgrade equipment, all enhanced by charming 2D pixel graphics.

name: RedCat: De Woeste Woordenbrij
summary: Brutus stole the letters from RedCat during a spaceflight. In a chase by RedCat, Brutus crashes into a desert planet and RedCat scans the surface to find the letters again. Brutus, along with Max, works against him quite a bit in his attempts to collect the letters.

name: Re:Memento - White Shadow: When the Cadella Blooms Again
summary:
Version 1.4 of ReMemento - White Shadow has been released, which includes:
• New Nemonics (characters)
• New skins
• New main story quest: "When the Cadella Blooms Again"
• New limited-time events
• Shop renewal
• Global servers opened
• Supported languages added
• ...and more!

name: Real Car Parking: 2024 Authentic Simulation
summary: This game is a parking simulation type. You have a wide choice of supercars in your garage. There are many levels in the game that you pass in one breath. The realistic graphics give you the feeling of presence in the scene where the action takes place. Enjoy your time here.

name: Retro Classix 4in1 Pack: Sly Spy, Shootout, Wizard Fire & Super Real Darwin
summary:
SLY SPY: It is the year 199X, Secret Agent Sly must protect the U.S. from a nuclear missile attack from the terrorist organization CWD (Council for World Domination). Play an arcade classic!

SHOOTOUT: Stop the criminal gangsters and save the civilians in this action-packed shooter.

WIZARD FIRE: Wizard Fire a is classic multiplayer action RPG for one to two players. Originally released in 1992, and a noted classic arcade title from the 90s.

SUPER REAL DARWIN: The player takes control of a fighter ship capable of mutating into different shapes. The ship's appearance changes with upgrades as the player obtains weapons.

name: RememPair
summary: Remember the uncovered pictures and make identical pairs of 2, 3 or even 4

name: Red Bull: Soapbox Racers
summary: Racing game about a real Red Bull Event launched in 2009 for web browser.

name: Red Dead Redemption II: Ultimate Edition
summary:
Red Dead Redemption 2 also includes the shared living world of Red Dead Online – forge your own path as you battle lawmen, outlaw gangs and ferocious wild animals to build a life on the American frontier. Build a camp, ride solo or form a posse and explore everything from the snowy mountains in the North to the swamps of the South, from remote outposts to busy farms and bustling towns. Chase down bounties, hunt, fish and trade, search for exotic treasures, run your own underground Moonshine distillery, or become a Naturalist to learn the secrets of the animal kingdom and much more in a world of astounding depth and detail.

The Red Dead Redemption 2: Ultimate Edition delivers all of the Story Mode content from the Special Edition plus additional bonuses for Red Dead Online.

Exclusive Story Mode content includes:
• Bank Robbery Mission & Gang Hideout
• Dappled Black Thoroughbred
• Talisman & Medallion Gameplay Bonuses
• Gameplay Boosts, Cash Bonuses & Discounts
• The Nuevo Paraiso Gunslinger Outfit

Red Dead Online content includes:
• Bonus Outfits
• Rank Bonuses
• Black Chestnut Thoroughbred
• Free access to the Survivor Camp Theme

Plus get free access to Additional Weapons in both Story Mode and Red Dead Online.

name: Re: LieF ~Shin'ainaru Anata e~
summary:
Re:Lief ~ Shin'ainaru Anata he~ is a Japanese visual novel.
This is the sister title of the visual novel "Tryment - Ima wo Kaetai to Negau Anata he-", which shares the same world view and game characters. This title combines science fiction, suspense, friendship, love and other diversified themes.

name: Retro Rugby
summary: Step onto the pixelated pitch in Retro Rugby—a fast-paced 2D rugby game with smart AI, physics-based collisions, and smooth controls. Build your dream team in Career Mode, compete in global tournaments, and experience dynamic, strategic gameplay. Relive rugby's golden era—game on!

name: Redeemer: Enhanced Edition
summary:
Play as Vasily, an elite operative who once worked for one of the biggest arms industry corporations in the world. Officially working in security, you were tasked with infiltration, assassination, extortion and even torture. When eventually the corporation decided to get rid of you, you manage to narrowly escape to a secluded monastery deep in the snowy mountains.

For 20 years you tried to find peace and harmony amogst your fellow monks, but you are still too haunted by your murderous past to find either. Now after all of these years the corporation is finally closing-in on your location, and in so doing they have given you one last shot at redemption.

name: Red Dead Redemption: Game of the Year Edition
summary: Red Dead Redemption: Game of the Year Edition will include the full, original Red Dead Redemption game plus all free and paid downloadable content packs released to date, including the wildly popular Undead Nightmare single and multiplayer offerings, as well as all DLC originally released as pre-order content.

name: Reflections of the Void
summary: A sci-fi drama about love, control, and the price of human emotion. Care for your wards, follow every order — or break the rules to discover who you truly are.

name: Remyadry
summary: The denizens of Touhou Project in a Dungeon Crawling RPG! Gensoukyou is connected to 'a certain world' and a huge dungeon by the name of 'Mazes of the Week' appears. Create your own Touhou Characters, step up to the dungeon's challenges! An 'Authentic Style' RPG inspired by Touhou Project.

name: Relaxing Fishing
summary: A simple cozy game where you fish with friendly characters, upgrade, discover and decorate.

name: Relicta
summary: Relicta is a first-person physics-based puzzle game where you need to creatively combine magnetism and gravity in order to unravel the secrets of Chandra Base. Alone in the treacherous depths of the Moon, your scientific mind is the only thing that can keep your daughter alive...

name: Reaper Survivors
summary: Are you ready to defy the ravages of time and emerge as a true survivor?

name: Recordeca
summary: A revolutionary spin on the rhythm game formula. Each song is served to you on a record, where you'll have to hit the notes as they come around to you.

name: Regular Friday Night
summary:
Just a Regular Friday.... Right?

Boyfriend and Girlfriend need to make some money to buy more condoms, so they see a help wanted poster for a near by park and decide to take the job!!

But... things get a bit messy..

name: Resident Evil 2: Marvin's Mod
summary: Resident Evil 2 - Marvin's Mod (Desperate Times) is a brand new game mod which tells the story of Marvin Branagh before his final moments in Resident Evil 2.

name: Reign of Guilds
summary: Reign of Guilds is a classic MMORPG. Dark magical middle ages: open world, castle sieges, economy and diplomacy, merchant and craft associations, church and mercenaries, counts and of course the King. Choose your side.

name: RetroBlazer
summary: Take on the mantle of the Pyramid Guard, go up against the cybernetic Ark Legion, and rid the kingdom of a spectral blight. Combining the charm of Saturday Morning Cartoons and the bombastic action of late 90s shooters, RetroBlazer recaptures a golden era of frantic, fast-paced, first-person action.

name: Realms Road
summary: Realms Road includes turn-based RPG, rogue-like and adventure elements. Players will find themselves in crazy fights in various lands by choosing the right champion and party members. With deep character customization and a semi-automatic battle system, Realms Road awaits all adventurers.

name: Red Shark
summary: Red Shark is an Action game developed by G5 Software LLC and published by Buka Entertainment in 2002.

name: Rebirth: I Became the Emperor of America by Creating Toktik
summary: In my past life, I was a broke, repressed code monkey—laid off, heartbroken, a full-on loser. My life was a running joke. In this life, I started as a dishwasher, created FakeTok, ran for president, and rose to become the Emperor of America!

name: Red Faction
summary: Red Faction N-Gage is a 2003 port of the first Red Faction game to Nokia's N-Gage platform. The port was developed by John Romero and Tom Hall's Monkeystone Games studio. John Romero has stated that he didn't play Red Faction prior to developing the N-Gage port. Red Faction N-Gage has both a single player campaign, and a peer-to-peer multiplayer component for up to 2 players connected via Bluetooth.

name: Resident Evil 2: Leon Costume '98
summary: Change Leon S. Kennedy's appearance to his original 1998 low-polygon visual look for true nostalgia.

name: Revolvermen
summary: Revolvermen is a local PVP partygame where up to 4 players battle in the wild west. The goal is simple, get to high ground & shoot players below to climb the scoreboard. Aside from your standard revolver, you can also pick up different power-ups in the world to rain hellfire from above!

name: Rescue Team: Evil Genius
summary: As you complete dozens of nail-biting levels, you'll earn rewards that signify your standing as a true member of the Rescue Team!

name: Retrowave World
summary: Neon lights, palm trees, synthwave, chrome robot women, speeding 80s supercars... Welcome to Retrowave World!

name: Reptilian Rising
summary: The timeline and everyone in it is under siege! Confront the Reptilian Rising in this 80's tabletop-styled game of squad tactics. Bring retro miniatures to life on battlefields across time. Fight against The Ouroboros through seven time periods, recruit the best of humanity's heroes, and upgrade your favorites for the fight ahead.

name: Redout: Enhanced Edition
summary: Redout is a tribute to the old racing monsters such as F-Zero, WipeOut, Rollcage, and POD. It is designed to be an uncompromising, fast, tough and satisfying driving experience, soaked in that vertigo that stands at the core of the arcade racing genre.

name: Renai Kouhosei Starlight Scramble
summary:
Four years had passed since the NUN (Neo United Nations) unified the Earth's nation in 2120, and them the project of the pseudo-earth environment "One's Home" was started and led by Kirishima. Five years later, the first satellite town in the history of mankind, "Second One's Home" was completed. By this means, the human beings left a "cage" called the earth, and began to immigrate to the Second One's Home where they created a second home. The mother computer "Maxis", which controls the whole Second One's Home was completed in advance. Howerever, some control problems had been left which was solved two years later. Since then peaceful days have continued.

The incident happen as if the peaceful days were laughed at mockingly. The first incident was "anxiety". It was that "Kirishima", who as the leader of the "One's Home Project" dissappeared. The Second One's Home tried to hush up the incident, while the NUN side tried to intervene in it. However, the action ended in failure by some powerful people, and the incident of Kirishima's disappearence was concealed.

The second incident was "resistance". The affair of terrorism occurred at Universe Port "SUS". Since there is no statement for the offense, it was treated as in discriminate terrorism. However, the criminal's true character has not yet been captured...

The third incident was "fear". three planes for the second platoon of the NUN space force which belonged to the Second One's Home, encountered uncertificated Flying objects, and were shot down. This unknown object was called "Hughey". As a clue of this, the NUN Space Force intends to further build up it's forces. This incident might be a warning from space to human beings who left the "cage" called Earth.

Time passed, and in February, 2149, the past incident does not mean what it used to. The story starts at this Second One's Home, and it is an ordinary love story as if it can be seen from the Earth.

name: Return Null: Episode 2
summary: Episode 2 begins a few hours after the ending of Episode 1. Jack Drebin wakes up in the headquarters of the Dissonant Octave and discovers their plans to fight against the oppression of the Local Security Force. He joins the supposed terrorist group in their plot to undermine the rule of the LSF. In a final effort to exact revenge, Jack agrees to take part in one more mission to overthrow the oppressive forces that govern his world. And in joining the rebellion, he uncovers terrible truths which point to the exciting climax to be revealed in Episode 3.

name: Revenge of the Killer Octopus
summary: Revenge of the Killer Octopus is a third-octopus game where you shoot and possess your way through throes of enraged scientists in order to take your revenge!

name: Relaxing Lawnmower Simulator
summary: Sit back and relax while calmly mowing grass in a wide field near the ocean. Or, if you want a challenge, try to mow the residents lawn before they get annoyed at you...

name: Rewrite - DYH
summary:
In this unusual Visual Novel the player gets to control the mysterious Andrian who has the power to grant 3 Wishes. 
 
His mission is to achieve happiness for Jeff - a person that lost it all. 
 
Revealing different wishes and unlocking different clues will add the player more options for more endings

name: Rename the History
summary: Lead your country in one of the most difficult periods of post-war history. At this time, you will have to choose between the strong, or become a great power. To go west or east? It's up to you to decide.

name: Recoil
summary: Recoil is a 2D action couch competitive game, in which you can only move using the recoil of your own guns.

name: Retrowave Universe
summary: Let the Retrowave be with you!

name: Revenge Of The Colon
summary: Revenge of the colon is a story driven, single-player, atmospheric, body horror game with multiple endings. Perform colonoscopies on five patients and discover the horrors concealed deep within them. PS1 horror style!

name: Resident Evil 3: The Lord of the Necropolis
summary: Resident Evil 3 (1999) Overhaul MOD "The Lord of the Necropolis" is a major expansion of Classic RE3

name: Remedium
summary: The fast-paced twin-stick shooter game in the grim post-apocalyptic Renaissance setting. It had been more than a hundred years since the terrible plague devoured the whole Europe and turned almost everyone there in the maddened mutants.

name: Red Sails
summary: Explore the desert aboard your sailboat, rescue stranded people on your way, bring them home, while looking for other members of your waning clan: the Red Sails.

name: Re:Destiny
summary: This is a game that combines match-3 with light RPG elements, a GALGAME style of presentation with beautiful character. The story is strongly inspired by Japan mythology background and characters.

name: Reload
summary: 'Reload' is no ordinary game, but an interactive short film, shot within a semester and packaged into a playable experience in Unity. Decisions are time-based and made with one-click buttons. Each decision has a different impact and influences the outcome of the story.
