In this realistic mixture of simulation, management and RTS game you take part in exciting firefighting and rescue missions as the head of fire department, assemble your force and gradually develop your station. During complex missions where decisions over life and death are often made, you will get to know what it means to be a true hero of everyday life.

name: Re:Mobilize
summary:
Re:Mobilize is a brand-new single-player Quake modification by EmeraldTiger and Inky that introduces three new movement-based mechanics to the game, opening up devious new challenges to players and a whole new dimension of possibilities for level designers.
Trampolines: Perform death-defying leaps of faith across even the most intimidating gaps and chasms.
Wiremeshes: Nothing can stop you, not even gravity itself. More than just simple ladders, these surfaces let you move up, down, sideways, and even hang from ceilings.
Lighthooks and Lightpanels: The lighthook's purely photonic composition allows it to instantly latch onto any visible lightpanel, regardless of distance. You'll be hooked in no time - literally.

It tasks the player with controlling the bounds of the stage, rather than a character.
It's a stress-free, but engaging test of your reflexes and 3D thinking.

Due to the fact that the console was discontinued and its ZeeboNet connection system stopped working in 2011, it is impossible to purchase this video game, although the game still works on those consoles where the title was purchased at the time.

dribble the ball, dunk the ball in the basket.

For this, there will be new gameplay mechanics, and you'll have to choose carefully what you want to do, leaving room for dozens of outcomes. Not only your actions will affect the course of the story, but also the moment in which you do them, as there is an internal timer.

The racetracks span cheerful environments like forests and hillsides, designed to evoke a playful atmosphere. Gameplay options include Time Attack, Single Race, and Tournament modes. name: Rezerwowe Psy
summary:
A tactical strategy game similar in gameplay to Jagged Alliance. The player controls a contemporary team of mercenaries who are not only characterised by a set of skills or equipment, but also personal traits, what makes each of them a memorable individual.

The game content was intended to start a scandal. In addition to violence of close combat between cold blooded mercenaries, mobsters and corrupted policemen, expect vulgar language, adult themes (including prostitution or homosexual sex acts - that's how your team "blows off the steam", apart from taking drugs and drinking alcohol to excess). Game creators wanted to laugh up or at least parody everything: ranging from pop culture to church and politicians. No wonder the box screams "18 or older".

The game was packed in a military style stencilled wooden box.

name: Red Chaos: The Strict Order
summary: Red Chaos is a classic and modern real time strategy game. Red Chaos offers a variety of strategic aspects based on the strengths and weaknesses of individual units and ensures continuous equality of opportunity through a sophisticated balancing system.

name: Real-Gostop VR
summary: The VR Go-Stop game transcends a mere card game, transforming you into a time traveler through a portal. Based on the rules of traditional Korean Go-Stop, this game offers a new dimension of experience by blending tradition and modernity through cutting-edge virtual reality technology.

Relatle is a daily music game where, starting from a given music artist, the player must reach a different given artist by selecting artists related to the last one selected. Related artists come from the "Fans Also Like" data pulled from popular music streaming services.

Users can also create custom challenges, designating their own starting and endpoint artists.

name: Rescue the Enchanter
summary:
Continue the adventure of The Enchanted Books in this much longer point-and-click style puzzle adventure game. Search for the enchanter who has been trapped for years within the enchanted world of the last book you discovered! Find clues, solve puzzles, and uncover tools along the way needed to unlock and explore vast, exotic worlds and rescue the enchanter.

Uncle Henry has started to search for the enchanter within the book, but was unsuccessful so he is leaving this important task to you. He left clues in the enchanted world within the book to help you on your journey.

Your Uncle Henry has been renowned for discovering lost treasures for as long as you can remember. His legendary stories of adventure excited your imagination as you were a child growing up. Now with your newly acquired archeology skills, he has been reaching out from time to time for your help in tracking down some of these difficult to find treasures.

This captivating adventure game has:
- Custom designed beautiful HD graphics!
- Custom composed soundtrack and sound effects!
- A built-in hint system for when you are stumped
- A dynamic map to show the screens you have visited and current location
- A camera that takes photos of clues and symbols as you discover them
- Dozens of puzzles, clues, and items
- Auto saves your progress
- Available for phones and tablets!

Move as many pieces as you want at any given time, and the first player to capture the other player's ball as quickly as possible wins.
You can play against the best players in the country or battle with your friends.
This is the eSports of Shogi!

name: Retro Dust
summary:
Classic Arcade Asteroid shooting returns with a vengeance in this fast paced retro arcade shooter. Navigate and blast your way through the Meteor fields to survive.
Collect power ups to upgrade your lasers and collect special power ups to activate your super weapons including dual lasers, super lasers and 3-Way fire.

name: Red 7
summary:
Red7: The Official Digital (mobile) Version of A Cult Card Game
Don't follow the rules. Change them!
In Red7, there are no second places. You're the best or you lose. You win your round or it's game over, but it's not a game of chance. If you can't meet the winning criteria, you can change the rules and force your opponents to obey it. This simple twist makes Red7 as unpredictable and exciting as an action game, while preserving its deeply tactical essence.

name: Rev'd Up Racing

name: Reversilly

name: ReBoot

The story in the game is conveyed through the linear video: an original episode of ReBoot created just for the game and positioned as episode 0 of the TV series (i.e. a prequel).

name: Reactoid
summary: The latest breakthrough in nuclear power is broken. It's the network, of course. In the dazzling future of the late 1990's, the world's first fusion reactor is online: energy particles are shooting out of emission tubes toward the energy posts... and missing. As each one passes the posts and strikes another tube on the opposite side of the core, the reactor moves one step closer to meltdown. The reflectoid is there; that's the solid energy deflection device which bounces the particles into the posts. It's supposed be remotely controlled by a sophisticated network of computers, but tonight it has to be controlled by you!

name: Red Death: 8Feet
summary: You are one of the soldiers dispatched. Sadly, all your squad members have been wiped out, and you alone have been isolated in the dark, Zombies-ridden mountains. However, complete and report your mission for the peace of your proud homeland and the world! Good luck!

name: RealFlight Evolution: Tower Hobbies ASW-28

name: Repurpose
summary:
You and several others have passed away.

Rather than being sent to Heaven or Hell, the powers that may be are unable to decide where you should go. You wake up in the Garden of Eden who's new home has been made in Limbo. You have three options: either take the trials to earn your place in Heaven, live it up in Hell, or remain lost in Limbo for eternity.

It's a lot to take in fresh off your death bed... but maybe you find each other's peace along the way.

name: Reach Charon
summary:
Your ship has made an emergency landing at the Charon base, and you have fainted from the crash. When you wake up, your pilot is dead, and no one is answering the radio. Luckily, you've brought your trusty shotgun with you on the ship.
Reach Charon is an MBF21 map that will test your nerves. An adventure in a forgotten and abandoned base in the most remote area of the solar system, where no one can help you.

name: Reggie Jackson Baseball

It's so real you'll be grabbing for the hotdogs as you hammer 'em out of the ball park! Play against the computer or with a friend. Take your pick of twenty-six American or National City teams. You can choose a mini two-out-of-three tournament, go for the Series or test your batting skills in the Home Run contest. Reggie Jackson Baseball gives you the power to select your pitchers and pitches, to bat high and low, to lead off or try to steal your way around the bases. Is there a man leading off on second? fake a pitch and catch him off base. Move fast and snatch a ground ball from the infield for a double play! When the game is over, you'll get tips from Reggie himself. Go far enough and win the Series! It's baseball action like you've never seen before, only from Sega.

Soon they are attacked by hordes of locals infected by an improved version of the "las plagas" parasite seen in Resident Evil 4, which they call "majini". As the story progresses, Chris discovers that some old fellows are behind the whole incident.

Classic reversi game with excellent color graphics and animation.

It works on both color and grayscale devices including Sony Clie and newest PalmOS 5.0 devices.

This game is shareware product. You may run it up to 10 times, then you have to register the game or delete it from your PDA.

A playable demo is available for the game. Please visit our website for higher quality videos and more in-depth information.

The game requires precise timing and quick thinking to navigate through various traps and hazards, ultimately aiming to save the world. Expect to face numerous deaths, but the quick retry feature allows for immediate attempts. Visually, Reed adopts a cute and nostalgic 16-bit pixelated art style, with detailed environments and dynamic lighting effects. The color palette predominantly consists of muted, earthy tones complemented by occasional bright contrasts. The character sprites are charming, while the game's typeface adds to its unique style. Smooth animations and an ambient soundtrack contribute to the immersive gameplay experience across different devices.

- From the testimonies of your visitors, discover the pillars of dictatorship.

Start off as a sperm cell, and play through a series of integrated mini-games that change the course of your life. There are 29 different endings!

name: Re: Zero -Life in Another World in VR

name: ReThink | Evolved 2

ReThink | Evolved 2 is a Puzzle Game in a futuristic setting.
Solve a variety of Puzzles that utilize Lasers and the behavior of light in two and three-dimensional space.
Created with the Feedback from its predecessor in mind, ReThink | Evolved 2 features: 40 new Puzzles, enhanced Gameplay...

name: Reel Deal Slots: Treasures of the Far East

The PSP version retains the beautiful views of lakes, streams, waterfalls and rivers, with natural time-of-day changes in the environment. Drop line for utilizing an extensive variety of lures, tackle and other implements (over 150 tacklebox items) to hook any of 22 varieties of fish.

name: ReBoot
summary: The game combines modern 3D-graphics and old school gameplay.Forget about peaceful aiming and a sense of superiority over your enemies.

name: Redactle

Type in words to reveal them on the page. Figure out the article title to win. New puzzle daily at 11:00 am CDT (16:00 UTC).

name: Rescue the Great Demon 2
summary: Sino was controlled by human. Human made the rules, and annihilated every race that opposed them. Every race on this continent became slaves, except human.Demons had been enslaved for 80 years since their leader, the Great Demon was captured. This is where our story begins.

name: RedNeck Bowl Games
summary: Bowling Game without the bowling Ball

- Collector's Box

name: Reach: SOS
summary:
Enter the world of Reach, a puzzle adventure game about communication and isolation.

Help a lonely Shadow go out into the world and find the person sending them cryptic messages.

As they leave their trusty outpost, you must guide Shadow through each room.

Solve intriguing puzzles and decode cryptic messages to finally discover who the Other is and what they want.

~~~~

TILT your device to solve puzzles in unique ways

EXPLORE a world of communication outposts seemingly abandoned by all but Shadow.

SOLVE the challenging puzzles that bar your way. Use your wits to find your way through.

DISCOVER who the Other is and why Shadow knows them.

name: Recursive Hate: Spider Hell
summary: Try to survive in Spider Hell. Fight with big, realistic and terrifying spiders and versus swarms with literally thousands of spiders.

name: Reflect-on

name: Red Trees

In a small town encircled by trees, mysterious events are unfolding. Pet rabbits are going missing, people have been injured, and the townsfolk are whispering about something lurking in the woods... Since none of the adults want to do anything about this, it's going to be up to you to get to the bottom of it.

Before you can do that, however, simply getting into the woods might be a problem.

name: Red Bull Pac-Man
summary:
Red Bull Pac-Man is a game released in 2018 to advertise Red Bull energy drinks. It is a modified version of Pac-Man which featured new mazes and power-ups.

The game was released as an arcade machine, which was distributed in gas stations and department stores. It was also available as a downloadable pack for the iOS and Android version of Pac-Man, accessed via a code which was on actual Red Bull cans.

name: Reksio i Kapitan Nemo
summary: The last part of the first series of the Rex's Adventures. The heroes have fixed the story, but instead of going home, they ended up in the 19th century, where their time machine was destroyed by a train. They must now find some way to get back home.

name: Returner 77
summary: Returner 77 is a mystery sci-fi puzzler. You wake up inside an alien spaceship with no memory of what happened or how you got there. With help from Colonel Ling, you find that you are one of only two survivors from 77 people who were sent into space to be spared from a devastating war on planet Earth. You were given one mission - to return when the planet is livable again and rebuild the human race.

name: Re-wind 2006
summary: Re-wind 2006 is a Game Wave game

name: Reel Deal Casino: Gold Rush
summary: An entry in the Reel Deal Casino series.

name: Record Run
summary: Record Run is a free rhythm-runner that puts you in the middle of your music, chasing records and dodging obstacles to the beat in a crazy musical world. With gameplay levels created to play along with your music, this is a whole new way to run!

name: Reviver
summary: Reviver is an adventure puzzle platformer game for two players, telling about mad scientist, parallel universes and the salvation of all things.

name: Recreational Warfare
summary: RecWar is an action game where the main goal is to destroy as many vehicles as possible. To do this you have several weapons and unlimited ammo at your disposal. You can play over a network, splitscreen against your friends or just kill computer opponents. RecWar also includes team game and Capture the Flag play modes. The flag isn't just any flag though...

name: Reiner Knizia Yellow & Yangtze
summary:
Lead your dynasty to victory in the Warring States period of ancient China in the new digital adaptation of the acclaimed board game from Tigris & Euphrates designer Reiner Knizia. Build & Conquer.
Conflict is inevitable as your influence expands. Wage war upon neighboring states to slow their growth, and build spectacular pagodas to increase your own prestige. How will your reign be remembered?

name: Reel Fishing Challenge
summary: Reel Fishing Challenge offers a fun and challenging experience for all players.

name: RealFlight Evolution: Triple Tree Float Flight Line
summary: Fly your model aircraft from the dock or the water at the premier floatplane site at Triple Tree Aerodrome in Woodruff, SC.

name: Relieve
summary: Stories about people who stucked between life and death, in the middle-world called "World of Agony". Help them escape and try to relieve fate of those who left there forever.

name: Researcher
summary: "Researcher" is a classic 2d platformer, your goal is to collect gold coins on the level after passing all the obstacles. Coins are scattered absolutely everywhere, so you need to carefully inspect the levels. Use trampolines to jump high. Push off the walls to climb higher. Beware of the traps on your way! For example, it is not recommended to fall on sharp rocks. It is also possible to be crushed by a moving platform.

name: Red Heat
summary: You play the part of Ivan Danko(Arnold Schwarzenegger) who chases Viktor Rostavili through the four different levels that make up the game.

name: Resident Evil 4: The Mercenaries - Separate Ways Update
summary:
A free update for The Mercenaries mode released alongside the Separate Ways expansion that added 4 new characters and the Docks stage, unlocked after beating the Island stage once.

Ada Wong is available by default while Albert Wesker is unlocked with an A rank on any stage using Ada. The update also added 2 variant characters with Leon (Pinstripe) and Ada (Dress) unlocked with an S rank or higher on all stages using their base character.

name: Regal Tails
summary: With stunning artwork and music, get lost in a world of pure furry fantasy!

name: Reelect JFK
summary: Take control of JFK in an alternate history where he survives to finish out his term. Handle civil rights, Vietnam, and the men behind his botched assassination attempt, while spearheading his '64 re-election campaign.

name: Rescue Raider
summary: You pilot an armed vehicle that is trying to gather secret plans. These plans will reveal what an area of your map is hiding. You can also take hostages, gather fuel and better weapons. You seem to have unlimited lives but limited fuel. If you run out of fuel you can by more with a quarter.

name: Revival Quest
summary: To save their hometown from being shutdown, Ravilla and Tyris must do everything in their power to revive the town's once thriving mine and revive Elsinki to its former glory. Another classic RPG from developer ShiroKuroSoft!

name: Red Storm Rising
summary: Red Storm Rising is a simulation video game based on Tom Clancy's novel Red Storm Rising and released in 1988 by MicroProse. The player is put in charge of an American SSN submarine in the Norwegian Sea Theater with the overall role of a hunter killer performing various missions in the context of the global conflict described in the book representing a campaign. Its original Commodore 64 version was co-designed and co-programmed by the legendary game designer Sid Meier.

name: Red Number: Prologue
summary: You have to survive on Mars as a simple technique of John, he will have to fight with dangerous enemies, find other survivors and learn that the accident occurred in the colony "a New Dawn".

name: Revolve A
summary:
Revolve A is a fast-paced one-button game.

You control an arrow that is constantly moving and spinning around. Press a button to move in the direction which the arrow is currently facing. Enemies randomly appear from the sides of the screen and generate links between themselves. By crossing any of the links you score points and destroy all the network of this link.

The game is over when you hit any of the enemies.

name: Red Alert
summary: Defend six cities against attacking enemies. Assault waves consist of planes, helicopters, night bombers, and MIRV bombs.

name: Realm of Valor
summary: A mobile DOTA-like game that can be played on both iOS and Android.

name: Resta um
summary: A peg solitaire game released in some Master System consoles and plug & plays by Tec Toy.

name: Reaktron
summary: Reaktron is a snake game. Minimalist. Fast-paced. Multiplayer. Online. Couch. Powerups. Everything! Play it online with up to 12 local or remote players using keyboards, gamepads or even your smartphone. Can you master the challenging gameplay with its simple 3-button-controls?

name: Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny
summary:
An epic RPG based on the popular German paper & pencil series, "Das Schwarze Auge" (The Dark Eye). Games that draw you in so deeply that the hours slip by like minutes.
The atmospheric old-school feel, interesting game system and character development are fun, but the real strength of this games lies in their cool dungeons, which are chock full of tricks, traps, puzzles, and side events to keep you occupied for a long, long time.

Fantasy... made fun.

Thoughtful design and careful attention have produced a game that is just that... fun. A rich and detailed adventure to involve your mind, a true quest to challenge your imagination. Careful balancing and smooth game play make sure your time is spent playing. Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny is your answer to Fantasy Role-Playing.

More of what you buy a computer game for...

The proud Thorwalians of Arkania's Northern Reaches face a dismal future. Rumors abound of a waiting army, banded together under one powerful Orc chieftain, standing ready to lay waste to Arkania's towns and villages. All hope of survival rests on your ability to discover the whereabouts of a legendary artifact thought lost with its wielder in the midst of Orcish territory. Can this renowned sword, the Blade of Destiny, stop the siege?

name: Recca no Honoo: Flame of Recca - Final Burning
summary: A PlayStation 2 game based on the Flame of Recca anime.

name: Replanet
summary: Replanet is a little game about an alien whose mission is to repair the damage we have done to our planet. He must put an end to all pollution and make our planet colorful again!

name: Reversed Rebecca
summary: The RPG game where your choices really matter! Find tools, solve puzzles, go back in time and reverse causality! But beware of the consequences...

name: Recycling Center Simulator
summary: Step into 'Recycling Center Simulator,' a first-person job simulator where you spearhead a recycling operation. Navigate through neighborhoods, workshops, and factories, collecting and sorting a wide variety of materials. Transform waste into wealth by recycling and manufacturing products.

name: Remember Christmas
summary: Celebrate the holiday season with Remember Christmas, a festive card-matching memory game perfect for all ages! Flip cards to reveal delightful Christmas-themed icons like snowmen, candy canes, and Santa himself, while testing your memory across increasing levels of fun and challenge. With cheerful visuals, cozy music, and endless holiday spirit, it’s the perfect way to make your gaming season merry and bright!

name: Resourcer
summary: Dig deep into diverse biomes, uncover ancient treasures and mine various resources. Craft new tools and build various production structures. Improve your character’s skills and unlock new features as you progress through the game. Manage the resources and create an efficient production chain.

name: Rescuing Ralph
summary: Escape room type game where you rescue a person locked away from a mysterious dungeon.

name: Redux: Dark Matters
summary: Redux: Dark Matters is a fast-paced space shooting game with fresh scoring elements - a bastard-hard shooter and definitely a must have for every shmup fan!

name: Real Estate Tycoon
summary: "Real Estate Tycoon" is a simulated business role-playing game with urban theme. We try to restore the game world like a novel of urban face slapping, and give the players a "capitalist" identity.

name: Restaurant Empire II
summary: The sequel to the widely popular Restaurant Empire game takes you further into the depths and delights of the culinary universe than ever before. Take part in an exciting world where the customers are fickle and the bounty in your cash register changes as quickly as their tastes. With two handfuls of cash and a dream of stamping a legacy, build, cook and hire your way to the very top of the gastronomic biz, where tasty food is king and smart management reels in the cash. And if you're lucky, you just may go further than any other before you and cement your status as a true legend of cuisine...

name: Rescue Love Revenge
summary: An Episodic Retro Indie Three-Act Spaghetti Western Platformer

name: Revolver and Co
summary: It's 2038, and a late maniacal inventor has left behind a legacy of madness - coordinates to an island full of wealthy robots, a gun that asks questions, and a widow that's hired you to answer them. As Izzy Buspec, the newest recruit to Randco, take charge of their patented revolver as you explore the densely packed biomes of Corvynnia, bringing down hordes of docile robots in a money-making adventure. Every time you fire, you'll have to answer one of over 2,000 trivia questions with answers based on numbers, percentages, geography, dates, and more - the further you are from the actual answer, the more of its own ammunition the revolver will discharge. If you run out, it's back to Randco HQ to reload! Revolver and Co features 105 story levels across 7 unique worlds and 12 question themes which will test you on a wide range of subjects, tied together with humorous debriefings between Izzy and her maniacal boss before the start of each mission. Or if you're looking for more of a challenge, have a go at one of the Endless challenges, which pits you against a barrage of questions until you finally succumb to an empty revolver chamber. You can even unlock more Endless challenges by completing the story levels, including a gruelling hour-long session where the only thing you have to lose is time.

name: Renai X Royale: Love's a Battle
summary: I, transfer student Hanamaru Mari, love you, Komachi Hiro-kun! Please go out with me! Our protag, Komachi Hirotaka. Every day, he goes through the motions-- dodging his cunning underclassman's advances, accidentally hitting on the student council president, and chasing idols.

name: Reality Clash: AR Combat Game
summary:
Reality Clash is a free-to-play augmented reality combat game available on iOS and Android. 
 
Players challenge bots or other players and then enter a virtual battlefield by physically stepping into an augmented reality Portal. Winning these battles will unlock rewards which can be used to unlock and build better weaponry. 
 
Inside the virtual battlefield (also known as 'The Sim') player movement and height is tracked, so if a player crouches down - their in-game Avatar will crouch. This provides a unique kind of FPS mobile gameplay as players must move around and use the virtual environment to their advantage. 
 
Players can also improve their skills in a variety of training modes.

name: Red Carpet Diaries: Book 3
summary: Red Carpet Diaries, Book 3 is the third and final book of the Red Carpet Diaries series. It succeeds its first two books, Red Carpet Diaries, Book 1 and Red Carpet Diaries, Book 2.

name: RecNaviClub
summary: 9 kinds of games are included in the package. What was developed for prevention and recreation. There is a variety of games lined up for brain training, physical exercise, learning, and cognitive function testing.

name: Remaya Idle
summary: Click to destroy your targets, or stay AFK and let the Archer destroy them for you. Loot potions to increase your damage. Equip rare gear to improve your stats. Farm epic books and use them on your items to modify them. Also, can you reach End Game to invade legendary dungeons?

name: Relic
summary: Relic, a set of 4 adventurous maps with devious traps in a jungle setting. There's also a fifth thank you map at the end. Difficulties are implemented; UV is pretty nasty so unless you want that kind of heat, give HMP a go!

name: Redrum: Time Lies
summary: The twisted and evil Dr. Sigmund Fraud has been released from the asylum, and is up to his old tricks. Help Detective Ravenwood track him down and end his terrible crimes in Redrum – Time Lies. Dive into this Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game and free the souls of Dr. Fraud's victims from their nightmares.

name: Reydllom
summary:
A dark search for an evil witch begins.
Can you survive?

name: Resident Evil RPG
summary:
Resident Evil RPG is a fangame based on the original Resident Evil (the one released for PlayStation, Saturn and PC), which also includes certain elements from Resident Evil Rebirth (Gamecube).

Resident Evil RPG was developed in RPG Maker XP by Evilbiel and co-produced by Dungeon Master and follows the story of a police team, S.T.A.R.S, who go to investigate a sinister mansion where there have been macabre reports of murders.

The game has extra unlockable modes with new adventures (some fake), with a storyline behind the main one! The project came from the idea of playing Resident Evil from a new perspective, in 2D, but far surpassing Resident Evil Gaiden, from the Game Boy Color!

name: Re: Summon
summary: Form Contracts with monsters and become The Paragon Summoner!

name: Reflec Beat Limelight
summary: REFLEC BEAT LIMELIGHT is the first addition to the REFLEC BEAT series by Konami. It uses a touchscreen and focuses on head-to-head multiplayer gameplay that combines elements of classic Pong with rhythmic tapping.

name: Re: Imagine the character
summary: A game about our imagination

name: Revival of Love
summary: Revival of Love is a nonviolent, musical, low poly, open world, action-adventure game about young saxophonist, Adolphine, who sets off on a journey to heal an island which has sunken in darkness.

name: Resistance 2: Collector's Edition
summary:
It's 1953. The Chimera have invaded America. Entire U.S. states lie in smoking ruins. Chicago and San Francisco are overrun. Mankind's fate once again rests in the hands of Army Lt. Nathan Hale – an infected soldier who is becoming the enemy he despises.

Resistance 2 Collector’s Edition includes:
- Exclusive 5 ½" Chimera Hybrid action figure with Bullseye weapon.
- Double-sided Resistance art book covering a war-torn America from two unique perspectives.
- Bonus DVD including: Behind The Scenes video, Exclusive video commentary by Insomniac Games, "Twisted History" chronology video, Sneak peek at the upcoming Resistance novel, "Resistance: The Gathering Storm", Exclusive in-game HVAP Wraith multiplayer skin and more.
-Resistance 2 video game

name: Reel Deal Card Games
summary: A card game based gambling simulation.

name: Return to Castle Wolfenstein: Time Gate
summary:
Our hero is a scientist, archeologist finds himself in an ancient undergrount caverns and tonnels built hundreds years ago. once this place was discovered by nazis but their expedition failed. Fighting through the dark corridors full of zombies, our hero finds an unique artifact - the time gate. using it, he teleports to 1945. germany collapses, the panic is everywhere.

The great luck is that artifact teleported our hero into the house basement. yet, resident of this house is a nazy scientist who works under the secret project of the third reich - retribution.

It turns out that there are two such gates and they're working in a pair. but nazi scientists found only one portal and they moved it into the secret laboratory placed in the ancient castle. If scientists would activate these gates then nazis would be able to change history turn on the planet.

Met scientist, in a hope to safe himself from the soviet army attack and find refuge on an allies territory offers some help in breaking that secret lab to our hero. for him its only chance to return back to his time. but from the other side, by activating time gate he'd put the world on a verge of disaster. so, his objective is to break into the lab, mine the time gate and have time using it to return back.

name: Red Echo
summary: In this Sci-Fi SinglePlayer RPG set on Mars in the near future workers aren’t born, they are made. Precious is the Perfect Worker. Hidden in her DNA is a secret the Corporations will not let go. Join Precious as the groundswell of rebels fight back against greedy corporations. Help set Mars' fate.

name: Rencia
summary: Rencia is an easy to learn action RTS game. Build your base, set an attack flag for your army, then join the battle as a top down shooter hero!

name: Reflexity: Pinball Challenge
summary: Reflexity: Pinball Challenge is a pinball game developed by Hitech Studio Designs and published by Computec Verlag GmbH & Co. KG in 1992.

name: Recolit
summary: Recolit is a pixel art mystery adventure game where you explore a strange town by following the trails of "light". Help out the mysterious residents of the town by using items illuminated by the "light" to progress through the story.

name: Redemption Cemetery: At Death's Door Hidden
Resetail
summary: In this 2D platformer you have to watch out for spikes, obstacles and enemies and make the right moves to find the key to the right door!

name: Reroll
summary: In this 3rd entry of the Infinite Cross series of games, we tell a story about Justice. Play as an amnesic girl, gathering her friends, figuring out what's going on, and ultimately give this story a proper ending.

name: Retro One
summary: Retro One is an XNA community game

name: Retro Fever
summary: This 2014 game for the Apple II tasks the player with collecting and refurbishing Apple II computers.

name: Relax It's Aqua
summary: Relax It's Aqua is an underwater hidden objects finding atmospheric experience. Each scene will be set in a different aquatic environment.

name: Remote Racers
summary: Select one of eight vehicles: Speeder, Monster, Candy, Dozer, Tank, Stunt, Mantis and Rocket.

name: Regular Show: Paint War
summary: Embark on a real Paintball war with Mordecai and Rigby characters from Regular Show. Choose your favorite character and complete different missions around the map to win the war against the enemy. Use the coins you earn to buy new equipment!

name: Re:Choice
summary:
"I told you, with you, we can start over!"
Choices that weren't available in the first playthrough become unlocked in the second. A time-loop adventure RPG where the story branches from the very beginning, depending on your decisions.

name: Red Sea
summary: Red Sea is an intense Real-time Tactics game where you control a small team of vigilantes in increasingly challenging battles. It features a Scriptable Tactics system that mixes auto-battling with manual overrides and has a ton of powerful ability interactions to discover.

name: Rendering Ranger: R2
summary:
Rendering Ranger R2 is an action game developed by Rainbow Arts and published by Virgin Interactive in 1995 for the Super Famicom in Japan only. The game was slated to be released in western territories under the name Targa, but this version ended cancelled due to Rainbow Arts being unable to secure a publisher at the time. The game was created by Manfred Trenz, utilizing pre-rendered graphics.

Players control the titular Rendering Ranger, a special forces soldier tasked with defending the Earth and its remaining inhabitants from a devastating alien invasion. A high score screen is present and there are many different types of laser guns to acquire throughout the post-apocalyptic adventure. The player can choose from three to seven lives. However, there are no continues so practice is essential to winning the game. The player can take five hits before losing a life but pits automatically make him lose a life. Weapons are found in floating orbs, and each color holds a different kind of gun.

name: Redemption: Wrath of Sin
summary: Immerse yourself in a chilling world of Horror. Solving intricate puzzles. Experience heart-pounding moments, where you must rely on your wits to survive. Collect clues to unravel the dark secrets hidden within. Use the intuitive inventory system to manage your resources, to survive this nightmare.

name: Reader Rabbit: Thinking Adventures Ages 4-6
summary: Reader Rabbit and his friends need your help to throw a surprise birthday party for Sam the Lion. There are plenty of fun things to do, from making cookies to practicing party games. And the fun and learning doesn't stop when you leave the computer. Make customized workbooks and printable activities to take with you in the car or on the bus. Progress reports will help you keep track of which skills you've mastered or are in need of improvement. Children can learn at their own pace with Reader Rabbit's ADAPT Learning Technology. It constantly monitors the child's abilities, helps develop skills, adjusts difficulty levels, provides help, and tracks progress.

name: Return to Dark Castle
summary: The third installment of this classic Mac series.

name: Retro Rollers Bundle
summary:
This bundle includes all the "hedge-like" games from developer Spicy Gyro Games:
Panic Porcupine and Polyroll!

name: Reflex King of Elements
summary: Reflex King of Elements is a one player game also 2D-platformer game with 10 of the hardest levels! It has 6 strong enemies you have to fight throughout the game with traps in different variations! This game come with its own health bar, stamina bar, fire blast count and money count with no time!

name: Redneck Racers
summary: Welcome to Pimperstown - a small village miles away from big cities and modern civilization. But it doesn't mean that people here don't have fun. To keep the citizens from turning to grumpy old men, the mayor organized big tractor races. And to make the races more entertaining he spreaded some of his so called regional products all over the tracks. Farmers from neighbouring villages and farms came on their shining machines to participate in the event. And you are one of them. Keep wining the races and soon your fame will reach other countries and you'll be able to buy new tractors to keep up with growing competition. And in the end, you'll end up entering world's best farmer competition in USA.

name: RealBX VR
summary:
A. HMD-based virtual reality (VR) game following recent trends 
B. Play with realistic weapons verified by the actual weapons in real world  
C. Get away from the simple shooting with sensor and maximizes your enjoyment by strategic play with your whole body

name: Remote Planets
summary:
A journey through a vibrant alien world filled with unique box-pushing puzzles.

Explore the open world, solve logic challenges using unique mechanics and help the friendly cast of villagers restore power to their home. Reshape the level space with the help of mysterious alien technology.

name: Redemption Cemetery: Salvation of the Lost - Collector's Edition
summary: Escape from a mystical cemetery!

name: Red Lands
summary: Prepare for a voyage through the wild and colorful countries of the Red Lands. Build new railroads and towns across forests and ruins. Classic RPG with elements of city builder genre.

name: Return to the Skyway
summary: Traverse through a fantastical island and utilize the local fauna to destroy obstacles. In this 2D platform, the player controls a character that has crash landed on a tropical island. Complete puzzles utilizing the creatures' unique abilities in order to fix their ship and return to the Skyway!

name: Refuted Wind
summary: This is an atmospheric adventure that will immerse you in a mysterious story. During the game, you will visit many unique places, each of which evokes a feeling of fear and anxiety.

name: Retro Racing City
summary: Retro Racing City is a simulator game of driving in a "retro style" environment, very relaxing and entertaining.

name: Reanimated
summary: Two levels set in a nukage base. The idea was to make two small speedmaps using some Linkin Park MIDIs that we downloaded as the music.

name: Real Drift
summary: Climb aboard your car and become the drift king! Take control of the tracks and tame the asphalt!

name: Recipiente
summary: It is a game that challenges the player's memory and quick decision making, using a scheme of colors and shapes in which the solution is to stay focused and have sharp reflexes in a spatial atmosphere that can be used to your advantage depending on its agility.

name: Reverse Module
summary: An Action RPG about Utopia/Dystopia balance that aims to present some interesting concepts. The aim of the game is to make the player think and pose some ethical dillemas about how an actual Utopia could be achieved. It's dedicated to my lost niece and my family who have supported me so much.

name: Reggie, His Cousin, Two Scientists and Most Likely the End of the World
summary: Control the direction of gravity as you run, jump and explore in an outrageous time-traveling adventure as Reggie, an unlikely hero from the 16,000th century on a mission to save science and ultimately the entire universe!

name: Red Bull Doodle Art - Global VR Gallery
summary:
Where does the mind take you?

In June 2017 the best doodlers from around the world were invited for the global finals of Red Bull Doodle Art, in San Francisco, where they could take doodling to the next dimension, literally.

The resulting VR artworks were combined into the Global VR Gallery.

name: Reverse Side
summary: An extraterrestrial spacecraft was discovered during the last manned mission to the moon in 1972. Although all information regarding this was classified, the USSR discovered it and in 1976 organized an expedition to explore the wreckage. 2 years later regular flights to the moon had become common and the scientific research center Orbit was built but this information remained classified.

name: Revenge of the Ninja
summary: The game tells the story of a skilled and daring teenage ninja named Hayate, infiltrating an evil castle in an attempt to rescue a princess he loves. Hayate must survive a collection of deathtraps and defeat a variety of mythological creatures and other adversaries on his quest to save the princess and destroy the castle.

name: Red Magic
summary: This is a unique puzzle game, once played, you will definitely be impressed and fall in love with this game.

name: Redemption Cemetery: The Island of the Lost - Collector's Edition
summary: You crash-land on an island populated by ghosts. Like them, are you trapped here forever?

name: Red Oddities
summary: Red Oddities is a Five Nights at Freddy's fangame, a point and click horror game. Created by the Radiance Team, the game was intended to be a joke and not to be taken seriously. On January 25, 2022, the game’s application was finally found after it’s game page was deleted for a few years.

name: Recycle it!
summary: In "Recycle it!", you embark on an exhilarating journey as a bold bottle with an insatiable curiosity, daring to explore the vast expanse of the house while its inhabitants are absent.

name: Realistic Social Criticism
summary: A dada action game I made out of free stock resources. The game ends when the song is over.

name: Reverse Dream
summary: Reverse Dream is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The main goal of the game is to explore Guratsuki's dream worlds and collect effects (called Images (イメージ) in this game). Interestingly, each effect is based on a certain way of dying, with each effect having 死 (lit. Death) in its name.

name: Real Robots Final Attack
summary: A mecha combat game created by the makers of the Super Robot Wars series. This game features machines from various anime.

name: Real Arcade Bike
summary: Real Arcade Bike is an Arcade style bike game which is about reaching the goal without crashing and breaking the highscore with a new record time. Inspired by several arcade classics the game features a unique low poly art style.

name: Remembering Which Buttons Take However Long to Press
summary: Remembering Which Buttons Take However Long To Press is a game in which you must hold down buttons/keys to score points, but holding them too long could cause them to explode.

name: Resident Evil: Mortal Night
summary: Mortal Night is a mod for Resident Evil 2 Sourcenext that adds a completely new story and radically changes the gameplay by adding new mechanics. The latest version, REbirth edition, is no longer standalone, but it enhances the experience even more and brings you the possibility of playing in areas from other classic Resident Evil titles. Now randomization has been included, which means that items, enemies, door locks and cutscenes will vary (slightly or greatly) every time you start a new playthrough. In addition to this, the order in which you go to the different areas and the choices you make will also affect the story and gameplay. "Replayable" is the perfect adjective for this mod. This is a must-play for any fan of classic Resident Evil games. Right now only the first episode (2-3 hours long) is available for this updated version, but episodes 2 and 3 are being worked on, and they will bring even more novelties.

name: Red Star Raider
summary: Red Star Raider is a fast paced, action packed platform shooter presented in a retro style and not just in the visual sense. Players will have to master Parry, dodge, reflect, wall slide and many more skills.

name: Red and Blue: Alien War
summary: A story based game about two different races of aliens who are at war. The player gets captured by the Red's (Evil side) and but then rescued by the Blue's (Good side). The blue army asks the player to help them in there war and the player accepts.

name: RemiFla Spirits
summary: A doujin game by YuuYuutei based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Renations
summary: Renations or Renations Online is a strategy game by Pikaia Games. This game has four playable factions.

name: Reflections of Life: Spindle of Fate
summary: The world's fate hangs by a thread...

name: Rebel! Pure Love Fighters!
summary: Gerard wants to be a hero like a brave, and childhood sweetheart Madilia discovers a terrifying conspiracy in the process of realizing their dreams. What kind of test will they face?

name: RelayCars
summary: Welcome to RelayCars: The New Way to Experience Cars Step inside the Showroom to view product accurate vehicle models in full, real-time, room-scale, 6-DoF freedom as part of your research and shopping experience.

name: Rekt: Crash Test
summary: A high-octane, stunt, arcade game with an addictive combo and trick-based gameplay set in a retro arena. Get behind the wheel - jump, drift, stunt, and compete with others on the way on top the global leaderboard.

name: Revive
summary: Revive is a pixelated puzzle platformer in which you defy death, define life, and jump in puddles of syrup.

name: Renegade Racers
summary:
Renegade Racers, a watercraft racing game, has three game modes including arcade, quick race and high score. The modes are further broken down into eight race modes of varying types. In Battle Race, you blast opponents during the race while Check Point Challenge requires reaching checkpoints within pre-set parameters. Other self-explanatory races include Smash & Grab, Treasure Hunt, Head-to-Head and Dodgems. Rounding out the modes are the precision events Air Time and Drop Zone.

The game features three difficulty choices, each with a different number of levels. At the easy setting there are 32 levels while the medium and hard settings have 40 and 48 levels respectively. In arcade mode, you must face increasingly difficult challenges as you complete the levels by meeting pre-determined times, tasks and finish-position parameters. As you complete various levels, a head-to-head challenge mode allows you to race against level bosses, unlocking the race for use in other play modes.

name: Reficul 666
summary: As darkness descends upon the world. all contact is lost. Set in a small town in North America, will you survive the dark new world? Prepare for a challenging and unique enemy, powerful magical relics, and an unsettling atmosphere in this creepy Post-apocalyptic Indie survival horror game.

name: Real Kanojo
summary: An erotic dating sim by Illusion that supports webcam-based controls.

name: RealFlight Trainer Edition
summary: RealFlight Trainer Edition is the perfect way to learn radio control flying on your PC. With 6 aircraft from Horizon Hobby and flying lessons from experienced RC pilots, you'll be ready to solo in no time.

name: Real City Car Driving Sim 2017
summary:
You can move freely in the city, challenging tasks waiting for you from each other. 5 complete tasks by selecting one of the different tools acquired new vehicles. No matter how fast you drive and you're good to prove it!
Game features;
HD Graphics
30 Different Level
3D gaming experience
Different Camera Angles
 - Internal Driving
 - Foreign Driving
 - Remote Driving Bird's Eye
5 Different Tools
Swivel Steering

name: Reef Rumble
summary: Take control of your custom jellyfish and battle with your friends in highly dynamic physic-based fights, for fun or to see who is the best. Step into the ring for 2 to 8 players clashes in local or online play. Pierce the weak spot of your opponents using submarine dangers to score points.

name: Red Babe
summary: An early DOS FPS made in the Pie in the Sky engine. Developed by The DaRK CaVErN Productions in 1994 according to MyAbandonware.

name: Restaurant Flipper
summary: Restore abandoned places to surpass their former glory. You buy neglected bars and restaurants to fix mistakes of their former owners. Give them new life with your vision and attract more customers than ever.

name: Real Car Parking Master
summary: Real Car Parking : Parking Master is realistic driving experience which will take you to another level! Test your car driving skills with many features like interior view, realistic sound effects, different cars and big cities. Show that you are Parking Master like a boss !

name: Reaver
summary: Reaver is an ultra-fast-paced FPS that endows you with the mobility and weapon mechanics to reave through arenas of killer machines with grace and efficiency. Push the boundaries of speed and style in this next-gen movement-shooter.

name: RedCard 2003
summary:
Red Card 2003 is Midway's soccer title in its extreme sports series. The gameplay is comparable to NFL Blitz or NHL Hitz.

Players choose from one of 32 international teams and duke it out in the most realistic of Midway's 2003 extreme sports games. This game features full size teams and plays much like a real soccer title until you dropkick one of your opponents to the ground. It doesn't go all out like most of Midway's hard-hitting games, but it definitely stands closer to Midway's extreme sports games than a traditional simulation.

name: Retroids
summary: Retr0ids is a 32 level, 2d, retro-styled shoot-em-up. It's sort of a mash-up of Asteroids and Robotron done in a pseudo-8bit style that's a little reminiscent of the BBC Model B but with more colours and better visual effects.

name: Reset Generation
summary: Game developed by RedLynx for Nokia N-Gage service.

name: Rekt!: The Forge
summary: Crazy jumps, stunts, and a brand new car on your disposal - forge the best tricks and discover a brand new map, full of ramps, new challenges and much more!

name: Real Coaster
summary:
Build and run the world’s most exciting idle theme park and earn a fortune! Ride amazing 3D rollercoasters and many popular fun park simulations!
Develop your dream idle theme park with awesome roller coasters. Attract more visitors, collect income from rides and shops and invest in new assets. Build many different parks in stunning locations and grow your empire. Become the next theme park tycoon!

name: Re:Zero -Starting Life in Another World- Death or Kiss Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Re:Zero -Starting Life in Another World- Death or Kiss
- Ram SD Figure
- Soundtrack

name: Resident Evil: Mansion
summary: A short tour in dining room

name: Red Baron Arcade
summary: Engage in the ultimate World War I arcade flight-shooter Red Baron Arcade. Grab the flight stick of 20 historic WWI planes and battle countless enemies including huge zeppelins, powerful battleships and authentic WWI aircraft in over 36 varied levels. Fight against intense computer AI in the single player missions or wage war against 7 other aspiring “Aces” online.

name: Remain 3
summary:
This GZDoom megawad is a retrospective show of the classical Doom from the height of today's abilities of "zdoom in doom" format.

Basically it is in "zdoom in doom" format, but with some gzdoom features and Decorate.

There are no scripts, detail is medium and jumps and crouches are not allowed for forcing you to feel Doom.

name: Redline Ultimate Racing
summary: Ever dreamed of owning and managing your own car racing team? Redline Ultimate Racing allows you to make your dreams come true! Take control of either a randomly generated racing universe or load your own custom-created universe into the game.

name: Reel Deal Slots & Video Poker
summary: The first game in Phantom EFX's gambling simulation series.

name: Rekindling The Flame
summary: Rekindling the Flame is an action RPG game. Hack and slash your way through hordes of enemies. Rebuild your town, Upgrade your equipment, and bolster your skills to face even greater challenges.

name: Rebirth
summary: Fight your way out of a coma filled with nightmares...

name: Return
summary: A game where you defeat aliens in a space station contaminated by alien invasion and solve puzzles to escape to Earth.

name: Reclaim Earth
summary: Slay Aliens to Reclaim Earth!

name: Red Dog: Superior Firepower
summary: Red Dog: Superior Firepower is a video game released in 2000 for the Sega Dreamcast, it was developed by Argonaut Games PLC.

name: Rebound RPG
summary: Rebound is a 2D side-scrolling turn-based RPG game and you play as Sen who wakes up on an island without any of his memories.

name: Rest In Peace
summary: Rest In Peace - game in the genre puzzle. You need to draw a line to insert the balls into the box.

name: Reel Deal Casino Quest
summary: A gambling simulation from Phantom EFX.

name: Red Dead Pixel Man
summary: Red Dead Pixel Man is a 2D-action game. Kill the boss at the bottom stage to get a super coin and win the game. Collect 4 coins to win perfectly.

name: Rebirth Moment
summary: At the end of the world where alien bugs and zombie thugs run rampant, you are a special "bug slayer" who was sent to an unknown town to perform a final mission. As one of the executors of the "Rebirth Plan", you must find the "Reborners", protect them, and survive as long as possible...

name: Real Football 2019
summary: Real Football / Soccer is a series of mobile football/soccer games by Gameloft that has been released annually since 2004.

name: Resistance TD
summary: Build defense towers, manage your economy and resist the enemy!

name: Reyna Darkness
summary: A game with RPG and adventure combination. it is about the mystery that become fundamental of everything in the past. and that was Reyna's purpose, to become darkness.

name: Reclaym the Kingdom
summary:
This game was developed in 7 very long days for the Epic MegaJam 2021 by Work Hard, Clay Hard. They are: Daniel Asperen (Level Design), Morris Belfrage (Animation), Josh Dutton (Audio), Luke Parkes-Haskell (Design), and Oskar Selin (Art).

The Kingdom of Plato once held aloft in the sky, falls into ruin. It has been abandoned by the High-Kings of old, leaving the denizens trapped as it slowly decays and crumbles into the abyss. They are quite literally running out of space - and it's only going to get worse.

Enter our erstwhile adventurer, Cassius who seeks to claim the throne, ergo the Kingdom for himself - and will stop at nothing to get it.

Navigate and fight your way through a world full of devious enemies, and defeat them by picking up floor tiles and using them as deadly projectiles - but you need to take great care, as each time you remove a floor tile, you give yourself one less to stand on, and you too may find yourself running out of space.

name: Red is Dead
summary:
Red is Dead is an intense action game with a randomized obstacle course containing over 120 levels. While playing this game you get an insane rush while being heavily amused. There are many physics in the game that you can interact with. Overcome insanely hard levels and beat your personal high score.  
Red objects make you die when you collide with them. 
Black objects are neutral. 
Blue objects move when they collide or are close enough to the player. 
Have fun!

name: Re-Nullum
summary: Re-Nullum is a minimalist puzzle game about combining numbers. On each level, you must clear the board by connecting numbered tiles.

name: Returning Nightmares
summary: Returning Nightmares is an exploration adventure-horror game, inspired by Yume Nikki and it's multiple fan-made homages (but with dialogue & easier to navigate maps). You play as Akira, a young man locked up in his own bedroom, exploring his dreams to remember the events that lead him to where he is now. But some things are better left alone…

name: Returning the favor of the dog
summary: Living together with lovely dog-eared girl simulator. One snowy winter day, I picked up a dog shivering in the cold at a shrine. Heartbroken by my family's misfortune, I decided to take good care of this dog at least. and one day it became a dog-eared girl.

name: Replica: Temporary Safety
summary: Replica: Temporary Safety is an interactive novel game played through a cellphone and social media.

name: Retro Jam 1
summary: Impromptu map jam following a "retro" medieval/castle theme: five small maps by ericw, mfx, Scampie, Skacky and sock. It comes with optional medieval-style item models, and the map sources are included.

name: Rezzil Player: Forest Team Pack
summary: Upgrade your experience with the official Nottingham Forest FC Team Pack. Pick from a selection of exclusive kit from this historic club.

name: Reach for the Sun
summary: Behind all those leaves, roots, and petals is an intelligent bio-machine of starch, nutrients, and water. Take over a flower's seedling to help it grow and reproduce before winter approaches. Carefully gather and manage three key resources needed to create flowers and fruits. You'll never look at these organisms the same way again!

name: Reflections of Life: Equilibrium - Collector's Edition
summary: The Queen of Creatos is missing, and if you don't get her back soon... the entire world will crumble!

name: Reaper Boy
summary: Short platform game where you must calculate the jump to eliminate the enemies.

name: Return of the Space Warrior
summary: Edward Egg must defend planet Egg from the Space Warriors who have recently returned. Return of the Space Warrior is a Joust clone this time with eggs instead of birdies.

name: RetroWar
summary: 8 bits 16 players friend battling couch shooting bomb blasting joystick waggling controller throwing pixel dreaming RetroWar. Kill your friends like it's 1984.

name: ReSizE
summary: This is a space puzzle to challenge your brain in which you should try to get through all of the rooms.

name: Redemption Cemetery: Dead Park - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you help three souls escape a deadly amusement park?

name: Revamped
summary: A completely non linear adventure, with screen filling bosses, which could have been named Metroidvania if it wasn't for legal issues.

name: Remore: Infested Kingdom
summary: A challenging turn-based tactical RPG that transports you into a medieval apocalyptic infestation. Your survivors are fragile, and every step you take could be your last.

name: Retro Rally!
summary: Get ready to embark on a nostalgic journey back to the golden era of arcade gaming with Retro Rally! This top-down racing game pays homage to the classic arcade racers of yesteryears, offering an adrenaline-pumping experience that will have you hooked from the moment you hit the accelerator.

name: Renegade: Arena Shooter
summary: Renegade is a fast first person shooter inspired by many older shooters such as Doom, Aliens vs. Predator, Quake and many more!

name: ReFrame
summary: 'ReFrame' is a VR puzzle/adventure game that you can see in different colors.

name: Rescue Friends Solitaire
summary: Save the forest from danger! Live the story alongside the characters! Help save the forest from a mysterious disease!

name: Remington, the A.I.
summary: A kinetic (linear) visual novel about the world's top Artificial Intelligence (A.I.) competing to be NO.1 -- one made by the United States government and the other by a private European company.

name: Redemption Cemetery: Children's Plight - Collector's Edition
summary: A warlock's curse has trapped you in an otherworldly cemetery! Explore Hidden Object scenes and save the warlock's victims!

name: Red Tears
summary: Red Tears, previously known as Shattered Earth, follows the adventure of two friends and their quest to save a post-nuclear Arladia from a mysterious menace that seeks to destroy what's left of it.

name: Reign of the Renegade
summary: Reign of the Renegade is a challenging roguelike deckbuilder. Learn Actions, Collect Artifacts, and level up your Character to make powerful synergies.

name: Redemption of the Cat Demon Girl
summary: You meet the cat demon girl "Suzu" when you go to a merchant's "friend" and he forcibly gives you Suzu, whose origin is unknown, but as certain things progress, you'll gradually find that some people and things are in need of redemption, and the "redemption" of ...... is, in the end, who?

name: Reinforcer
summary: Top-down shooter for Sharp.

name: Relentless: Ranger
summary: Relentless: Ranger is a fantasy rogue-lite action platformer. Slash, shoot, sneak, die, and repeat as the next strider to brave the impossible mission. Unlock disciplines, rescue damsels, and build a better base for your cohort. Choose a new adventure every run.

name: Realm Lands
summary: Realm Land's is a 2D RPG survival game. The game will have many features, including a completely randomly generated 250x250 realm. The realm will have a chance to spawn randomly generated groups of either monster camps, chests, dungeons, bosses, and resources for you to explore and collect.

name: Revolution Diabolique
summary: Unlock diabolical magic in the time of Napoleon and Robespierre! Can you direct the course of the Revolution, or will you lose your head?

name: Return to Earth
summary: Return to Earth is a dynamic shooter subgenre of "survival".The player assumes the role of a soldier who must defend your planet from the attack waves of enemy invaders.

name: Reflections of Life: Dark Architect
summary: When a traitor Architect attempts to destroy the Fantastic Worlds, the player must hunt them down and stop them.

name: Reel Gold
summary:
Reel Gold is an addictive mining game that you can play online and for free on Silvergames.com. Aim of the game is to clear each level of gold before the time runs out. Move your mine wagon around on the rails with left and right arrows. Fire the rope down to reel in gold with arrow up/down.

Time is working against you in this fun gold digging adventure so try to beat it every round. There is not only gold in the underground but also stones, which you have to avoid as they are only wasting your time. Try to dig for the golden stones only and collect them as fast as you can. Are you ready? Good luck with Reel Gold!

name: Redemption Cemetery: Grave Testimony - Collector's Edition
summary: Escape a cursed island of lost souls by helping three of the trapped spirits in Redemption Cemetery: Grave Testimony!

name: Retroplay Controller
summary:
A plug & play famiclone with games from companies like Nice Code Software, Waixing and Inventor.

name: Rebels Prison Escape
summary:
Rebels Prison Escape is a strategy/adventure game in which you control up to five characters in an attempt to escape from prisons scattered about the country. Each character has his/her own talents and skills. Escape from the prisons using stealth to hide from the guards or bribe your way with some and overpower others.

Friedrich, a cruel dictator, controls his country's people with an iron fist. Now a band of rebels is about to stage a coup to overturn the dictator, but they are found out and thrown into prisons throughout the country. You must now re-unite your rebels and oust Friedrich.

Starting off with one rebel you must infiltrate his prison and move through six different levels helping your comrades escape. Interact with the environment like throwing objects to distract the guards. Sneak past guards because they can hear your loud footsteps if you try to run. Watch out for his "field of vision" as you can tell where he is looking. If you knock a guard out he will eventually come to and look for you. If you kill a guard you must hide his body to keep from raising the alarm.

Every rebel has his/her own skills like feign death to surprise the guard and overcome him. Pick locks and set traps for unsuspecting guards. Conceal yourself in shadows to hide. Disguise yourself to fool the guards and even imitate sounds to throw them off your trail. And even cast Voodoo magic to hypnotize unwary opponents.

name: Residence
summary: Kailin does her yoga training every day to stay fit for her upcoming sexfights. However today Yanmei took a place on Kailin’s spot….and it was a mistake. Girls start to argue who is the best here and whose body is more fit.

name: Realm of Dissonance
summary: A seven level episode for Quake, using the original texture set from the base game. Includes a secret level, and has support for Deathmatch and Co-Op, (although NOT fully tested, as it was designed primarily with SP in mind).

name: Rebel Runner: Operation - Digital Code
summary:
The planet Ranax is under attack from the evil Maaron empire. The last Ranaxian soldier must find and use a digital code to shut down the empire's mind-controlling satellite.

Rebel Runner - Operation: Digital Code is an arcade game where the main character shoots fireballs from his hands at extraterrestrial enemies, while crossing pre-rendered 3D levels. The character is controlled by either the keyboard (default buttons: CTRL for fire and ALT for jumping) or joystick. Each stage starts with three lives and the game saves progress between levels.

name: Reasons For Kym
summary:
Reasons for Kym is a short love
story about giving 7 colorful reasons
to understand and love Kym.

name: RevenBlade
summary: RevenBlade is team-based third-person hero shooter with MOBA elements and a focus on melee combat with fast-paced action and mechanical outplays.

name: Red Goblin: Cursed Forest
summary: Venture into the darkness of the Dream Forest and discover why it's now called "Cursed". Meet interesting characters in a psychological adventure, solve puzzles and learn all about the story of Red; a fire goblin that is now looking to find his master...

name: Reroll: Back to the throne
summary: What happens if young and promising, but really wayward king dies in an accident? Distant relatives start strifes, trying to claim a free throne, kingdom plunges into chaos and Death, which was about to go to the vacation, goes mad because of the amount of work. Is there a way to fix everything? Making a deal with Death and becoming almost immortal while trying to get your castle back in exchange for some spoils of war sounds totally legit!

name: Red Crucible: Phoenix Rising
summary: No prisoners! No mercy! Smash and destroy your way to victory!

name: Resonance Solstice
summary: Resonance is a unique real-time trading RPG that combines real-time card battles with train simulation. As a COLUMBA conductor, you’ll travel the continent, rebuild and reconnect a fractured world.

name: Rent-a-Vice
summary: What doesn't kill you...kills someone else, and leads you down an ethical rabbit hole. Can you do what's right in a world where vice is a virtue?

name: Red and the Deadly Sins
summary: Are you looking for a funny game?Shining Souls, there are 70 challenge room, all let you concentrate, the heart speeds up, it's really fun!Are you looking for an interesting game?Shining Souls, there will be many interesting soul, floating in the vast underground maze, go chat with them, they are waiting for you!Are you looking for a game you can enjoy on your own?Shining Souls is such a game, go and hug her!You will love this game, even though she is not perfect, you will fall in love with her!

name: Reading Recipes: Grandma Ollie's Morphabet Soup
Revenance
summary: 2D Pixel Art Survival Horror

name: Rena and Elin
summary: Rena found herself in the forest when she wakes up. Then when she planning to find a way out, she found Elin, who also planned to leave the forest. The two decided to leave together.

name: Rento Fortune Monolit: Deep Board
summary: Rento Deep Board is a special map extension to Rento game, in which you play on two levels (inner and outer). When you land on an owned subway station, the game moves your pawn to the inner circle, in which you can enjoy more lands, gifts and two new companies.

name: Rebel Duet
summary: Rebel Duet is a story-driven adult visual novel, where you are summoned to become the partner of a beautiful young succubus. Sexually train your demonic companion, and evolve from a humble office worker into a powerful spellsword. How much of your humanity are you willing to trade for power?

name: Reversi
summary: Reversi is based on the classic board game where your objective is to capture the most pieces on the game board by flipping discs to your color. A disc, or an unbroken line of discs of the same color, is captured when it becomes flanked on opposite ends by two opposing pieces, one of which must be the disc that was just placed on the board.

name: Re:Birthday Song: Koi wo Utau Shinigami - Another Record
summary: Re:Birthday Song: Koi wo Utau Shinigami - Another Record is an Adventure game, developed by honeybee+ and published by Asgard, which was released in Japan in 2016.

name: ReversiQuest2
summary: ReversiQuest2 is a single-player tactical JRPG with a battle system based on Reversi. Those good ole days of pixel art, characters, and sounds reminiscent of video games of the mid 90's. No need to know the previous ReversiQuest to enjoy ReversiQuest2!

name: Realms of Supremacy
summary: It's a battle over the 10 realms between light and darkness. Will it be light or darkness that has total supremacy over all the realms?

name: Realm of Gems
summary: The main character finds themselves ensnared within a mysterious realm, and it's up to you to help them avoid getting lost in time. As our hero navigates different time periods, they must find gems to control the flow of time.

name: Reckless Death Race
summary: The game is afoot! Fight for your survival in a post-apocalyptic world. Society has been torn down, the only way to escape enslavement is to upgrade, level & unlock new Hovercars and Weapons to strike fear into the cold hearts of roving man-machine bandits.

name: Remote Knights Online
summary: A faction-based openworld action RPG with survival elements. Playable in multiplayer, singleplayer and self-hosted mode with custom ruleset. Can you survive the rough world of Vall Tir?

name: Relaxing Kite
summary: Wait! Pause for a moment and immerse yourself in some relaxing entertainment. Sit back, put on your headphones, and relax. The unique audiovisual experience will allow you to finally cut yourself off from everything and enjoy the game.

name: Return to Kroz
summary: Return to Kroz is the 1st of the Super Kroz Trilogy. This one offers 20 levels featuring the same ASCII graphics and one screen puzzle adventure gameplay as all other Kroz titles.

name: Recant
summary: Recant is a fairly large level created by Dr. Sleep

name: Real Kart
summary: Unique game! Which has no analogues in this genre. 1. Learning mode for creating your own go-kart. 2. Race with your ghosts for first place in the world ranking table. 3. Race with a friend on two gamepads or just on one keyboard with split screen.

name: Re:Birthday Song - Koi wo Utau Shinigami
summary:
Kokoro, wasn't selected by anybody to be her partner as she performed poorly in all disciplines of Reaper study. As a result, she was grouped with other cadets that were falling behind, and was made to take special supplementary lessons. The other attendees of these supplementary lessons are fellow Reaper cadets. It's filled with unique guys, all with their own reasons for attending the school.

Kokoro must choose one of the boys to become partners with, however... With her partner at her side, will she be able to become a full fledged Reaper?

name: Retro Winter Sports 1986
summary:
Participate in the 1986 winter sports tournament and compete against other world-class athletes for international recognition.
Six different, action-packed events await you in a beautiful retro-style winter setting. Choose the country you want to represent from 12 different nations.

name: Recalhorn
summary: Play as a young boy and his white creature pet as you progress through sidescrolling levels using a magic flute or jumping on enemies to defeat them and gather fruit for points. Along the way, you characters will befriend animals which can be summoned and ridden bestowing new powers to both defeat enemies and traverse the land. At the end of each world, youll face a boss character. Your player has 5 hearts per life. This game ran on Taitos F3 system and was tested in arcades, but never officially released. Several prototype carts were released into the wild.

name: Remnith
summary: Remnith is a chaotic FPS where enemy units feed off of the energy of every shot that isn't lodged directly into them. The more you miss the stronger they get.

name: Recursive Dragon
summary: Life on Dragonia planet is difficult, but interesting. Dragons have their sacred traditions. Every young dragon must undergo an initiation rite. He needs to make a round-the-world trip and study all the four sectors of the planet: Sector of Spring, Sector of Summer, Sector of Autumn and Sector of Winter.

name: Reconditus
summary: Reconditus is a 4 map (+ epilogue) mapset that takes place in a world where temple-like structures have been slowly assimilated by tech/alien stuff.

name: Realm of Chaos
summary: Realm of Chaos is a Doom II megawad that contains 32 levels and was released on October 31, 1996 by The Macintosh Team (TMT). As the name of the mapping team implies, the project was exclusively built by Doom mappers on Apple Macintosh computers.

name: Reliving the End
summary: Well, we've all lived through the end, but the question is, are you ready to Relive, the End?

name: RePirates
summary: Fish pirates repairing their boat to reach the treasure island. Make your captain happy.

name: Reimus Awesome Holiday
summary: Its Reimus Day off. But her day is ruined by an unknown force in Gensokyo! Play as Reimu to find out what this mysterious group is about and uncover their secret!

name: Relics of Aurelia
summary: An rpg that makes various things called relics have a good side and a bad side. You have to discover what they do, and use them to beat the game!

name: Re-Bounder
summary:
Bounder is back! Again your in control of a tennis ball, that bounces and bounces and bounces...

This time you must collect smart bombs to finish the game. You need to collect all of them: 16 smart bombs.

Avoid bad stuff for landing like sand, spikes, traps or enemies. Unknown squares, signed with an "?" awaiting you: sometimes helpful (higher/longer jumps, extra-time and soon) - other times they're traps too.

Excellent parallax-scrolling, nice graphics and sounds will give you a great time with this one, easy to play - but damn' hard to win!

name: ReCharge RC
summary: Drift your way into ReCharge RC! Featuring limitless vehicle customization, online track sharing with an ever growing catalog, global online leaderboards for every track, even the ones you create, and asynchronous multiplayer allowing you to race the ghost of every leaderboard entry! Enjoy realistic physics that blur the lines between arcade and simulation and allow rookies and veterans alike to experience the joy that is RC racing!

name: Re:Zero Kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu Infinity
RetroFuel
summary: A classic racing game for MS-DOS computers

name: Reiner Knizia's Money
summary: You start the game with six bills of random currency. Your goal is to concentrate your reserves into just two or three types of currency before the game ends. To do so, you must spend the money you already have. It takes money to make Money!

name: Real World Racing RWR: Z
summary: RWR: Z is a zombie-themed DLC for the top-down racing game Real World Racing.

name: Rebound Gun
summary: "Rebound Gun" is an indie game with shooting and bullet rebound as its main theme. In the game, players will play as the protagonist Hyakka, exploring the imaginative world during sleepless nights.

name: [Redacted] Techbase
summary: ******** Techbase is a new apolitical version of THATCHER'S TECHBASE that everyone can enjoy!

name: Retrowave Drift
summary: Race your way through career mode collecting trophies and earning contracts with more prestigious racing teams. Unlock and drive new cars with different capabilities, perfect for enjoying the different weather, visibility, day/night and dynamic track conditions.

name: Remember to Remember
summary: Remember to Remember is a Yume Nikki fangame by emrbt. You play as Pale, a boy with amnesia who is staying in a hospital.

name: Relics of Cilldrea
summary: A story 21 years in the making, and a development team of a few, Relic's of Cilldrea is a medieval 1st and 3rd person hack/slash and magical combat game. Team up with your friends, kill them, or go it alone... the choice is yours.

name: Red Blood Online
summary: A korean MMORPG developed by Gorilla Banana Entertainment.

name: Resident Evil 3: Nemesis - Seamless HD Project
summary: The Seamless HD Project is an upscaled, restored and in some cases manually edited remaster that brings old environments, visual effects and game elements into sharper detail.

name: Record Life
summary: Under certain conditions, try to change your life. This is a simulation business game based on real life, starting from scratch, to billionaires, perhaps in a minute or a second. A variety of occupations, regular life, cooking, dating, entertainment, life goals, disease and aging... Maybe we can live better.

name: Revival Xanadu
summary:
Revival Xanadu is a remake of Xanadu: Dragon Slayer II.

The remake distinguishes itself with the more detailed, graphically more advanced character portraits and backgrounds in the various places of interest (inns, temples, shops, etc.). Player and enemy sprites are also drawn in a noticeably more detailed way and have a higher resolution.

However, the side-scrolling exploration environments retain the original look, with "retro" graphics reminiscent of the older original game.

For the most part, the location layout in this remake are the same as in the original version, and the gameplay remains largely unchanged as well.

name: Reptomom
summary: As Reptomom, the fate of dinosauria rests on your cybernetically-enhanced shoulders. Rout the nefarious humans who have taken a quantum-leap to your universe and brainwashed its denizens in a bid to take over. Slash, kick, lase, and blaze your way through 8 areas of classic platforming challenge!

name: Red Stone Online
summary:
Red Stone is an online 2.5D Ultimate Transformation MMORPG!
