The story of Red Stone begins in the fantasy world of Prandel as players go on an adventurous quest to search for a mystical red stone
that fell from the Celestial World.

name: Revolution
summary:
Tap your way up through each spinning ring avoiding red to gain a point. 
 
Oh, and don't wait too long or the walls will crush you. 
 
You will need fast reactions and nerves of steel! 
How far can you go?

name: Reach
summary: The world is covered with mystery and horror. Everything is dark, and the sky is blood-colored, there is no sun, no night, no day. Everyone has their own time and it is unique. You need to reach the light to survive and return home. Welcome to the world of shadows!

name: Re Angel
summary: Re Angel is a 2nd visual novel created by Studio GU, an indy game developer from Thailand.

name: Realm Royale Shadowfall Bundle
summary: Embrace the shadows with the Realm Royale Shadowfall Bundle. This bundle contains 850 Crowns which can be used on additional Realm Royale cosmetics, as well as the new Lord of Darkness Warrior Skin, Knightmare Mount, and Shadowbeak Chicken skin.

name: Regency Love
summary: With Regency Love, you can create your own story and interact with the world around you. Would you dance, practise the piano, or perhaps embroider a handkerchief? Take tea with your mother, visit an old friend, or ask after a new acquaintance, who just so happens to own a rather fetching waistcoat? Walk in the woods with a dashing companion, or discuss poetry with a reserved gentleman friend? The choice is entirely yours!

name: Ren'Py Rhythm Game
summary: Play a rhythm game in your Ren'Py Visual Novel game!

name: Relics of the Past
summary: Relics of the Past is a Story based 2D Metroidvania based in a Fantasie world

name: Red Stone DS: Akaki Ishi ni Michibikareshi Monotachi
summary: This is a a handheld version of the korean online multiplayer RPG named "Red Stone" which has transforming characters and an original storyline, a story that players can transform to some degree. The game’s zapping system presents a different outcome of events depending on which characters are in your party. It contains six chapters and eight different endings to unlock.

name: Retroboy
summary: Six clones of popular games, remade in a pseudo-Game Boy style.

name: RedCat: De Europese Stedentocht
summary: RedCat searches Europe for pieces of a crashed UFO.

name: Reign of Guilds: Black Knight
summary: Continue your journey with this pack unlocking additional exclusive in-game content!

name: Realities: Death Valley
summary: Based on the book America Deserta, this experience sends you on a personal road trip through the empty vastness of one of Americas most spectacular deserts: Death Valley. While freely exploring the photorealistic scans of the diverse and sometimes bizarre landscapes you can also decide to dig deeper, simultaneously exploring the thoughts of self declared desert freak Reyner Banham & his complex relation with the American desert by finding the cassettes left behind in each of the six scenes.

name: Recovery Search and Rescue Simulation
summary: In this simulation you will have to strap on your boots and hook up your compass - as a new recruit to Rescue Team One, you'll need to use your expert tracking skills to locate a variety of important objects and missing people who have stumbled into the harsh.

name: Ready, Steady, Cook: The Game
summary: Ready, Steady Cook for the Wii and DS is based on the popular British TV show, featuring celebrity chief, Ainsley Harriot.

name: Revel Rousers
summary: Rampage through a boring city turning boring people into party animals to throw the biggest party for your party god!

name: Retro Jam 4
summary: Four-day 'retro' map jam following an Episode 4 tribute theme. The result is eight small, dark and brutal levels by various authors.

name: Reversion: The Meeting
summary:
Reversion is a science-fiction Point&Click Adventure Game developed by the indie 3f interactive. Inspired by classics of the genre.
You will be propelled to a desolate future, robbed of your memories and looking desperately for a clue to understanding your predicament.

name: Ren Ti Tu Pu
summary: This is a human body map simulator, which can observe various parts of the human body in the laboratory.

name: Rebels: Under the Spell of Magic
summary: This is the first linear chapter of a longer visual novel game about adventure, fantasy, magic and friendship. There are only a few choices that can be made, and some paths to chose from. The decisions do not have an impact on the ending, instead they provide slightly different content.

name: Red Alliance
summary: Red Alliance is an atmospheric, dark action thriller single player game with elements of horror. The game takes place in Eastern Europe where the society is under oppressive regime enforced by a mysterious scientist whom the player must stop to restore justice.

name: Ready, Set, Read with Bananas & Jack
Remy Raccoon and the Lost Temple: Halloween Hijinks - Volume 2
summary: Remy Raccoon is back in this Halloween special of our cute, gem-grabbing arcade game. Join Remy in 11 brand new Halloween levels filled with fiendish traps and malevolent creatures. Your adventure awaits...

name: Red Squares
summary: Tap to move the red circle up and through the gaps of the red squares, and climb to the top. If you can!

name: Real Racing 2 HD
summary: Real Racing 2 HD is a heart-pounding, visually astounding 3D racer that puts the steering wheel directly in your hands. The expansive, 10-plus hour career mode and extensive, one-of-a-kind multiplayer means the fight for first place is never over.

name: Recycling Tycoon: Junk to Gems
summary: Grocery Store Simulator is an immersive simulator that is all about retail, go big or go bankrupt! Everything is in your hands

name: Rebound
summary: Rebound is a 2 player arcade game that simulates a volleyball match by having players volley a ball back and forth over a net with their paddles.

name: Repulse: Galactic Rivals
summary:
Repulse: Galactic Rivals is a local competitive couchgame up to 4 players set in a retrofuturistic universe.
Players have the ability to attract and repulse cubes spread around the arena at high speed. A dozen of game modes revolve around this core mechanic.

name: Revenge: Rhobar's myth
summary: Join the worlds best wizard academy and embark on an exciting, mysterious journey. Learn 4 different and mighty spells to change the world around you, experience a breathtaking plot about the lost wizard Rhobar or challenge yourself in the freeroam mode! Combine the use of the 4 unique Spells Auraco, Luminos, Terramus and Ignis so solve magical puzzles and find the ideal route in the Spell-Challenges. Set your own highscore and rise the bar for other wizards to a new level.

name: ReFactory
summary: Build, explore, fight! ReFactory is a 2D strategy game with a focus on construction and logistics where you build an automated mega-factory on an alien planet.

name: Reign of the Undead: Revolution
summary: Reign of the Undead: Revolution is a modification for Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare based on Reign of the Undead, a wave-based zombie survival mod that was influenced by the original zombie modes of Call of Duty World at War, Black Ops and newer ones. Different waves require different strategies and teamplay is a must.

name: Reptile Park VR
summary: As a survivor of a tragic plane crash, you fight for survival on an island inhabited by prehistoric creatures. Explore, fight, survive and uncover the history of the tragic consequences of an experiment. Immerse yourself in a survival adventure like never before.

name: Reigning Cats
summary: A new twist to a tower defense game, that will challenge your strategy and test your love for cats as you feed them and clean their litter box.

name: Retro Rocket Robot
summary: Retro fly & slide game inspired from the past.

name: Reach 50 : Sexy Hentai Girls
summary: Are you an Hentai or Ecchi fan ? Do you like japanese girls ? Are you also a mind games fan and nothing pleases you as much as mixing reflexion and pleasure ? If your answer is yes, REACH 50 : SEXY HENTAI GIRLS is the perfect game for you.

name: Red Solstice 2: Survivors - Condatis Group
summary: Experience a new story line with new and old characters and settings. Take on the role as Marshal and survive by any means.

name: Rejection Thesis
summary: For every action there must be an equal and opposite reaction. Jump and push away the world around you in this narrative platformer.

name: Rehabbers
summary: Buy, renovate, design and stage homes to flip for profit or build your own neighborhoods from scratch!

name: Relow
summary: Relow is a very fast-paced first-person shooter where you compete using weird weapons and lethal side-arms in a procedural environment

name: Return of the Host
summary: Return of the Host is a top-down Sokoban-like puzzle game with a twisted storyline and an exciting narrative.

name: Relic Guardians: Complete
summary: Rock, paper, scissors meet anime turn-based fights and time travel!

name: Return Ace
summary: Be shot and shoot back! Rule reversal type Shmup "Return Ace"What you have been given is the power to take advantage of the oncoming malice and return it.Please enjoy the unique sense of incompatibility, tension, and striking that the experience of bullet energy weaves.

name: Relic Arena
summary: Relic Arena is a roguelike autobattler by Jenkins & SUNSfan for PC/Mobile. Players equip units with historical relics and are led by renowned figures from history. Each relic grants a unit a unique ability, with powerful roguelike upgrades.

name: Resident Evil 5: Collector's Edition
summary:
This Collector's Edition includes:

- Resident Evil 5
- Tricell messenger bag
- Chris Redfield figurine
- BSAA patch
- Kijuju-inspired pendant
- Custom-made Steel Case (holds game and bonus disc)

name: Revn
summary: Revn is a free to play third person shooter MOBA. Craft a wide variety of weapons, abilities, and items to build your own custom character. Defend your core at all costs, and ruthlessly destroy your enemies in fast paced 5v5 MOBA action.

name: Realm Quest
summary: Open world virtual reality online role-playing game.

name: Retro Hacker
summary: Retro Hacker simulates hacking from a computer terminal with a text based operating system.

name: Red Amazon
summary: Red Amazon is a four-minute narrative game seeped in atmosphere. The player controls someone shacked up in a forest cottage when danger approaches.

name: Remington Big Buck Trophy Hunt
summary: Remington Big Buck Trophy Hunt is a hunting game by Stellar Stone

name: Rescue Girl Operation: Code X
summary: Take up arms to drive away the mutated zombies and save the beautiful girls!

name: Redumption
summary: Redumption is an action adventure game where you explore a town consumed by the waste. Fight bosses and retrieve precious items to save your friends from the witch's curse. Can you clean up the town and achieve redumption?

name: Reflections of Life: Utopia
summary: You've been invited to the Mechanical Toys Fair! But your excitement quickly turns to dread when a toy-theater master kidnaps your mechanical flying companion! You're hot on his trail when you're thrown into a toy-theater world, inhabited by countless magical creatures and the darkness threatening to trap them all forever! Can you find the true toy master and escape with your newfound friends in time? Find out in this sensational Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

name: Red Turn: The Road to Berlin 1943-45
Rectanglez
summary: Tap to flap the little bird up and past the Rectanglez! Timing is crucial as you flap the bird up, there is little to no room for error. Hop up all the way to the top if you can survive the Rectanglez!

name: ReRoll
summary: ReRoll is a cancelled PC Online Action RPG in a true open world settings. Ex-Ubisoft had a plan to map the entire planet with drones to generate its world. The developers didn't raise enough money so the project was cancelled.

name: Reverse Will
summary: Duke has arrived at Florida to investigate the SPCH facility.

name: Resident Evil 7: Biohazard - Collector's Edition
summary:
Resident Evil 7: Biohazard - Collector's Edition includes:

- Mansion replica.
- USB finger.
- Artbook.
- Alternative inlay.
- Litographs.
- Survival pack.

name: Remedy
summary: Remedy is a first person puzzle adventure game where the player awakens in a world of darkness. Solve puzzles to unlock new abilities, areas of the map and guide the orb back to paradise. Use the power of dissolve to transform the plagued world of darkness back to beauty.

name: Realm Explorer
summary: Realm Explorer will be a sandbox computer game about creation in the fantasy universe of Gnostaria; your creations. Currently in Alpha stage.

name: Requiem Reverie
summary: Requiem Reverie is an immersive cooperative fantasy RPG that invites players to embark on an epic journey through a rich and expansive world filled with mysteries. The game places a strong emphasis on teamwork and strategic party mechanics, offering a deeply engaging and social gaming experience.

name: Rezzil Player: Man City FC Team Pack
summary: Upgrade your experience with the Official Manchester City FC Pack. Pick from a selection of kit from branded gloves to exclusive soccer balls. To top it off, experience heading drills in the mighty Etihad Stadium!

name: Red Glare
summary: Red Glare is a real-time-tactics game based on german expeditions(ww2 Setting) across the continent so you will play all type of maps from tropical jungles to snow and desert maps. This game will revive your old school memories of real time tactics games.

name: Red
summary: Set out on a stealth sci-fi adventure based on the Little Red Riding Hood fairytale. As RED you'll run, climb, and leap across the vast city of Estermont while evading capture from roaming patrols. Plot your own path to Grandmother's house in the woods beyond the wall, but please do be careful!

name: Reality Check 2
summary: A Point And Click Adventure Game created by Retro Wolf as part of the Reality-On-The-Norm project.

name: Retrograde
summary:
You are from the planet Choom in the Thwok solar system, which is under threat from a group of seven crazed dictators and their intergalactic war. Can you fight them all off in this fusion of side-scrolling shooting and top-view fighting? 
 
First you fly along the planet's surface and atmosphere, complete with jetpack, shooting out enemies as they fly around you, and avoiding contact with them. You'll have to find planetbusters to gain access to the bunkers which contain nerve centres.

name: Red Adventure
summary: Red Adventure - A platformer with some elements of Metroidvania, where the player has to explore a completely open world, collecting various improvements for his player, which will help to pass impassable places and climb into unique levels.

name: Retaliation
summary: Can you find the answers lost deep within your memory.

name: Rescale
summary: Rescale your ball to fit through all kinds of obstacles with the goal to never stop rolling. Change perspectives to better see over obstacles and find a way to resize your way past.

name: Retro Bowl
summary: Retro Bowl is an American football simulation game in the style of pixelated video games of old. Play as one of 32 teams, making personnel decisions and playing in the games to try and win the Retro Bowl at the end of the season.

name: Redeemart: A Convenient Apocalypse
summary: Trapped in a convenience store with hordes of monsters waiting to devour you. You'll need to build weapons out of items in the store, collect trading cards to grow stronger and rely on the other people in the store to get over a heartbreak. Promising dual joystick action and a story like no other

name: Recursed: The Ice Palace
summary: Recursed: The Ice Palace is a free community DLC for the puzzle game Recursed, filled with carefully crafted and extremely challenging puzzles.

name: Real World Golf
summary: Real World Golf was released alongside the "Gametrak" peripheral in 2006 by Madcatz. It approximates real golf using straps attached to the player's wrists.

name: Revisitor
summary: Revisitor is a first person puzzle-platformer game set in a futuristic virtual space. Use two different types of teleportation to both navigate and solve a series of increasingly challenging missions.

name: Resident Evil 3: The Only One
summary: Resident Evil 3: The Only One starts out as a remake of Resident Eevil 3, with a black screen and a dialogue between Jill and Brad. Something is chasing Jill, and after the first dialogue, an explosion occurs in your apartment (different from the original) and takes you to the streets of Raccoon where you'll meet the creature that's been chasing you for the first time. Jill will have to find a way to get rid of that creature while she travels through a city where only entrails and the smell of rotting corpses have their place.

name: Reunion
summary: An atmospheric horror game in which you have to look for a couple of friends in love who got lost in the woods after a scandalous party. But do the lovers want to be found? Or do they just want to have fun? The only trouble is that we are not the only ones who hunt them...

name: Relax Walk VR
summary: Visit 6 Beautiful Places in VR and Relax.

name: Rewild
summary: Fight your way through enemies and solve world-puzzles in Rewild. An Action-RPG where you play as someone trying to solve world problems and help others.

name: REM Cycles
summary: One night, ten people fall asleep and find themselves in someone else's dream. Guide these unlikely heroes as they traverse strange lands filled with enemies and memories. Confront a mysterious antagonist and witness chats between battles while you search for reason in sleep.

name: Report One: Operation Alive
summary:
Report One: Operation Alive is a Half-Life modification from the Report series, a story about Kyle Rodriguez, a corporal who will go through blood and sweat, but will overcome the opponents.

Kyle will meet old friends, and the good old villain Mason. He will also fight the mercenaries, and prove that the soldiers do not eat bread for nothing, eventually saving everyone!

name: Real Horror Stories
summary: Real Horror Stories is a point and click horror adventure. The goal of the game is to clear each level. At first it may seem easy but the choices are not always what they seem. You will need to find the right combination of objects to click in order to proceed. Along the way you will encounter puzzles that you need to solve in order to advance to the next level. However, once you understand the gameplay , ghosts , demons and monsters jump out of nowhere to take or scare you! The game is very creepy, especially if you try to play it at night. You will definitely get into the mood immediately. Turn the lights off, put on your headphones and try it...

name: Repton 3
summary: Repton 3 had a few new features: fungus, time capsules, crowns and a timebomb which must be defused to complete each level.

name: RetroRealms Double Feature: Halloween and Ash vs. Evil Dead - Day One Edition
Red Mist: Rivers of Blood
summary: You play a traumatized former Special Forces war veteran who sees red when his wife is abducted. In your pursuit of revenge, you must negotiate a dangerous urban environment. Avoid hazards and deadly drops as you shoot, kick and slash through hordes of enemies in this grueling and gritty platformer.

name: Rezzil Player: Adidas Brand Pack
summary: Upgrade your experience with the first official Brand Pack from Adidas. Play in the colossal Adidas Stadium and pick from a selection of soccer balls from playground bangers to world cup classics. Equip from your locker and use in any soccer and football games.

name: Red Rampant
summary: Red Rampant is a narrative-driven action-adventure game set in Medieval Scotland. With the ability to travel back in time through their memories of previous gameplay and begin again, players use knowledge gained from past mistakes and hindsight of future events to change the course of history.

name: Reversary
summary: A short LudumDare game with an interesting premise. A reverse boss battle action platformer where you play the role of adversary. See that big guy? That's you.

name: Reksio i Kretes w Akcji!
summary: An independent, arcade addition to the Adventures of Reksio series. It does not require the installation of other games in the series, or knowledge of the content of other games with Rex - it only requires concentration and dexterous fingers

name: Red Genie: An Eidola Tale
summary: Red Genie is a turn-based adventure RPG with a focus on weapon and magic variety, with the ability to swap between any one of ten equipped Weapons. This challenging game has a fantastical aesthetic and a rich soundtrack with a story found through player exploration!

name: Resthedex
summary: Build some buildings, level up, drive vehicles and enjoy the ride but don't ever forget the protection! When the countdown begins on clocktower, you are going to need to act fast!When the countdown ends you'll face against enemies which will destroy your city unless you take some precautions!

name: Re:Agent
summary: Take on the role of Agent 314, a spy with a secret mission in the rival nation of Ophidia. Explore a dystopian society, confront ethical dilemmas, and tackle tactical challenges. Can you uncover the hidden truth behind the facade and complete your mission before it's too late?

name: Remalmok
summary: Remalmok- is a first person horror game.

name: Relapse: Resistance
summary: Relapse: Resistance is an iPhone game based on Eminem's 2009 Relapse album.

name: Rewritten Recalls
summary: Step into the dark corners of the world as Detective Thomas, confronting fears unknown to many. Every time the shadow of death descends upon you, you have the chance to begin anew, gathering clues and revealing secrets. Death is no longer the end but a new beginning.

name: Reptilians Must Die!
summary: "Reptilians Must Die" - an amazing adventure game with a gripping storyline, based on the right patriotic education and spiritual scrapie fixed!

name: Reflecting Reflections
summary: Collect, Prepare, Destroy, Fortify, Protect, Explore and Explode across 72 Levels. You will battle in real time using strategy to overcome the enemy in Onslaught. You will hold off waves of oncoming forces in Attrition. You will solve simple to complex puzzles in Abstraction. Will you be victorious?

name: Red Hell
summary: Red Hell is a single level kazio hack of Super Mario World made for the 2010 Kaizo Level Design Contest.

name: Reiko's Fragments
summary: Reiko's Fragments VR vs Crowd game, the VR player must escape a haunted house, a vengeful ghost and even worse, their friends playing as spirits who have full control over the house they're trying to escape!

name: Rezzil Player: TAE Brand Pack
summary: Upgrade your experience with the official TAE brand pack. Play Heading Drills in the TAE training centre, and pick from a selection of exclusive kit from one of the world's hottest brands.

name: Reversi
summary: Take turns putting your pieces in the 8x8 square and get more of your pieces on the board than the opponent's pieces.

name: Red Falcon
summary: A hardcore arcade in retro soviet style. Red Falcon based on a cross between two classic retro games: Invaders and Tetris. Feel the power of soviet technology and destroy non-soviet sectarians heresy, that comes from another universe.

name: Redaxium
summary: First person view. Stat-heavy RPG. Original title.

name: Red Green Blue: Color Mix
summary: Dive into the world of colors and feel like a real artist! Mix the basic colors to get the desired shade and solve an exciting color puzzle.

name: Rebuild: Gangs of Deadsville
summary: Rebuild is a strategy sim for iOS and Android in which players manage and expand a small city of survivors in a zombie apocalypse.

name: Repeat the image: Animals
summary: It is a game for very young children. The essence of the game is that the game provides the main image with a certain animal, and the player below on the screen will be randomly offered four options of animals, but the player must choose an animal, very similar to the main image!

name: Red-Handed Robin
summary: A fantasy otome about lying and stealing.

name: Reality-On-The-Norm: The Affair of the Weirdo
summary: A point-and-click adventure game.

name: Really Bad Flying Machine
summary: This is a puzzle game where you play as a flying machine. Shoot your propellers off to break boxes. Once you shoot a propeller, you lose the ability to move to its direction. Collect keys to advance through the floors.

name: Reactance 2
summary: A fast paced top-down shooter with tons of upgrades and challenging enemies.

name: Reborn in Sin
summary: Play as a fallen angel in this erotic fantasy visual novel. With almost no knowledge of the mortal world and no one left to turn to, you make a dubious deal with a demon to survive. A devious tale filled with futanari and monster girls awaits you!

name: Refidenptio
summary: A Boomer-Shooter with epileptic 1-bit pixel art. Immerse yourself in an enigmatic story destroying all enemies in front of you with a unique combat mechanic. Face depression head on, your enemies are just things created by your mind.

name: Reflex on Go!
summary: Get ready for endless fun with Reflex on Go! This 2D platformer game challenges you to jump your way to a high score. Take on the platforms and try to beat your own record, but beware - one misstep and it's game over! Keep your reflexes sharp and challenge yourself in Reflex on Go.

name: Record of Grancrest War
summary: Record of Grancrest War is a beat-'em-up fighting game based off of the anime with the same game.

name: Rest
summary: A short game about death.

name: Remote Island
summary: Remote Island is a sandbox game where you play as a man who has just crashed on a mysterious island occupied by other survivors. Will you find a way to leave, or will you enjoy yourself and stay ?

name: Reckless Racing HD
summary: Dirt track or asphalt, truck or rally car – take your choice and then take it to the limit. Learn the basics as a beginner and choose from a variety of driving controls. Get better with each race and move up through Bronze, Silver, and Gold difficulty levels.

name: Red Dust
summary: Red Dust is a space-colony simulation game. Build the future of humanity in the unforgiving Mars environment. Explore, exploit resources, build, research, manage the complexity of a self sufficient base, optimize, automate, expand, conquer, but most important of all... survive.

name: ReThink | Evolved 4
summary: ReThink | Evolved 4 is a Puzzle Game in a futuristic setting, that features a variety of Puzzles that utilize Lasers and the behavior of light and it's colors. Use new gameplay mechanics to puzzle your way through the game's beautiful world.

name: Real Al's Humanity Academy
summary: Real Al's Humanity Academy combines wacky mini game action, a bizarre sense of humor, and the world's most human robot to give you a VR party game unlike any other. There's never been a better time to learn how to be human. Enroll today!

name: Retis Tormentum
summary: A fast cyberpunk rythm game.

name: Reverse Problem
summary: Navigate through small diorama islands and tackle 200 handcrafted parking challenges with 100 unique trucks and buses. For an extra challenge, create your own custom problems in the Sandbox mode!

name: Reel Fishing 3D Paradise
summary: Travel to over a dozen stunning fishing locales in your quest to become a master angler.

name: Remnant Knights
summary: An free-to-play MMORPG by GameSamba and Funimation, Remnant Knights is a fantasy game that set place in the anime inspired world of Kasmari.

name: Replicated
summary: Replicated is a simple but challenging puzzle game about separating shapes.

name: Red Algorithm
summary: Can you survive alone against hundreds of monsters? It's not easy. Try out Red Algorithm, a simple yet intense 2D top-down shooter with RPG elements. Pick up weapons, upgrade them, get new perks, and use powerful bonuses. Try out several different heroes against dangerous evil creatures.

name: Real Rally
summary:
Dozens of different new and unique stages each with different surface types including sand, gravel, tarmac and dirt in drag racing games!
Race with one of the best car physics and models, including real time vehicle deformation and damage damage
Realistic driver graphics and voice co-pilot navigation in extreme car.
Dozens of different free skins and free realistic rally cars in drag racing games in the extreme car.
You will have more fun with bonus sections and drift mode.
Real Rally is great for console-quality rally on long and action extreme roads in real racing.

name: Rescue Heroes: Fire Frenzy
summary: If you have a little one who is ready to start playing videogames, then you should give RESCUE HEROES: Fire Frenzy a try. There are five mini-games to play; some are versions of classic kid's games, but with a fire theme. One is simple game MEMORY where players must match pictures of animals to rescue them from a fire, while another is similar to SIMON where players must memorize and repeat color combinations. Some of the other games are more action oriented and will challenge anyone's skill. For example, one game calls for the player to ride a jet ski to rescue people stuck on the other side of a river and drop buckets of water from a helicopter. If you have a Game Boy printer, the medals and awards earned can be printed. Now you can help a young gamer get started with RESCUE HEROES: Fire Frenzy.

name: RealSports Boxing
summary: RealSports Boxing is a boxing based video game developed by Atari and released in 1987 for the Atari 2600. It is part of the RealSports series of games from Atari. The game has a side view of the ring, allowing the player to move up and down, as well as from left to right. There are four selectable characters in the game, Lefty O'Leary, Jabbin' Jack, Macho Man, or Iron Fists. The aim of the game is to knock out the opposition by filling up a bar at the bottom of the screen which allows the player to deliver the knock out blow. The game can be played with two players simultaneously.

name: Reverie
summary: Can emptiness be an object? Reverie is a narrative-driven puzzle platformer about manipulating empty space. Grab and move empty space to solve puzzles in interesting ways!

name: Resident Fear: Redistribution
summary: Step into the heart of fear in 'Resident Fear: Redistribution.' Survive the undead, solve puzzles, and unveil the sinister in this gripping horror adventure by Gamesoft Studio. Dare to play?

name: Revload
summary: Revload is a couch Co-op arena shooter party game. Controll one of these cute revolver creatures and blast your friends into oblivion.

name: Reckless Getaway
summary: A top-down, action racing game for mobile devices. Get to the finish line without wrecking and amass as many points as you can!

name: Regulation Pool
summary: The world's most authentic billiards simulator

name: Regions of Ruin: Runegate
summary: Explore a rich and unique open world in this Adventure RPG. Uncover lost dwarven ruins, build a new society and re-establish dwarven kind.

name: Redneck Rift
summary: Every problem can be solved with a shotgun and every solution can be celebrated with an ice cold beer. Help Cletus quench his thirst after a long hard days work as he platforms his way through the bayou, time and back again in this retro styled, difficult action precision platformer game.

name: Reincarnated as a Rookie
summary: Reincarnated as a Rookie is a game of fighting monsters and leveling up. Users can obtain resources through quests to purchase and build equipment, trap pets and grow!

name: ReLinked
summary: "ReLinked" is a pixelated Sovietpunk action/PRG in which you have to fight back against extraterrestrial intelligence and uncover the mysterious secrets of faraway space.

name: Revive... Sosei
summary: The protagonist of the game, a high-school student, finds himself and other characters (mostly female high school students) trapped in a marine research facility. Exploring the abandoned building, the hero discovers the research staff died under mysterious circumstances. Was this a murder committed by a human being, or some sort of an unknown evil force? The hero does not have much time to think, since whatever took the lives of the scientists also threatens to murder them...

name: Repit 2
summary: The new Repit has become more interesting and less logical, the new (old redesigned) levels are more focused on interesting and unexpected passing

name: RealSports Baseball
summary: Atari 5200 port of RealSports Baseball.

name: Resurgence: Earth United
summary: Resurgence is a action RPG, where you dawn humanity's "armor" of the future. Teams of 4 can enter Earth's new Colosseum and Pilot the R.A.V MK II and fight endless waves slowly becoming the wall that stands between humanity and our would be destroyers from the stars.

name: Rencounter
summary:
Rencounter is a difficult, turn-based, RPG, roguelike game with a mysterious atmosphere. 
Help your squad survive while navigating through a network of tunnels and rooms. Distribute provisions and medicine to keep them alive.

name: Real Stories From The Grave: A Date to Keep
summary: Enter the shoes of Samuel Scowl, and experience the horror of a dissolving family unit and an unkempt mind. Discover the truth through Samuel’s warped perception and piece together the reality that eludes him.

name: RealSports Basketball
summary: An Atari 5200 port of RealSports Basketball.

name: Rebound VR
summary: Rebound VR is a fun and absorbing mix of racquetball and breakout-style gameplay. 42 levels give hours of gameplay. Great stressbuster! Suitable for all ages.

name: Reflections
summary: Reflections is a real-world adventure game where every action you take has meaningful consequences that radically shape the experience. Each action you take is punctuated by flushing the black and white environment with color, illustrating your progress and providing clues to what your future might hold.

name: ReverieTale
summary: VR Hack&Slash Game - Slice and dice your enemies with a sword Run up and down the field and use your skills to annihilate the enemies!

name: Region: Gear D
summary: Embark on an immersive VR FPS adventure! Customize your guns and outsmart AI foes in exhilarating PVE combat. Get ready for a unique strategic shooting experience, coming soon to Steam. Your ultimate VR battleground awaits – don't miss out!

name: Remote Control Dandy
summary: A Japan-only Playstation game in which you play a little boy controlling a giant robot via remote control. Developed by Sandlot, who later developed the Earth Defense Force series, and had a direct sequel -- Remote Control Dandy SF -- on the PS2.

name: Redhook's Revenge
summary: Redhook's Revenge is an educational game based upon the piracy period in our history. Made for DOS format, this point and click game allowed players to choose from multiple, fictional pirates as player characters but contained many in-game references to well known pirates such as Blackbeard.

name: Reigen Doushi
summary: Reigen Doushi is a beat 'em up video game released for the Nintendo Entertainment System in 1988 in Japan. It is based on the 1985 film, Mr. Vampire (Reigen Doushi being the Japanese title of the film).

name: Reality Falls
summary: In a dusty, dilapidated town on the former Soviet steppe, a young traveller finds himself embroiled in a strange and surreal plot that threatens the very existence of Reality Falls itself. A story-driven indie adventure, with classic point-and-click puzzles and a retro JRPG-style look and feel.

name: Resident Evil: Franchise Pack
summary:
This bundle includes:

- Resident Evil 4
- Resident Evil 5: Gold Edition
- Resident Evil 6

name: Red Sea Crossing
summary:
Red Sea Crossing was created by an independent programmer in 1983 and was discovered by the seller at a garage sale in 2007.
"It turns out this game was not even known to exist until I found it," the seller wrote in the auction's description. "An AtariAge member used the internet to track down the programmer and I spoke with him and got some more information. He said from what he could remember he advertised it in a local religious magazine but couldn't remember the name. In August of 2011 another AtariAge member found the original ad laying to rest that the game was indeed released in 1983."

name: Relic Alone
summary: Discover mysterious relics inside an ancient temple and progress through hidden chambers by using the power of strange "cores" to attract relics together.

name: Record of Lodoss War: Eiyuu Sensou
summary: Lodoss-tou Senki: Eiyuu Sensou is an RPG for the Sega Mega-CD. It was only released in Japan.

name: Reflec Beat Colette
summary: The third addition to the Reflec Beat franchise.

name: Redneck Skeet Shooting
summary: You take role of a country man who loves to shoot. Your objective is simple - shoot any flying object and master your marksman skills. Destroyed items give you gold coins, which you can use to unlock new locations, guns and playable characters.

name: Reiner Knizia's Medici HD
summary: Become a member of the infamous Medici family and compete to see who can make the most money in a no-holds-barred bidding war.

name: Redpulse
summary: Redpulse is a run 'n gun game inspired by bullet hell shooters that encourages speedy and aggressive gameplay.

name: Reiner Knizia's Samurai
summary: A turn-based strategy game set during feudal Japan. You goal is to gain the most influence from the 3 major castes.

name: ReMaz!
summary: If you like speed and good music, then you should definitely take a look at ReMaz! The speed of the game depends on the rhythm of the music that you can take from your computer.

name: Reverse
summary: The rotate & flip inherent visual image breaks the limitations of the perspective and formal logic of traditional 2D games. Play as the knight who lives by fire. Use visual rotation and flip to pass obstacles and break the shackles of perspective dimensions. Eventually obtain the eternal fire.

name: Rescue Tale
summary: Bobby faces new challenges when kids are kidnapped from their home village! Help him find the kids on the Island of Evil Devil from another dimension. The locals will help you get ahead.

name: Revenge of the Speeddemons!
summary: REVENGE of the Speeddemons is the eighteenth Pineapple Under the Sea Speedmapping series event. Featuring 7 maps, each from a unique author, ROTS promises to throw the player headfirst into an action movie of their own starring. Fit snugly into the lead role as you blast your way through hundreds of demons mercenaries across an occupied Earth. The Rowdy Rudy resource pack replaces nearly all of the monster bestiary as well as the majority of the weapons.

name: Relaxing VR Games: Mahjong
summary: Are you ready for the most virtually realistic Mahjong experience of all times? Solve a total of 162 boards with photo-realistic 360° backgrounds and breathe in the unique atmosphere of this popular game in an interactive, virtual environment!

name: Realms VR
summary: VR Fun Competitive Races, Fighting and Stealing from friends or the public. Or Race alone.

name: Rendezvous: A Space Shuttle Flight Simulation
summary: Simulator in which you must dock a spaceship.

name: Rescue Trivia
summary:
Rescue Trivia is a blend of both puzzle and trivia game. Answer all the questions and rescue the guy ! . Use swipe mechanics to cut the rope and free the guy. His life depends on you so choose wise.
Good Luck

name: Regimental Chess
summary: Regimental Chess is a battle game where large armies of chess pieces move and capture in mass formations. Up to 372 pieces in a single battle.

name: Reach
summary:
Reach is a short English fangame created as an entry for Dream Diary Jam 3, about an adult named Sewa who's moving away with their friends.

Gameplay focuses on exploration and effect finding. Alongside effects, the player must also find the protagonist's friends within the Otherworld and escort them to the Nexus. The player can also find cassette tapes which can be listened to using the cassette player in the bedroom, revealing little bits of the game's backstory.
The protagonist has a health bar that will deplete if they are caught by chasers.

name: Respublica
summary: Create a politician and start your legacy. Run in national and local elections. Create and vote on legislation. Respublica is an online roleplay game, where users can run for office and control the outcome of the world within the game.

name: Revolver360
summary: A horizontal scrolling & revolving shooter. Revolve and dodge the bullet hell!! 2 game mode, trophy system, and global scoreboards.

name: Retro Clicker
summary: Retro Clicker - A beautiful retro clicker with a huge variety of monsters. The player hires various units for the knocked out gold and goes through an endless world of levels.

name: Realms
summary: Welcome to Realms, a first-person shooter inspired by the rules and aesthetics of popular tabletop RPGs. Use The Die of Chaos along with your abilities and alternate gun fire to help Fortuna explore different realms and destroy any and all threats along the way.

name: Reign of the Succubus
summary: Reign of the Succubus is a RPG that takes place on the Island of Eden, where it is rumored that all of one's desires shall be fulfilled. But is this true or merely a rumor? Find out in this RPG developed by TechnoBrake and published by Kagura Games!

name: Red Ruin
summary: Red Ruin is a Space-Arcade-Shooter, in which you control two ships. Each ship has unique properties and they can switch position with each other. Using the advantages of both ships strategically will bring you victory.

name: Reverse Basket
summary: Move basket to catch balls and make combos to increase your score!

name: RealmLess
summary: Unknown reasons cause the world to collapse, and the remaining people restore order. Rebuild civilization in the waste soil and look for the past in the debris. Magic brings a turn for the better, magic brings everything.

name: Release Me
summary: Blast through hordes of mechanized enemies with spells and upgrades in this roguelite game. Choose your hero and delve into a sprawling skill tree, unlocking devastating magic attacks and obtaining powerful upgrades.

name: Reset Co.
summary: A game about resetting rooms.

name: RealSports Soccer
summary:
RealSports Soccer is Atari's second attempt at a soccer game for the Atari 2600. You can choose from one of 12 different games, and play either solo or against a friend as you pass and shoot your way to victory (or defeat).

Each team has three players with a specific area of the field to cover. A game lasts five or nine minutes and can be played on one of three difficulty levels, with each increasing the speed of gameplay and skill of the computer players.

name: RedCat: De Reusachtige Letterraket
summary: A game to expand vocabulary in a playful way.

name: RetroRaider: Three Crystals
summary: The third title in the RetroRaider series.

name: RealPlay Pool
summary:
RealPlay Pool is a Sports game, developed and published by In2Games, which was released in Europe in 2007.

A pool simulation game for the PS2 with its own wireless cue controller.

name: Revival and Exploration
summary: Revival and Exploration is an oriental simulation game. Decorate your town with diverse landscapes and buildings, recruit residents to live in, and build a thriving city! You can also lead armed residents on traveling to different landscapes such as grassland, desert, snow, and volcanoes.

name: Red Wings: American Aces - Heavy Metal
summary: Prove yourself in exciting aerial battles and make a name for your squad as the best aces of WWI with a set of Heavy Metal skins. DLC grants you an access to a set of unique Heavy Metal skins for several planes.

name: Retrieving the Past: Steam Edition
summary: Action, Adventure & Romance. Lots of beautiful women for you as Jensen Wenchester to meet and have fun times with. Beware there are sinister forces trying to stop you.

name: Red's Kingdom & Storm in a Teacup
summary: Red’s Kingdom & Storm in a Teacup Bundle

name: Resurrection of Soul Drain
summary: Resurrection of Soul Drain is a action-adventure 2D platformer with a retro style inspired by the 90s games.

name: Red Fury
summary: Fast paced arcade action where you become stronger as you are covered in the blood of your enemies and your own wounds.

name: Retrobloc CPC
summary: Retrobloc CPC is a 3d puzzle game, similar to the late 80's Block Out, for the Amstrad CPC 464 / 664 / 6182. The game is simple to play but hard to master!

name: Return of the Ninja
summary:
What your enemy fears the most is something it cannot see: You!

A mysterious army has attacked the land of Koga and stolen an ancient and sacred scroll. As a highly trained ninja, it's up to you to find out who is behind the trouble and recover Koga's precious treasure. To accomplish this, you'll need to recover six secret ninja tools hidden from the invaders. The enemy army may outnumber you a thousand to one, but you are a master of stealth-- and every military leader knows that a blind enemy is a vanquished foe.

name: Reflaser
summary: Reflaser is a puzzle game in which you control the laser reflections to activate various devices. Solve 72 puzzles with pleasant and soothing music.

name: Reinbo
summary: Reinbo is a hack and slash where you'll cut your way through waves of enemies and bosses on a journey to rescue your loved one.

name: Red Steel
summary:
Taking place in both the USA and Japan, Red Steel is a crime themed shooter that has the player controlled Scott Monroe fighting off various members of the Yakuza clans in order to rescue his fianceé.
It features sword duels and gun fights using the Wiimote, to allow the player to swing the control as they would swing a sword. The positioning and movement actions of the Wiimote also let the player aim their weapons almost as they would a real gun.

name: Reverie
summary: Reverie is an action adventure game set on a fictional island in New Zealand, inspired by the legend of Maui and the Giant Fish where the demigod himself fishes up the North Island with a powerful fishhook.

name: Redd's Runaway
summary: Stop the Underworld's hordes of demons and ghouls in this Arcade game, inspired by the Day of the Dead and Halloween.

name: Retro Wars
summary: Take on an entire army in this 80s inspired retro top down vertical scrolling shooter. Be a one man war machine or take a friend into battle for some fun 2 player local co-op.

name: Re:Award - More Corridor 1
summary: Short third person game. The game is a free add-on to the base game.

name: Rent's Due: The Game
summary: Rent's Due: The Game is a third-person platformer game where you take control of protagonist Tesha Robinson. Tesha is in need of some money and in order to get it, she must complete different levels with various obstacles that provide a huge challenge.

name: ReStreamed
summary: ReStreamed is a horror game where you take on the role of a streamer streaming a horror game. Keep your hundreds of totally "real" viewers entertained as you try to escape your mysterious captors.

name: Red Barton and The Sky Pirates
summary: Red Barton and the Sky Pirates is an exciting 3rd person arcade combat flight shooter.

name: Reversi
summary: Reversi is a pre-installed game for Microsoft Windows 1.0, 2.0 and 3.0.

name: Revel
summary: Revel is a fun and original suit-based card game that will test your skills and instincts. Stepping out of the shadows of blackjack and poker, Revel will give you unprecedented ways to play such as buying cards and dynamic card values. Will you pin down its elusive optimal strategy?

name: Retro Style: Pixel Art Jigsaw Puzzles
summary: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Rebornia
summary: Embark on a captivating journey through Rebornia, a turn-based MMORPG with immersive low-poly visuals and dynamic gameplay. Join a vibrant community, unleash powerful spells, and forge your destiny in a fantastical world filled with adventure and discovery.

name: Renny Blaster
summary: A side strolling beat 'em up where you play as detective Fujiro who is hired to stop a gothic horror in the city.

name: Real Stories from the Grave: The Body
summary: Real Stories from the Grave: The Body is a short horror experience made for the Haunted Ps1 Jam. You transport a body in the middle of the night.

name: Resurrection Island: Love and Victory
summary: The game is a turn-based bullet hell RPG, where a knight with amnesia arrives on a mysterious island and embarks on an adventure to find a way to leave.

name: Resuffer: Down the Rabbit Hole
summary: Precision based, obstacles averting game. ADDICTING and UNFORGIVING as HELL!

name: Resttw
summary: Restt is an addictive game, which will test how well can you handle your anger and stress. The game is in hand-made graphics with a retro touch. The whole game is inspired by Slovak streamer resttpowered.

name: ReversiBot
summary: The roles of keyboard and mouse will be reversed

name: Redemption Cemetery: Dead Park
summary: Can you help three souls escape a deadly amusement park?

name: Retro Snake
summary: Retro Snake is a challenge-based Snake game with retro design that is suitable for all people.

name: ReflexShot
summary: ReflexShot is a small game that help you practice shooting target in video game, to help you practice fast shooting in fps games. The game provides rifle practice, target shooting, small ball shooting and other practice modes.

name: Rest in Jelly
summary: Welcome to Rest in Jelly, a videogame that will test your platforming ability and precision in ways that will drive you crazy. Control Jack the Devil in his adventure to terminate the fearful jelly rebellion. All you will need is just a button… plus an almost non-human accuracy and nerves of steel.

name: Reflections of Life: Call of the Ancestors
Redcon
summary: Command your own battle fortress! Assemble the mightiest artillery force and bombard your foes into oblivion! Lead the Empire State offensive against Traitor General and his foul rebellion.

name: Replicators Defence
summary: Small game in Tower Defence genre with elements of shooter. Kill Replicators all by yourself or make perfect defence with different turrets.

name: Retro Classix 2-in-1 Pack: Express Raider & Shootout
summary: EXPRESS RAIDER: Save the Old West from thieving train robbers, with your trusty rifle and faithtul horse. SHOOTOUT: Stop the criminal gangsters and save the civilians in this action-packed shooter.

name: RedCat Megapack
summary: Four exciting and educational adventures of RedCat and his opponents Brutus the Bulldog and Max the Mouse

name: RedCat: Het Levende Kleurboek
summary: In this game, children can draw and color on the computer. They can color in coloring pages that have a movie attached to them and they can make drawings complete with special patterns.

name: RedCat Megapack 2
summary: Four exciting and educational adventures of Redcat and his opponents Brutus the Bulldog and Max the Mouse

name: Return of the USSR
summary: Help revive the Soviet Union!

name: Reincarnation
summary: Reincarnation is a medieval/fantasy themed turn-based RPG card game with unique deck-building, character development and class selection experiences. Devise your attack and defense strategies to defeat monsters and gain rewards. Join the action-packed world of Reincarnation today!

name: RedCat: De Duistere Dierendiefstal
summary: RedCat travels in a UFO along the five continents and looks for all kinds of mammals, birds, reptiles, amphibians and fish.

name: RedCat Megapack 3
summary: Three fun and educational CD-ROMs and a music CD in a box

name: RedCat: De Brutale Bankroof
summary: Brutus and Max have robbed a bank. With the money they want to buy a lot of cheese and bones. On the way to the DogRock, an asteroid punches a hole in Brutus and Max's spaceship, scattering all the money through space. RedCat is going after the money.

name: RedCat: Het Machtige Monumenten Mysterie
summary: Brutus and Max have locked Big Ben, Tower Bridge, Piccadilly Circus, St Paul's Cathedral and Buckingham Palace so no one can get in or out. They want a lot of bones and cheese, otherwise things will stay locked. In a race through the subway, RedCat must beat Brutus and Max to eventually find the keys at the stations with which he can open the locks.

name: Resogun: Defenders
summary:
Defenders adds two new modes, Protector and Commando, a smaller local co-op mode called Battle Mode, new Challenges and trophies.

Resogun Defenders includes an all new trophy set and new DLC-specific Challenges.

name: Renegade III: The Final Chapter
summary:
Renegade 3: The Final Chapter is a scrolling beat'em up computer game released on the Amstrad CPC, Commodore 64, MSX and ZX Spectrum systems in the late 1980s by Ocean Software under their "Imagine" label. The game is a sequel to Target: Renegade which itself is a sequel to the arcade game Renegade.

Unlike the first two games, Renegade 3 follows the character known only as "Renegade" as he travels through time to rescue his captured girlfriend. It also dropped the two-player mode found in the previous title.

name: Rescue Heroes: Molten Menace
summary: Kaboom! A volcano erupted near the quiet town of Misty Peaks! Spring into action with the Rescue Heroes Team and help save the town! Race against a river of lava with Jake Justice, and soar above rooftops with Ariel Flyer in search of stranded people and pets. Use your quick wits and problem-solving skills to complete each rescue mission and save the day!

name: Reload
summary: RELOAD is the ultimate target shooting game. Participate in shooting drills that are used by elite military, law enforcement, or competition shooters. Shoot weapons ranging from popular sports shooting guns all the way up to heavy military weapons. Your targets are made of paper, wood, clay, and metal, and are never living things.

name: Remnants of a Beautiful Day
summary: An artistic narrative designed to evoke a surreal feeling in the player on a psychological level. Platformer-puzzle-advanture with a handful of different endings!

name: Retention: A Love Story
summary: A short puzzle game with a big story to tell. Dive in to reveal the mysteries of Amy's past.

name: Remember
summary: Someone somehow gets in touch with you. And you don't know what they are.

name: Reknum DX
summary: An old school new retro adventure

name: Resort Boss: Golf
summary: Unleash your inner tycoon and build your golf club from a one-hole course to a 5-star resort. Paint the land with luscious fairways, design world-class golf courses and manage staff to attract VIP golfers from all over the planet.

name: Rescue Operations Simulator
summary: Rescue Operations Simulator is a game where you play the role of USAR (Urban Search and Rescue) member and a team leader. You will arrange and execute rescue operations from real life catastrophic events that shocked and changed the whole world.

name: Rebels: Under the Spell of Magic - Chapter 4
summary: A Visual Novel game about adventure, fantasy, magic and friendship. This is a continuation of Chapter 3. There are only a few choices that can be made, and some paths to choose from. The decisions do not have an impact on the ending, instead they provide slightly different content.

name: Reksio i Kretes: Tajemnica Trzeciego Wymiaru
summary: A mysterious buzz in the middle of the night puts Reksio, Kretes and the Inventor Rooster on their feet. The friends, regardless of the danger, set out on a scouting journey. Soon it turns out that a powerful Black Monolith has grown in the clearing in the forest. Kretes touches its surface and at once all three heroes are drawn into the depths of the third dimension.

name: Redemption: Saints and Sinners
summary: Squad of professional soldiers was sent to scout distant space station. After the accident, that station were evacuated long ago and all the exits were blocked with power shields. But the incoming signal from there made the Commander concerned. Squad's ship were fired upon and the survivors woke up at the station.

name: Repulsor: Pod-Racing Game
summary: Repulsor: Pod-Racing Game is a small racing game.

name: Real Time Conflict: Shogun Empires
summary: In Shogun Empires, players assume the role of one of two brothers who are locked in bloody combat in feudal Japan. Conquering neighboring territories and amassing formidable armies, only one warrior is able to survive the deadly endgame to realize his ambitions and claim the title of Shogun. In their quest to become Shogun, players utilize the Nintendo DS's touch screen to plot complex battle plans while watching the action play out through detailed 3D graphics on the top screen. Touch screen mini-games such as duels, castle sieges and sea battles enhance the battle experience and give Shogun Warrior impressive gameplay variety and replay value. In between encounters, gamers are able to use diplomacy and military strategy to manage their forces. For the ultimate in feudal warfare, up to 8 players can engage in enormous clashes through the wireless multiplayer capabilities of the Nintendo DS.

name: Revengers of Vengeance
summary: Revengers of Vengeance is a combination of RPG, vertical shooter, and fighting game with a fantasy/anime style. There are ten available characters, each with their own animated backstory and fighting techniques. You must choose a hero and guide their stats to create a formidable fighter capable of taking down the Devil King and freeing the land.

name: Ready 2 Rumble: Revolution
summary: Ready 2 Rumble: Revolution is the third game in the Ready 2 Rumble Boxing series

name: Rental Chan
summary: Racheal works for an app called Rent-A-Friend. She gets paid for being friends with people for a limited time. She needs money to pay for her little sister's hospital bills who is being treated for a rare disease. When a rare opportunity comes up, a family is worried about their daughter and is willing to pay Rachael a large sum of money to transfer schools and befriend with until the end of the school year.

name: Resident Evil 6: Anthology
summary:
This special edition contains:

- Resident Evil 6 (disc version)
- Resident Evil 5: Gold Edition (download version)
- Resident Evil 4 (download version)
- Resident Evil 3: Nemesis (download version)
- Resident Evil 2: Dual Shock Version (download version)
- Resident Evil: Director's Cut (download version)

name: Reel Deal Slots: American Adventure
summary: A gambling simulation in the Reel Deal Slots series.

name: Reality
summary: Reality is a free short First-Person horror game, it uses a graphical style to represent the present mood of the game. It gives the player the ability to choose and get slightly different results. The game has many mysteries you might want to uncover.

name: Realms of Riddles: Wizards'Keep
summary: Immerse yourself in a captivating first-person escape room in a magical medieval world. Interact with an interactive environment, discover secrets and solve challenging puzzles to unravel a plot full of mysteries - challenge your wits!

name: Reverb Arcade
summary: In the ever-changing battleground of Reverb, can you keep up with the multiplying threats? Surviving won't be as easy as it seems, especially when echoes morphs into a new enemy. We invite you to a vibrant neon world, where a bounce can reverberate into a new challenge

name: Real Tennis
summary: You can freely enjoy tennis anywhere through VR. Get trophies based on the Winning Points you get for every win. Practice swing at the training ground, compete with bots, and raise your ranking score with pvp competitions with friends!

name: Return to Eden
summary: The second game in Level 9's science fiction trilogy dealing with the colonisation of the planet Eden.

name: Refactoro: Chaotic Farm
summary: Bring your robots to help overwhelmed farmers and ranchers restore order to their chaotic lands. Use your programming skills to code the robots to clean fields, assist with cattle, fix pens, and get a share of the farm's profitability.

name: React-O-Matic
summary: Dominate your favorite games with better reaction times! React-O-Matic training forces your brain to adapt to stimuli that are much faster than what you'd normally encounter in a real-world setting. Getting comfortable with extremely fast stimulation will make your average reaction times faster!

name: Restaurant Manager
summary: Bu mevcut tüm kaynakları kullanmak için her zamanki eatery bir restoran zinciri yapın.

name: Remission
summary: Remission - Due to a Radioactive accident at the Hospital, Cancer cells have mutated into human form. It is up to You to save the city.

name: Redshift VR
summary: Redshift VR is a virtual reality disc-throwing game where precision and skill are needed to destroy the targets before their destination.

name: Red Fox and the Four Seasons: Design My Forest
summary: Are you addicted to design & decorating? You can play with it now to design your dream forest with the most adorable foxes!

name: ReBall
summary: Welcome to the game ReBall. This is a minimalistic arcade puzzle game in the genre breakout.

name: Retro Relics
summary: Retro Relics is a cozy sandbox and story-driven treasure hunting simulation, where you immerse yourself into nature and search for ancient artifacts with your metal detector. Explore, dig, help other people find lost belongings and complete your coin and relics collection!

name: Retro Arcade Shooter - Attack from Pluto
summary: Get three classic arcade space shooter games in one game! Blast your way into the future or is it really the past since this retro arcade space shooter returns you to the classic age (or glory days) of arcade games. Retro shooter action combined with updated graphics make this a must have for any arcade fan. Random* enemy spaceships and killer bosses make this game an unbelievable endless challenge. Collect as many powerups as you can to beef up your fire power and increase your chances of survival. Play all three games because each one is different and see how you do. Blast away!

name: Red Blue
summary: Red Blue is a quickness game. If you want to develop eyesight or APM(Action Per Minute), just challenge this game.

name: Realm of The Lieutenant
summary: A repackaged episode of maps done by Kendrick "The Lieutenant" Curtis from 1998-2008.

name: Red Slammer
summary: Medium-sized terracotta style map with classic gameplay, a built-in skill selection room and an additional alternative game mode.

name: Refugity
summary:
What if a refugee crisis happened in your country?
Find out by discovering the highly sophisticated strategy-simulation of Refugity!
Based on real world data, playing ‘Refugity’ becomes an fun, intellectual and interesting experience. See how big the regional and global impact of migration can be.

name: Real Life of Soldiers
summary: Every city has been taken over by a virus, citizens are sick... Collect medicines and vaccines and take it to the city hospital to cure patients infected with this dangerous virus. Only on the way you will find "the viruses" to destroy and people to rescue. That's your mission, soldier.

name: RedShip
summary: Match colors to build your own spaceship! Explore space and fight alien spacecrafts while acquiring weapons and upgrading your red ship. Become the space pilot you’ve always wanted to be.

name: RedLine
summary: You craved a life free from trouble, with no gangs, no licks, and zero turmoil. But life had a different story in mind. To make things even worse, your last job, which meant to bankroll your retirement, took a turn for the worse...

name: ReMove
summary: ReMove is a sokoban puzzle game about moving and giving up your movement to escape an experiment laboratory

name: Remothered: Tormented Fathers & Broken Porcelain - Double Pack
summary: Remothered Double Pack comprises two games: Tormented Fathers and Broken Porcelain.

name: Rescue Roby
summary: Rescue Roby is a physics-based puzzle game for mobile phones.

name: Retroninjacyberassassin
summary: This shareware floppy classic transports you to an alternate early 1990s, where the first person genre began not as a 3D adaptation of the side scrolling and top down shooters that came before, but rather as an adaptation of the 80s beat 'em up/hack n' slash classics.

name: Resonance Wars
summary: This game is a turn-based strategy game. You will be playing the role of Lord Lyle, the planner. You will have to plan a battle against the empire to save the Estelle Kingdom. Don't worry, your assistant is queen Aviana and her warriors. You can order them freely.

name: Requeue
summary: guide a robot to the goal by resetting its commands

name: Remnant II: The Forgotten Kingdom
summary:
In this 2nd DLC for REMNANT II, players will piece together the forgotten history of the lost tribe of Yaesha as they attempt to quell the vengeful wrath of an ancient stone spirit called Lydusa. Navigate the lingering traces of torment, treachery, and death that haunt the land's once proud ziggurats, as Lydusa's living stones wander the crumbling remnants of an ancient civilization in search of fresh blood. In a brand-new storyline, players must uncover the secrets of the lost tribe by exploring a mysterious new area within the world of Yaesha. In this strange new location, players will traverse new dungeons, acquire powerful gear—including a new Archetype, “The Invoker"— meet unexpected allies, and face new threats in their quest to return some semblance peace to the forgotten kingdom.

Features:
- New Storyline, Dungeons, and Area Based in the World of Yaesha
- New Archetype - The Invoker
- Many Items and Powerful Weapons that Enhance Gameplay
- New Bosses, Characters and Fearsome Creatures to Encounter

name: Rezarlisia Stories
summary: “Rezarlisia Stories” is a command battle-style role-playing game now available on Steam! The story is told in a worldview that combines retro dots from the good old days and 3D.

name: Reburning Meteorite
summary: in 'Rekindled Starfall, a solo-crafted RTS+Roguelite+Card game, hire troops, build squads, tackle missions: combat, gathering, deliveries, bosses. Troops auto-battle nearby foesl,use cards for support. Upgrade town facilities and cards through mission rewards, enhancing squad strength."

name: Revenger 84
summary: Top-down shooter.

name: Redout: Ultimate Edition
summary: Race faster than ever! Redout will test your skills to the limit as you dart at incredible speed across all manner of futuristic environments, both in offline and online play. Includes all of the game’s DLCs, as well as the official artbook and soundtrack.

name: RetroDoge: Saving Elon
summary: RetroDoge is a play to earn token that includes a classic pixel style game that showcases rex, our hero, as he fights tooth and nail to rescue his master from the god of scams. with villain's like Retro Ape and 8bit snake, enduring harsh, unforgiving terrains including the classic forest and castle! Rex will pound on them all with cool and hilarious weapons like a rubber chicken or Nerf style weaponry, lasers and more!

name: Reksarych's Sudoku
summary: This game is a classic "Sudoku"! We wish you all a pleasant game.

name: Return Alive
summary: Return Alive is a 2D shooter in which you need to help a girl survive. Defeat animals in an unequal battle and find a way out. A lot of bonuses that drop out of the baskets will help you with this. Dodge the boulders and defeat the lion king.

name: Repair Plane
summary: Repair broken pieces and install new one if necessary to get ready for the fly! Enjoy repairing cargo plane, business jet, fighter, jet, helicopter and many aircrafts..

name: Reel Life
summary: Reel Life is a slot machine-centric farming sim where luck, rather than scale, helps to determine your fiscal success. Farming, fishing, mining and more – collect goods to sell from slot machines scattered throughout the world. Leave it all to fate or game the system to make your dreams come true!

name: Read the Unfinished Donkey Kong Country Story...and then Finish the Adventure!
Realm of Shades
summary: Realm of Shades is a episode replacement PWAD for Doom II created by Pedro Francisco Puicón (NokturnuS). It is NokturnuS' first public release, and is an episode containing seven levels utilizing some custom textures.

name: Re:Pairn’t
summary: A remorseful father mends his broken relationships.

name: Retro Jam 3
summary: Third retro map jam: two "Vertical metal / runic"-themed maps by FifthElephant and skacky. The map sources are included in the pak.

name: Rebelstar II: Alien Encounter
summary: 1 or 2 player turn based strategy in the Rebelstar series. Capture the eggs, kill the queen and escape on the shuttle.

name: Redline F-1 Racer
summary: North American port of Aguri Suzuki F-1 Super Driving. The only difference is that this version has no relation with the driver in a licensing standpoint, but he is still depicted in-game.

name: Reader Rabbit
summary: Reader Rabbit is an educational game for children 3 through 7 designed to help reading and spelling skills. There are four different word games to play of increasing difficulty: a word sorter, a picture labeler, the word train, and a variation of the game memory.

name: Re:Zero Kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Infinity
Rememory
summary: A simple game of memory to learn about the features and partners that make up RedwoodJS.

name: Reincarnation of Ocean
summary: A horizontal RPG adventure game, in the endless cycle of fierce battles with underwater creatures, using the gems dropped by the battle to become more powerful-the equipment upgrade system can continuously strengthen your role.

name: Red Brick Hotel
summary: The features in Red Brick Hotel are the option to talk to the guests, use gears and even build some small barricades or watch towers, and not only weapons, but the main part is to clear the area and shoot the zombies!

name: Respawn Man
summary: What kills you makes you stronger! Use your extra lives to solve puzzles in this delightfully morbid puzzle platformer with a soundtrack by VVVVVV's composer, Souleye!

name: Resident Evil
summary: Resident Evil was planned for a GameBoy Color adaptation in a project outsourced to British company HotGen Studios, Ltd. Intended for an Autumn 1999 release, it was repeatedly delayed due to programming issues, and ultimately cancelled in March 2000 in favour of M4, Ltd.'s alternate proposal for a new game made from the ground-up for the console, which became Resident Evil: Gaiden.

name: Return to Pirate's Island 2
summary: Scott Adam's comeback to the world of text adventures after a long break. Again the player can collect a series of treasures and return them to a central place for scoring.

name: Retro
summary: Retro is an arcade-style mini game collection with an arcade, story mode and a "corrupted" arcade! Play though the mini games in arcade mode, battle the virus in story mode or try for a new high score with much more challenging games in the corrupted arcade!

name: Return of Junior's Revenge
summary: The "sequel" to Donkey Kong Jr. clone Junior's Revenge, it's more or less an early example of an enhanced remake.

name: Reilla: Sweets Adventure
summary: A magical world full of sweets! The heroine, Leila, is a wizard girl who loves sweets. She comes to the world of sweets with her "Sweets Parasol," a magical umbrella that turns sweets into power!A magical sweet adventure filled with sweets begins now!

name: Reader Rabbit 1
summary: This remake of the original Reader Rabbit was the beginning of the franchise split between different age groups.

name: Reign of Bullets
summary: Reign of Bullets is a shoot 'em up with epic loot and lots of guns. Upgrade your ship and customize your weapons to build the ultimate fighter plane.

name: Record of Grancrest War: Quartet of War
Return of the Quack
summary: Matt Furie and Chevy Ray Johnson Team up for this side scrolling shooter featuring Matt Furie's whimsical characters.

name: Rendition: Guantanamo
summary: Rendition: Guantanamo was scheduled for release in late 2009, but was ultimately cancelled.

name: Redacted
summary: A first-person zombie survival game.

name: Resident Evil 7: Biohazard - Cloud Version: Z Version
Re:Award
summary: Corridor walking simulator. You can walk in the corridor. Rin and Scarlett came to Rin's grandfather's house in the country.

name: Relicborn
summary: Relicborn is a story-driven platformer game that tells the story of Alice, a young dressmaker who finds herself in an undiscovered world, searching for a distant, long lost possibility. ARPG elements, fantasy environments, legendary loot, a skill system along with many secrets to be discovered!

name: Recycle Master
summary: Clean it up!

name: Repton 2
summary: Repton 2 follows the same basic 'Boulderdash' puzzle style gameplay as its predecessor, and also adds a few new features to freshen things up: meteors, which would fall from the sky and kill upon contact, skulls, static objects that would kill the player if they were careless enough to walk into it, and the fast-moving spirits which would journey around the map hugging walls and objects and veering to any left-angles they came across.

name: Remember Us
summary: "Remember Us" is an emotional adventure game where you witness the final moments of Dean, an Alzheimer's patient, as he tries to remember his beloved wife Marta and his past before passing away. Find objects, revive memories, and discover Dean's poignant farewell moment.

name: Rescuties! VR
summary: Rescuties VR will have you dashing around your living room catching babies and tossing them into rescue vehicles in your mission to save the day.

name: Rectangle Guy
summary: Introducing Rectangle Guy, a brand new game by The Bare Minimum Studios. Rectangle Guy (game) features Rectangle Guy (character) in this platforming adventure! With over 30 levels and 6 boss fights and a plethora of post-game content, there's plenty to do and see in this wacky game.

name: Resonant
summary: Resonant is an open, rhythm based experience. Explore a world that breathes with sound, choosing your musical path to discover all that the landscape has to reveal.

name: Real Car Driving
summary: If you are looking for a realistic driving simulator where you can drive a variety of cars on big open world maps, this game is just for you!

name: Red Knight: Light RPG
summary: This is a short and rather funny short RPG work.

name: RedCat: De Toffe Tijdreis
summary: RedCat eats a snack at the Burger Cat. While he is eating, Brutus and Max sabotage his UFO. When RedCat wants to leave again, his UFO runs amok and RedCat ends up in a cave. From WhizKitty (his girlfriend) he hears that he has ended up in prehistoric times and that the UFO needs energy, so that he can 'return' to the present.

name: Retool
summary: Retool is a 3D hacking puzzle game where you try to escape incomplete orbital stations by hacking into computers to rewire outputs of electronics.

name: Reign Over
summary: Build a fortress, raise an army, conquer your rivals! Hire heroes, equip them with rare artifacts and master their special abilities. Capture buildings and resources to train units and hire mercenaries. Lead them to victory in turn based combat!

name: Realm of Abhorrus
summary: Smite the faces of malevolent monstrosities.

name: Retro TV Game Collection
summary: A bundle of four vintage plug and play games, re-created with new gameplay modes and much needed quality of life improvements. Everything great about gaming in the 1970s, without tuning the TV to channel 6.

name: Retro Karting 22
summary: Welcome to Retro Karting 22. Your reaction time, decision making and driving skills will be tested to the limit! Choose your character and kart and drift your way to victory! Race your own ghost images in this single player, time trial based, indie karting game.

name: Red Pixel
summary: Red Pixel is a 2D deathmatch platformer, released as open source in 2001.

name: Resistance: The 8th Wave
summary: A high-degree-of-freedom strategy FPS shooting game that incorporates Rougelike gameplay. It allows users to pay more attention to the elements of strategy selection while shooting refreshingly, and to grow and learn in the process of continuous challenges and pressure.

name: Red Square Escape
summary: Red square escape is a top down 2D movement game where you are the red square and have to escape through different levels. Each level is spiked with traps and obstacles you need to overcome. Simple controls, simple art style and simple fun are guaranteed here. Have you got the skills to escape?

name: Red and the Whispering Woods
summary: SCREAM and "whisper" in this voice controlled thriller with a twist...

name: Rebels and Redcoats II
summary: Rebels and Redcoats recreates the battlefields of the American Revolutionary War. The war began in 1775 when the American colonies rebelled against the British Empire, declaring their independence in 1776.

name: Revived Souls
summary: Explore a Celtic world full of magic devices and talking animals, Collect and Combine objects on your journey to Solve puzzles, Uncover the mysteries behind the village's impending doom

name: Reviser
summary: 'Reviser' is a top-down twin stick shooter with RPG / Treasure Hunter-like elements. Your mission is to explore with the team members, get various weapons with random parameters and conquer all areas.

name: RealFlight 8 Horizon: Hobby Edition
summary: Add 13 Horizon Hobby Aircraft and 2 Challenges to RealFlight 8.

name: Revenge of Roger Rouge
summary: Navigate a tale as unpredictable as the seas in this thrilling arcade game brought to life with naval battles that will blow you away! Vibrant visuals and oldschool gameplay collide to provide a shoot 'em and loot 'em adventure. Pursue a legendary adversary across Caribbean waves, Asian thunderstorms and the deceptive calm of the Sargasso Sea. Can you send hordes of skeleton boats, turtle ships and great warships to Davey Jones while chasing visions of riches and revenge?

name: Ready Steady Bang
summary:
Ready Steady Bang is a beautifully addictive quick-fire duelling game. 
 
Play face-to-face with a friend on a single screen in 2 player mode or pit your trigger finger against 10 of the fastest outlaws and collect a hoard of achievements along the way. 
 
Progress through the game to unlock 31 unique cowboy deaths, then show them off in your Kill Gallery. 
 
Game Center integration allows you to compete against a world of cowboys and girls. 
 
Are you fast enough?

name: Replica: Atomic Punk
summary: Replica: Atomic Punk is a South Korean cyberpunk RTS in the style of StarCraft.

name: Retro Combat
summary: Casual FPS, no microtransactions. Play online or with bots with machine guns, tanks, and planes.

name: Reel Deal Slots: Gods of Olympus
summary: An entry in the Reel Deal Slots gambling franchise.

name: Retro Golden Age: The Abbey of Crime
summary: Get ordained in The Abbey of Crime and solve the dangerous mystery that has been hidden among the dark pages of history for more than five centuries. Become friar Guillermo de Mosce and return to your order to discover the reasons why you were imprisoned by the Holy Inquisition.

name: Real Racing 2
summary:
