Real Racing 2 expands the racing grid of its predecessor, with a new range of cars and tracks and a multitude of new options.

16 cars line up on the starting grid, with 30 fully licensed rides available such as the McLaren F1, Nissan GT-R, BMW M6 or the Chevrolet Camaro SS. You'll be able to race them, using motion control and touch screen acceleration or braking, through a full grand prix style season, local and online multiplayer, or in a simple quick race. 15 maps are available, each with their own unique twists and turns, bridges and tunnels. Begin as a rookie and win your way up the leader boards to become a pro, winning trophies via numerous challenges, one on one battles and time trial events. In game currency will allow you to upgrade your ride or purchase a new and improved one.

16 players can compete online together at any one time, and you'll also have the option of 8 players in a local wifi session.

name: Reviver: The Real-Time Adventure
summary: Reviver: The Real-Time Adventure is an adventure game designed by Katsunori Yoshimura and released by Arsys Software in July 1987. It featured the concept of a real-time persistent world.

name: Reel Deal Slots: Adventure III - World Tour
summary: The third entry in the Reel Deal Slots adventure sub-series.

name: Retro Horror Story
summary: Embark on a heart-pounding journey through a cursed maze in this thrilling survival horror game. Evade a terrifying monster and solve intricate puzzles to uncover dark secrets. Can you escape the nightmare?

name: Retro Drive: Revamped
summary: Get your '80s vibes in full throttle with Retro Drive! Immerse yourself in the retro aesthetic, gripping narrative, and an unforgettable synthwave soundtrack.

name: Redemption Cemetery: Bitter Frost
summary: Fifth and last game of Redemption Cemetery series.

name: Return
summary: Return is an anime-style platformer-hack-and-slash game where an agent works for an organization that makes contracts with the government to take down any threat.

name: Ready Steady Go
summary: Sports game for ZX Spectrum, in the style of Track and Field. Events are hurdles, canoeing, cycling, and soccer penalty saving.

name: Recursion Deluxe
summary: A crash landing on a world inhabited by bee-like lifeforms. Stranded, our hero must unravel the rules of this uncharted planet to find their way home.

name: Revenge on the Streets 2
summary: In this game you will play with (Saul) who had his sister kidnapped by a crime boss, (Saul) proposes to save her and will make his revenge on the streets.

name: Re-wind 2005
summary: Re-wind 2005 is a game for the Game Wave.

name: Rezel Cross
summary:
The world in Rezel Cross is undergoing an awakening after a comet passes by. Beasts undergo rapid evolution and dormant abilities in humans start to manifest. Increased strength, faster reflexes and agility transform a small number of humans into super humans known as "rezel". While the world is in constant flux Isle, Lefia and three other heroes gifted with rezel powers begin their tale.
The game is split into 20 chapters and the heroes gain the powers of teleport, time pause, psycho kenesis, transformation and x-ray vision as they progress. In addition, the battles are in full 3D with an XMB like interface and the heroes get skill points to unlock new abilities and Rezel Arts as well as Hyper Rezels.
The game has character designs by Eiji Kandeda who also did character designs for Aquarion and a script written by the team who wrote Arc the Lad III & IV.

name: Red Evil
summary: Alice returned to her hometown after a long journey. But nobody was there. Save the inhabitants and defeat the leader of the gang.

name: Retwined
summary: A game about two twins finding their way to one another to rebuild their broken home.

name: Rem Psycho
summary: 101% Accurate Dream Sim

name: Recon Control: Operation Crossfire
summary: Prepare to lead your squad through another deadly operation, Crossfire.

name: Real World Racing
summary:
REAL WORLD RACING is a top-down racing game using high-quality aerial imagery that lets you race through the world's greatest cities! 
Speed through London, Paris, Berlin, Rome and many other cities from a new and realistic perspective in a refreshing take on racing simulations.

name: Reach the Moon!
summary: The game Reach the Moon! it is an experiment & casual game in same time. The main character is a bodybuilder which with the help of his enormous biceps throws a man into the air. His main goal is to make the man reach the galaxy. Will he be able to see the earth from above?

name: Retro Arcade Adventure Remade
summary:
Retro styled Hack and Slash action with a fire breathing variety of Power Ups and huge bosses.

* A one screen hack and slash arcade type game.
* You are running around on one screen and hack your way through waves of enemies.
* Power Ups will help you, e.g. you can transform into a giant dragon and breath fire all over the place.

name: RE: Prince of Nigeria
summary: "Once upon a time, I met a prince... the Prince of Nigeria. Throughout his lovely poetry and wonderful serenades of emails, I couldn't help but fall in love with him. Too bad falling in love with a prince isn't all flowers and bunnies as fairytales claimed - we were playing a dangerous game of passion, wildfire and strife. What awaited us both was a story of heartbreak, of tragedy, of broken romance, and deer droppings..." RE: Prince of Nigeria is a crack comedy about a girl who falls in love with the perpetrator of a commonly known Nigerian internet scam.

name: Regalia: Of Men and Monarchs - The Unending Grimoire
summary:
"Your little kingdom just got a little more crowded with the arrival of Bassanius the Mystic! He came to Ascalia with his most valued possessions, including the powerful Grimoire that will open new possibilities for you and your friends. 
 
The Grimoire allows players to challenge themselves in randomly generated battles in return for additional visual customization options for the party members. It is divided into chapters and within the Grimoire, the kid gloves are off - all sorts of unexpected combinations can happen. Do you know what would happen if you were to fight the Dwarven Ashigaru and the Visage of Anguish at the same time? What if the Fomorian Ancient allied itself with the Mau? These battles will thoroughly test your skills - and sanity. 
Fighting within the Grimoire takes no in-game time (they do not advance the calendar) and can be played anytime you want, right from the point when you build the Mystic's Tower for Bassanius. 
 
The Unending Grimoire DLC comes with: 
- A whole new activity - the Grimoire 
- An entirelyl new feature - Visual Customization for Characters 
- 39 character skins to unlock! 
- New battlegrounds for the Grimoire battles 
- A new villager to recruit - Bassanius the Mystic 
- A new building to construct - Mystic's Tower 
- A new Personal Bond to pursue 
- New cutscenes with additional voiceover"

name: Restless Kids
summary: Restless Kids is a multiplayer thriller game. A group of children try to undermine the reever's job in choosing the neighborhood. But it should not be forgotten that the reever is a police officer. CHILDREN YOU HAVE 15 MINUTES!

name: Resync
summary: After crash-landing on a structure orbiting a distant star, work alongside your robotic allies to solve puzzles and uncover the true purpose of the mysterious outpost.

name: Red Crucible: Able Archer
summary: Tabletop real-time RTS strategy war game.

name: Redacted Epilogue
summary: Set a few years after the events of the comic book "REDACTED: Revival", this 2.5D first-person RPG with turn-based combat continues the story of the former Black Ops experimental soldier known by the codename "The Black Anvil", as he prepares to defend civilization from another latent threat.

name: Reigning
summary: A singleplayer, story game where you can make decisions and read your way through history.

name: Redemption Cemetery: Clock of Fate
summary: The hidden object game Clock of Fate involves the player traveling through time, changing the past to put tormented souls to rest--and rescue their own soul from Death.

name: Restart
summary: A scientist with great knowledge about humanity ends up back in the Stone Age and has to build a civilization and develop it into the modern age.

name: Retro
summary:
Eight arcade classics 3D-fied.
Includes:
Bounce 'n Break
Bubble Puzzle
Gobbler
Hopper
Laser Command
Light Racer
Roids
Galaxy Warz

name: Redemption: Tyranny of Daetorem
summary: A long time ago, humans and monsters lived in unison. However, the ever-growing population of humanity almost led to the extinction of many races. This in turn drove the monsters to start an uprising against the human race. Grab your spear as you take on the role of a guard called Michail.

name: Red Baron: Mission Builder
summary: Want to rewrite history? Here's your chance: A mission builder for Red Baron is available. Create your own missions, all new planes, all new aces.

name: Recycle City
summary: Recycle City is an online game by the United States Environmental Protection Agency.

name: RedLine Racer
summary: Redline Racer (Suzuki Alstare Extreme Racing for the European and North American Dreamcast release, European Game Boy Color release and Microsoft Windows re-release) is a racing game that was developed by Criterion Games and published by Ubisoft for Microsoft Windows.

name: Reversi
summary: Artic Computing's take on Reversi

name: Renegade Grounds: Episode 2
summary: Agela, Ingus, and a new ally, a lizardman Rhask, try to clear their names and take on the sinister General Danyll, as well as more dangers, more cultists, and more Ogoz. A continuation of a short, light-hearted story with turn-based combat.

name: Reapertom
summary: Reap your out of control crop while avoiding all sorts of creatures and compete for the highest score on the worldwide leaderboard in this fast paced top-down 2D maze arcade style game!

name: Red Wizard Island
summary: You're a red wizard. On an island. Jump around. Shoot fireballs. Cast shield and other spells. Defeat a viking chicken and other fearsome enemies.

name: Relivium
summary: Relivium is a survival horror game set in a mysterious military archipelago plagued with soldiers infected by a once dormant aquatic parasite, and a haunting, mysterious presence... Set after the events of WW2, explore, manage your resources, and survive.

name: Rebound
summary: Rebound is a physics based reflex arcade game where the player must keep a ball within bounds of the screen, while aiming for the most points and longest time survived possible in a single round. Sounds simple, right?

name: Rebirth: Beware of Mr.Wang
summary: This is a plot-oriented interactive puzzle game. The gameplay uses mouse clicks or drag-and-drop methods to promote the development of the plot. The game tells the story of an ordinary young man who pursues love, grows up in the process of hard work, and finally reaps friendship and love.

name: Reaching for Petals
summary: Reaching for Petals is a poetic adventure about love, loss, and ambition. You will travel to the peak of the ever-reaching mountain to uncover the true nature of your mysterious and seemingly unguided journey.

name: Real Car Parking 2 : Driving School 2018
summary: Sequel of the most favorite parking game of 2017!

name: Requiem: Bloodymare
summary: The strangely named Requiem: Bloodymare is a Free-To-Play darkly themed massively multiplayer online role-playing game created by GRAVITY.

name: Recordance
summary: Recordance is a sci-fi themed first person shooter game. Utilize experimental weapon systems and vehicles to defeat an unknow enemy across multiple environments. Unlock new weapon systems and customise your droid and vehicles as you battle towards victory!

name: Return to Hadron
summary: Return to Hadron is a work in progress remake of ConC.E.R.N.ed, a Doom megawad created by Matt Powell (cannonball) for limit removing source ports. The first episode was released in 2015 and was later named as a winner of the 22nd Annual Cacowards. Powell released a second episode in late 2016, which was a runner-up for the 2017 Cacowards. On September 1, 2020, episode 3 was released which, again, reached runner-up status at the 2020 Cacowards. Episode 4 was released on October 22, 2023.

name: Reach the Ocean
summary: Reach the Ocean or defeat the Oraclepus. Its your call.

name: RetroDriver
summary: Rhythmic Retro Racer is an 3d arcade racing game where you can drive classic sport cars in a neon illuminated world with fantastic art style... Retro Racer mostly offer rhytmic based gameplay including unique synth wave soundtrack, and additionaly time challenge and free ride levels, all together with 80's retro world!

name: Reddie and the Redirected Walker: Module 01 - Alpha
summary: This 5-minute VR puzzle experience multiplies your 2x2 meter tracking space several times over. We take a human being test subject (You) through a wondrous test environment using the power of Redirection. It is probable your mind will be blown open like a cantaloupe (metaphorically).

name: Relics of the Fallen
summary: Roguelike dungeon crawler card game.

name: Reflow
summary:
Reflow is a new way to play with your iDevice and the world! Using the realtime camera image, the game abstracts your environment into a black and white level. Let virtual fluids flow on everything that meets your cameras eye. Use whatever you like - friends, objects, pets, strangers - to solve the given challenges in the most unique way. Play wherever you want - parties, bars, parks, schools, the office - do it alone or collaboratively with friends and colleges. Share your solution pics online via twitter, facebook, email and other services or compete for high-scores with players worldwide using Game Center.
Just give it a shot: Level with your world! Now!

name: RealFit (VR fitness)
summary: RealFit provides custom bodyweight training workouts with added games and stats to keep you motivated. Free your workout from the confines of your living room - get moving in VR with RealFit.

name: Revolty-II
summary:
After 250 years of stable government, a military coup led by the Snukla star system's chief of military staff, General Bernelli, forces a junta upon the planets' peoples. A resistance group soon springs into action, sabotaging the new government's actions with less and less success. They soon resort to a desperate plan: capture three minimally guarded fighter space-jets and use them against Bernelli's regime. After hijacking the vehicles and learning that the enemy kidnapped his partner Cherni, Tragi mans his ship and sets out to rescue her and Snukla from this tyranny.

Revolty-II was Fuga System's debut game, a vertical arcade shooter using the Sharp X1's spriting hardware and optimized software scrolling. You fly through several stages of increasingly varied and challenging enemy waves, obstacles, and boss fights. Collect the best power-ups, achieve high scores, and blast your way through this story-packed sci-fi adventure!

name: Red Clash
summary: Vertical space shooter

name: Revenant March
summary: In a fortress besieged by ghouls, a young exorcist must use power, diplomacy, and inhuman languages to unravel a grudge spanning generations.

name: Reasonable Claustrophobia
summary: Reasonable Claustrophobia is a sci-fi shooter. The alien Kas of planet Perzak have built themselves a claustrophobic base! Kill them and their leader before they keep building these counter-intuitive monoliths!

name: Retrofit: Overload
summary: Overload is the first in a series of retrofitted arcade games with MP support and online scoreboards. Coming to Xbox Live Indie Games May 2010.

name: Reborn Souls
summary: As a Maiden of the Ecclesia, Sabrina is in charge of special assignments, in lands where dark magic, urban legends and folkore are all real. While investigating a new incident in one of the appeased villages, she will learn much more than she bargained for...

name: Repeat After Me
summary: Repeat After Me, the multiplayer game for single players! Make this work, by utilizing your unique ability of cloning yourself at any time and record any action you can think of. Your clones will forever repeat your every step - or misstep. Can you work with yourself?

name: Reckless Rufus
summary: A puzzle game from the early nineties. Collect crystals and avoid hostile aliens.

name: Red Memory
summary: Honoring history and preserving the spirit of heroes, "Red Memories" invites you to immerse yourself in this historical journey. Get ready to delve into this chapter of "Red Memories" and feel the historic moments of struggle for peace.

name: Rewind And Reclaim
summary: Rewind and Reclaim is a turn-based adventure inspired by 90's horror movies. Explore different B movie scenarios by creating scenes in which victims outsmart villains. Investigate their terrifying behind the scenes to unfold the story linking them all.

name: Retro Jam 2
summary: Speedy map jam following the theme "Fantasy brick cities in the skies": three floating maps by Skacky, Sock and RickyT23. It comes with optional medieval-style item models.

name: Recondite: The Phantasm Emporium
summary: Recondite is a short but story rich rpg.

name: Reaper
summary:
Death has always been her enemy.

After the death of their parents, she was left with only her sister as family. However, she is young and has a weak body. Her sister, though previously very healthy, somehow got something worse than her. She couldn't understand what the doctors said, but she understood that she must do everything she can to help her sister.

When Death comes to claim the only one she has left, she wasn't just going to sit quietly and let it happen.

name: Realms and Ruins: Abencor
summary: Realms & Ruins: Abencor is a first-person, grid-based, open world, retro, pixel art dungeon crawler harkening back to the days of yore. Realms & Ruins takes inspiration from games like Wizardry and Might & Magic and other cRPG's of the 90's.

name: Resigned
summary: They say quitting is the easy part. Clearly they don't know anything.

name: Real Madrid: The Game
summary: Real Madrid: The Game is the official game of Real Madrid football club.

name: Redshift 7
summary: Redshift 7 is an open world action adventure game taking place in a distant galaxy overrun by hostile alien life. In Redshift 7, you will visit multiple star systems and planets. You can trade, mine, explore and become a courier or a mercenary. Battle pirates and other creatures in space or on the surface of planets. Experience seamless transitions from piloting your ship to EVA in your suit or to ground based movement on planets and space stations. Team up with others to defend the galaxy from unknown enemies or battle each other across miles of terrain and open space. Upgrade your ship and weapons to become the most powerful adventurer in the galaxy.

name: ReEstate
summary: A real estate investment and business simulator, with aspects of life simulator who puts you in the skin of someone who just lost everything including your parents and needs to win in life.

name: Reckpunk
summary: Reckpunk is a platformer/endless runner where you control level elements rather than the main characters.

name: Rev to Vertex
summary: Rev to Vertex (R2V) Immerse yourself in the virtual racing ground. Explore the vibrant hills and shimming metropolis of Hong Kong. Customize your car and drift in style. Realistic driving physics and battle system. Defeat rivals and race your way to the top.

name: ReturnState
summary: ReturnState is a sci-fi themed action platformer with gameplay inspired by 2D classics like Castlevania, Sonic, and Super Mario Bros.

name: Rescue from Atlantis
summary: An action game released for many early computers.

name: Red Barrels Go Boom
summary: The world is overrun with zombies! They are fast and they are immune to bullets! The only way to kill them is EXPLODING BARRELS!

name: Re:Aegis
summary: Re:AEGIS is a sci-fi roguelite survivors FPS where you take control of a combat android, generate powerful builds, and battle against the hordes of hostile tech in a combat simulation. Will you survive to see the end of the simulation?

name: ReHarmony
summary: The main character finds themselves ensnared within a mysterious realm, and it's up to you to help them avoid getting lost in time. As our hero navigates different time periods, they must activate special keys to control the flow of time.

name: Red Algorithm: Fernando
summary: Purchase premium hero Fernando in Red Algorithm to support the game and have some fun

name: Return to Sector 9
summary: Sequel to Ambush in Sector 9

name: Residuum
summary: Defend your base on Mars from invaders in Residuum. A thrilling mix of tower defense and shooter gameplay, upgrade weapons and choose your crew for a unique experience each time. Play with a friend for even more excitement!

name: Reverie Knights Tactics: Prologue
summary: Reverie Knights Tactics: Prologue takes you on a journey to a hand-drawn fantasy world, where you guide your heroes through the first hour of the upcoming tactical RPG. The Prologue introduces you to the game's story and includes three battles, as well as item crafting and character customization.

name: Revenant Saga & Revenant Dogma
summary: Experience epic RPG adventures at once! This bundle includes Revenant Saga and Revenant Dogma.

name: Return to Abyss
summary: Return to Abyss is a mowing survival game with Rogue-Lite elements, upgrade your weapons and use your fighting skills to fight through over 10,000 monsters on screen until defeat the culprit who broght chaos!

name: Real Drift Car Racing
summary: A 3D drift racing game for mobile devices.

name: Red Riding Hood: Star Crossed Lovers
summary: Rediscover Red Riding Hood in an adventure with a surprisingly original twist based loosely on the tale by Charles Perrault!

name: Replika
summary: Developed by Biodroid, Replika was announced as a third-person action/strategy hybrid with cyberpunk influences, puzzle solving and a female cyborg protagonist. It was planned as a downloadable game for PSN and was said to feature full 3D stereoscopic support.

name: Resident Evil Revelations 2: Season Pass
summary:
The Resident Evil Revelations 2 – Season Pass includes four main episodes following the stories of Claire Redfield and Barry Burton, released weekly starting February 24, 2015. It also features two extra episodes and a bonus character, HUNK, for Raid Mode. All content must be downloaded separately as it becomes available.

Episode Two: March 3, 2015
Episode Three: March 10, 2015
Episode Four: March 17, 2015
Extra Episode 1: March 17, 2015
Extra Episode 2: March 17, 2015
Raid Mode Character: HUNK: February 24, 2015

name: Retro Vaders: Reloaded
summary: The original Retro Vaders game rebuilt from the ground up with a brand new engine, complete graphics overhaul and a heap of new content.

name: Residuality
summary: Enter the spirit world to relive the past of the Moriarty family and ultimately discover your own truth.

name: Rejuvan
summary: Make money, rejuvenate, repeat. Find about all wonder of this modern factory game in which your whole purpose is making money. Watch out for any surprising unnatural weather-related events as they may greatly impact your game experience.

name: RedSpaceOps
summary: Experience the thrill of live space operations by controlling various Research, Experimental, and Demonstration (RED) spacecraft to accomplish real world tasking. The first mission is SpaceCowboy ADR (Active Debris Removal). Clean up dangerous debris to earn ADR bucks and refuel to stay alive.

name: Rebirth Fantasy Online
summary: Rebirth Fantasy is an open world Free 2D Online RPG, Explore a world of fantasy where slimes, goblins and dragons exist. Play the way you like, create skills, craft items, fight different monsters and explore anywhere without being blocked on a story progression!

name: Res Arcana
summary: Res Arcana is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Marionette and published by Coconuts Japan, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: RetroVamp
summary: A colorful retro-style hardcore platformer that will challenge every player to reach the top of a vertical scrolling scenario, easy to understand, hard to master!

name: Remnants of Flesh
summary: Return peace to Oakley City and battle against cultists and nightmarish creatures to uncover your past.

name: Re-O-Ri
summary: Do you have what it takes to become the next Re-O-Ri? Battle to claim the title of "King of Kings" in this turn-based single and multiplayer strategy VR card game!

name: Real Monster Truck Parking
summary: Drive 8 amazing Monster Trucks in exciring Events & Arenas! Enjoy tons of new Missions with our FREE “Monster Content” update and prove yourself as a stunt driver!

name: Red
summary: A PC-98 visual novel.

name: Refraction
summary: Refraction is a top-down, arena action game where you use quick reflexes to take down hordes of enemies. You must rely on your skill and your wit as you fight to survive, in the hope that you can live long enough to take down the core of all corruption.

name: Reditum
summary: Embark on a dizzying simulation experience.

name: Red Baron Squadron
summary:
Red Ace Squadron is basically a standalone add-on for Master of the Skies: The Red Ace
(or Red Ace for short). It includes the following improvements: 2 new campaigns with 14 additional missions, power-up stations to repair your plane, two new planes and multiplayer over LAN, modem and internet.

name: Re.wired
summary: A story of loneliness in a connected world set in 90s Japan. Control high schooler Kazami through a psychological explorative visual novel horror to uncover the truth of garbled messages and student disappearances. Featuring 2D hand drawn anime sprites in an explorable 3D techno-horror world.

name: Reptile Rehab
summary: Renovate your brand new rehabilitation centre deep inside the tropical rainforest. As time goes on care for all your injured reptile patients & earn money to upgrade and build new areas.

name: Rescue Team 6: Collector's Edition
summary: When Mother Nature does her worst, the Rescue Team does its best!

name: Remaster Textures
summary: Nine small / medium maps made in a week using MachineGames' new textures for the rerelease. A variety of themes and styles, has something for everyone.

name: Remix Map Pack
summary:
Results of the 2008 remix competition at Func_Msgboard: five remixes/remakes of original id maps.
e2m1rmx by Spirit
e3m4rmx by Willem
e3m5rmx by Speedy
e4m1rmx by RickyT23
e4m7rmx by Zwiffle

name: Reaction Rally
summary: Another game in the Kinect Sports Gems series

name: Rental Store Simulator
summary: Run your own movie store. Choose your movies, customize your store, hire employees and build your movie empire!

name: RectRacer
summary:
Racing on rectangular platforms!
In the world of RectRacer, you can design your own levels and compete with your friends in a fun and exciting race on rectangular platforms with four game modes: Solo, Simple Play, Online and Party.

name: Revenge: First Blood
summary: James got an insomnia after the death of his wife. And once he woke up, he had decided to walk down the street. But he didn't expect what could have happened...James finds out his half-dead brother. His wife is stolen and he promises to find her anyway. He has to do all his wish best to carry out with the.

name: Realm of Heroes
summary: Realm of Heroes is a strategy game in which players build castles to defend their lands and recruit heroes to fight for their cause.

name: Remnants
summary: Fight enemy drones in this action-filled shooter to obtain the key to freedom! Customize your weapon by combining the powers of the four elements, collect items, and perfect your strategy to overcome the barriers constructed by your enemies.

name: Restricted Area
summary: Restricted Area - Play as a soldier in an abandoned world. Survive amongst dangerous zombies. Search for supplies and weapons. Save the world from a dangerous virus.

name: Remain
summary: Artem has to spend in abandoned house the whole night, but it really abandoned the house? And what secrets are hidden in its walls creepy? Answers to these questions can be found in our Remain game.

name: Redhawk Simulator
summary: REDHAWK Simulator is a laid-back flying simulator arcade game where players soar through four unique environments, collecting fruits and plants along the way to fuel their expedition. Score points by collecting as many as you can!

name: Real Cricket '14
summary: Mobile cricket game from Nautilus Mobile

name: Retro Shooting
summary: Retro Shooting is a shooting game for android and ios.

name: Recalcitrant
summary: This game presents a fun and challenging adventure for players.

name: Reporter
summary:
Discover heart-thumping terror, chase and scary creatures in this atmospheric horror game. But no matter what, never play alone in the dark.
Is Your mind is hungry for tricky puzzles and nerves are suffering without ticklish situations? This action-horror "Reporter" from "AGaming+" will shake you to the core! Turn off the light and get your earphones! Be attentive, because it’s the only thing that can help you to get out from the paws of horror that is happening here.

name: Resource Recon
summary: RESOURCE RECON is an exciting game in which you take on the role of a brave miner on a quest to find rare materials in the depths of the earth.Your main goal is to collect valuable resources and minerals that can only be found in the most dangerous and exciting places underground.

name: Reboot
summary: In the fall of 2050, nearly a decade after an AI crisis ended, the Bates and two others are trying to find their last hope, Ocean City. The shortage of supplies and the threat of zombies have already made things difficult for them, and the appearance of a band of bandits has added to their woes.

name: Red Nivis
summary: A rogue-like metroidvania where you explore the ruins of the Red Nivis Laboratory. No run will be the same, but will also give you the metroidvania feeling of finding a shortcut, or remembering that there's a cool area you can now explore.

name: Resope!
summary: Rescue the sushi stuck in the wall! A full-fledged puzzle game that requires a lot of careful thought. All you have to do is ignite the blocks.

name: Recycle Factory Simulator
summary: Buy junk, recycle and sell! Unlock new machines, produce products and upgrade your factory! "Recycle Factory Simulator" is a first-person simulator game where you work in your own recycle factory.

name: Revenge Master
summary: Help the king to take revenge, kill as many traitors as possible and take them with you to hell before they get to you.

name: Retribution Revisited
summary: Small to medium-sized level (albeit with a high monster count). A singleplayer remake of Q3DM7- Temple of Retribution using custom textures. Comes with a music track. The map source is included.

name: Revenis Prologue 01
summary: Revenis Prologue 01 is a interactable visual novel like game. Take control of Seven and Six in the confinement of their room to uncover the secrets of their home.

name: Rebirth of Fortune
summary: Rebirth of Fortune is a tactical strategy role-playing game with customizable unites! Up to eight of your units battle hoards of mercenaries in turn-based, strategic combat on various terrains. Upgrade and customize your own units to compete in a chess-like strategy game of position and power. Your eight individual units share a mutual relationship and utilize various strategies and skills according to their disposition. A divisive strategy is required to beat each of 200 stages and various enemy AIs. If you eradicate the enemy you will be rewarded, and using the rewards fund you can upgrade your units and prepare for greater combat.

name: Rex Verbi
summary: Rex Verbi is a word game where you compete to build the most valuable words. The board can be changed to fit orthodox players as well as those seeking a new experience! Play against your friends in Pass-n-Play mode or solo against any of the three computer personalities. You can play on one of the six boards that comes with the game or create your own boards with the board editor. The tile distribution can also be tweaked to fit your boards.

name: Revenge of the Headless
summary: A brick adventure game. Every time will change the dungeon, use your head to kill a blood road, Durahan.

name: Rescue Terra I
summary: We have a serious problem on Terra I. The colonies sole purpose is to mine Zenbar Crystals which are used for 72% of Earth's energy production. Mining dangers plus security needed to safeguard crystal shipments required the creation of the most complex computer-controlled robotics system ever devised. This system had been doing a tremendous job. But... something is wrong. Crystal shipments have stopped, and returning crystal freighters have been destroyed by Terra I's own planetary defense system...

name: Re-Blood
summary:
Re-Blood (formerly Brutal Blood: One Unit Whole Blood Rebirth or just Blood Rebirth) is a project building from ZBlood to create an expanded experience from the original Blood transplanted onto the GZDoom engine. This involves remade maps, levels, enemies and more, as well as liberal usage of assets from Blood II. A v0.1 release was put out on May 22, 2019.
Contents

name: Real Football 2016
summary:
Real Football / Soccer is a series of mobile football/soccer games by Gameloft that has been released annually since 2004.

Players can play matches with teams to practice or participate in leagues and cups. The game can also be approached as a business simulation, managing teams and players while match results are calculated automatically.

name: Reality End
summary: Reality End brings you into Immersive warfare, where humans try to gain control over the raising androids army. Reality End is a futuristic VR multiplayer shooter, providing the latest VR mechanic and integration for a first-person multiplayer shooter.

name: Refraction
summary: Jackie Shields wakes up to find everything in her world a little different than she remembers it. Trapped between her own dimension and a parallel one, she soon realizes that nothing can remain unchanged in her life. Especially not herself...because the other dimension has a Jackie of its own!

name: Reader Rabbit Kindergarten
summary: Reader Rabbit and Mat the Mouse collect resources for a large campfire party at Camp Happy Tales.

name: Resident Evil: Confidential Report
summary: Resident Evil Confidential Report, is a turn-based strategy game series by Capcom released for the mobile phone in 2006 and is another installment in the Resident Evil franchise. The series contains four titles released separately: "Resident Evil: Confidential Report File #1", "Resident Evil: Confidential Report File #2", "Resident Evil: Confidential Report File #3", "Resident Evil: Confidential Report File #4".

name: Red Flowers
summary: A lightning-fast action platformer in which the enemy always outnumbers you, and the cost of a mistake is death. Slice your way through the dystopian stone jungle with a transformer katana, shredding heavily armed opponents in a stylish super-fast manner.

name: Realshot
summary:
Users enters the game lobby and pick your character. 
You can enjoy shooting games with others through random matching or custom matching. 
In-game gold, you can buy a variety of characters and weapons. 
You can enter your friend's nickname and enjoy the game together through custom matching.

name: Reblica
summary: Reblica is a cyberpunk-style action platformer shooting game. In Ark, a city full of chaos and crime, become the mercenary Bianna, defeat various enemies and complete quests.

name: Rebuild the Wall
summary: Rise up with 1–4 players in chaotic couch co-op to restore a fallen nation!

name: Reel Deal Casino: Championship Edition
summary: A gambling game in the Reel Deal Casino series.

name: Ready Set Golf
summary:
Play real-time multiplayer golf with your friends and be the ultimate winner!
Tee off with your friends and players from around the world in Ready Set Golf! Race against real players in fast-paced rounds of mini golf and unleash your skills to climb the leaderboard, earn exciting cosmetics, and activate power-ups. With support for up to eight players simultaneously, the competition is fierce and the taste of victory is sweet!

name: Reign of Cats
summary: Reign of Cats - Take control of a cat and explore the neighborhood to complete a variety of missions in this casual RPG.

name: Return to Genesis
summary: Return to Genesis is a side-scrolling shooter similar to Defender, made by Firebird Software for Amiga and Atari ST systems.

name: Remote Control Dandy SF
summary: A Japan-only Playstation 2 game in which you play a little boy controlling a giant robot via remote control. Acts as a direct sequel to Remote Control Dandy on PS1.

name: RemiFla Spirits 2
summary: A doujin game by YuuYuutei based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Ready Set Sumo!
summary: Ready Set Sumo pits up to four players and their crazy characters against each other to triumph in the ring. Battle to be the last one standing as you fight your way to victory, whacking and thwacking each other with out of this world weapons.

name: Realms of Dr. Chaos
summary: This is very loosely based on the NES game Dr. Chaos, mainly in its plot about the main character rescuing his brother Dr. Chaos from his own ill-advised forays into inter-dimensional travel. It consists of three maps centered around puzzles and exploration. The player is required to enter various extra-dimensional realms and puzzle out the central goal of each in order to reach a key, switch, or other objective.

name: Red Trigger 2
summary: Red Trigger 2 is an FPS Puzzle Game inspired by Portal, Antichamber and more. Use a gun that can expand or retract red blocks, but you can only expand three at a time, so you'll need to manage your energy wisely. Those red blocks are used in many different and ingenious ways.

name: Retro Style: Pixel Art Jigsaw Puzzles - Expansion Pack 1
summary: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Re:Ark
summary: RE:Ark is a fast-paced and deadly action-shooter in crisp monochrome palette. Cleave your path through insane inhabitants of the station. Transform your abilities and learn dark origins of the tragedy that happened on The Ark.

name: Reel Deal Poker Challenge
summary: Reel Deal Poker Challenge is a PC Poker game released by the developer Phantom EFX. The game is played from a first person perspective as the player sits at the table.

name: Reel Deal Vegas Casino Experience
summary: The Reel Deal series with an online component.

name: Return to Castle Wolfenstein: Game of the Year Edition
Reckless Rally
summary: Reckless Rally Is A Small Casual Rally Racing Game. Try And Set A PB On The Two Tracks Or Build Your Own Based Off Real World Roads!

name: Reel Deal Casino: Valley of the Kings
Remuage - MeltySensation
summary: "Remuage - MeltySensation" is a unique VR rhythm game (RhythmGame) based on the operating modes of various popular rhythm games on the market. The game has been licensed by SQUARE ENIX's well-known IP "Aozora Under Girls!", so we have created a special customized "Remuage - MeltySensation" for VR users.

name: Red Hood Adventure
summary: Red Hood Adventure is a side-scrolling platform slasher game. An alternative story of Little Red Riding Hood, times are difficult and the Hat is armed with weapons. Grandma needs pies again and they need to be delivered. Creatures living in the forests also want pies, and maybe not only.

name: Red Rush
summary: Take care of restoring the economy and the status of a superpower of a once great country in one of the most difficult times for Russia.

name: Revived Forest
summary: A 2D platform game. The main goal is to collect all the seeds and save the offspring of the ents. Be careful - there are dangerous orcs and lumberjacks!

name: Redemption Cemetery: Clock of Fate - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you undo the past and set the trapped souls free?

name: Re Rive
summary: Re Rive is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You explore the dreams of 774 and collect effects.

name: Real Zombie War Simulator
summary: Destroy all zombies with sniper or other gun in this zombie game.

name: Rezist: Tower Defense
summary: Welcome to the virtual world. There is some valuable data stored on your server. Your task is to protect this data from malicious programs which will try to steal it. Some of them will try to use brute force their way through your defenses. Most, however, will use more sophisticated algorithms. Some of them can be quick, others are well aware of your defenses and will therefore avoid attacks, and some more still you will not notice at all.

name: Rescue Team: Danger from Outer Space!
summary: Stop an alien threat from wreaking untold devastation on Earth! After a meteor strikes Florida and releases strange spores, weird plants begin to grow and destroy entire cities! Only the Rescue Team has the skills to deal with this menace from outer space!

name: Restless Spirit
summary: The Spirit of a girl appears in front of a father whose daughter is lost. This man, filled with grief in his heart follows the guidance of the spirit, wandering ever deeper into the forest. Why has she shown herself? What is her purpose?

name: Retailer Tycoon
summary: Retailer Tycoon is a base building, retail empire game. This game allows you to create any kind of retail shop you can think of. This RTS game allows you to make billions of in game money from your store. Create endless possibilities of stores and create that chain all though Sydney Australia.

name: Red Hot Robot Ultrarena
summary: Enter the Ultrarena and test your mech piloting skills in a single-player deathmatch simulation-shooter. It's free!

name: Revenge of the Spirit: Rite of Resurrection
summary: How far will you go to return your one and the only? Can you cheat death? Save the residents of a remote town where you ended up chance before the ancient evil takes up your soul in this creepy hidden object game.

name: Reborn: Dragona PH
summary: This enhanced version aims to captivate and enthrall potential players by highlighting the captivating elements and challenges offered by Reborn: Dragona PH.

name: Restless Wing Syndrome
summary:
In Restless Wing Syndrome, you play as a hungry pigeon scavenging the city rooftops for delicious morsels of bread. However, you were born with a condition that causes your wings to spontaneously flap, shooting you upward. Luckily, you know just how long you have between each wing spasm, thanks to your trusty Flap Meter.

Time your movements in conjunction with your flaps to cross gaps, avoid spikes, and glide across hazards to reach each delectable slice of bread in this puzzle platformer.

name: Retrogram
summary:
Think you're a word nerd? Make as many words as you can using seven letters
Retrogram is a love letter to the 1970s, and the most stylish word puzzle you'll play all year. Train your brain and discover new words every day
Subscribe to get the Daily Puzzle. A new puzzle each day, hand-curated and full of interesting stories about your favorite words.

name: Retro Garbage
summary: Retro Garbage is a platforming game filled with puzzles and challenges.

name: Remnants Of Nightfall
summary:
A outbreak just started!

A small town needs to protected themselves and wait for rescue to come.

Infecteds are all over the place! There is hope: they can't resist the daylight, but they can thrive at night.

Remains Of Nightfall is a strategy-shooter tower-defense in development.

name: Red Valley
summary: "Red Valley" is an adventure and horror game inspired by ps1 classics such as: Silent Hill, Resident Evil, Alone in The Dark...

name: Red and White
summary: Restore color to a vast, empty world. An abstract puzzle metroidvania game focused on exploration.

name: Reflex Point
summary: An unofficial game set in the Robotech universe.

name: Recruit One
summary: Mission Briefing: Ready to take to the stars, Recruit One? Tackle over 20 trials to prove you're worthy of joining us aboard Lightway Lines, a pioneering space tourism airline. Don't wait around – you're against the clock and a whole lot more in this sci-fi puzzler. Have you got what it takes?

name: Rebel Inc: Escalation - Sand & Secrets
summary: Control the Oil. Control the Region. Take command and stabilise Golden Sands, a vast desert of riches. Uncover secrets in four new official scenarios, from stealthy insurgents to supercharged tanks and even oil infernos.

name: Refugee: The Second Hearing
summary:
Asylum story...

You arrive naive and actually believing.

While they have number of awards from the LA city mayor private organization 'Program For Torture Victims' is no more than a group of Homeland Security employees, exchanging medical services for political opinions, making refugees lie in the court.

name: Red Ash: The Indelible Legend
summary: Red Ash: The Indelible Legend is an upcoming video game in development by Comcept and HYDE, Inc. The game, based on a concept by Keiji Inafune, is heavily influenced by the Mega Man Legends series by Capcom, which many of the Comcept staff had worked on previously

name: Retaliation Path of Rome
summary:
Retaliation Path of Rome is a very complex game, with several unique features 
 
About 100 different missions, with either single or multiple objectives, like: 
 - reach a population target (a minimum number of patricians and/or plebs) 
 - reach a target happyness 
 - earn a certain amount of money 
 - complete the mission in a given time 
 - win a certain number of battles 
 
5 difficulty levels, from very easy to very hard: with different world resources, starting money, initial reputation... 
 
Every mission is created parametrically to offer an ever changing challenge, each time a mission is re-played.

name: Remote Presence
summary: A strategy game, developed and published by Shuwa System, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: Retro Racer
summary: Retro Racer is neon lights, a fantastic city, synthwave, and the most vivid images of the 80s. Supercars, vhs effect, IBM computer graphics, glitches, analog synthesizers. Immerse yourself in the world of a neon future that will never come.

name: Reach the Hilltop
summary: Reach the Hilltop - 2D platformer where you have to go through levels to get to the hilltop!

name: Red Bull X-Fighters World Tour
summary: A downloadable freestlye motocross game from Konami that promises high speed and big jumps.

name: Relics of the Lost Age
summary: The Nazis are scouring the globe for powerful occult artifacts. Can you beat them to the treasures and save the world from a thousand years of darkness?

name: Revenge of the Ball
summary: An action game in which balls fight back against players.

name: Red Earth
summary: Red Earth is a fantasy-themed 2D competitive fighting game released by Capcom as a coin-operated video game in 1996. Red Earth is the only CPS III video game which has never been officially ported to home platforms, although its characters have appeared in later Capcom games.

name: Rewinder
summary: Rescue your daughter from the interdimensional dangers

name: Rescue my Queen!
summary: Rescue my Queen!, is a unique royal-themed tower defense game with a fusion system that can be played any time, anywhere.

name: Retrowave: Map Pack
summary: Continue your exploration in the world of Retrowave with these unique new worlds!

name: Retris
summary: A fresh take on the the falling block puzzle genre. Embrace imperfection with glitches and broken pieces to overcome this new challenge. Chase high scores or learn new techniques in a puzzle mode with over 50 handcrafted puzzles.

name: Redout: Deluxe Edition
summary: RACE FASTER THAN EVER! Redout will test your skills to the limit as you dart at incredible speed across all manner of futuristic environments, both in offline and online play. Includes all of the game’s DLCs.

name: Revenge of Ilcoin
summary: In a futuristic sci-fi action setting you will become “The Miner” and your mission will be to take your powerful weapons and protect your Ilcoins (The ultimate treasure in ILCs) from the space aliens pirates and the evil DBoss leader.

name: Redemption Cemetery: Grave Testimony
summary: Third game of Redemption cemetery series.

name: Ready to Run
summary: Radio-controlled car racing game exclusively for the PlayStation 4.

name: Ren & Stimpy: Match-Master
summary: A generic memory game based on the cartoon

name: Reincarnated as a Noble
summary: The guy is curious about the afterlife and decided to give it a go? But as it happens it's still not clear on how he died, all of it seems scripted even until the end.. just what kind of life did he lived? In the end the Goddesses decides to reincarnate him into another world but without him having any magic to rely on, in a world where all beings possessed magic. What will he do?

name: Res Arcana Diana Rei: Uranai no Meikyu
summary: A fortune-telling tool for superstitious Super Famicom owners.

name: Rectitude
summary: Rectitude, is a Sci-Fi visual novel that centers around Timothy, a renowned professor who creates a groundbreaking technology.

name: Record of Agarest War 2: Limited Edition
summary:
The central continent, from where the light is believed to have originated from, went silent, while at the same time demons began to spread throughout the world like a plague. Amongst the survivors of the catastrophe, that fateful day became known as the "Day of Light."

Sometime after the events of the Day of Light, a young man by the name of Weiss, who had lost all memory of himself, encounters an enigmatic woman named Eva, who introduces herself as an Agent of the Divine. It is from her that Weiss learns that he has committed the grievous sin of deicide, and that in order for him to atone for his crime he is to become the "Vessel" in which the power of the divinity he had slaughtered will be stored. For it will be that power that will be used to resurrect the one whose life he stole.

For those who betray the divine will pay for their sins in the space which separates salvation and damnation, as will their progeny...

name: Regola
summary: A first-person game that uses a keyboard and mouse to block evil spirits and reassure girl.

name: Retrocycles
summary: Race. Do not crash. Trap your enemies. Enter the maze. Dominate the zone. DO NOT CRASH.

name: Re:Zero – Starting Life in Another World: The Prophecy of the Throne - Limited Edition
Red Haze: Bruises Glimmer in Starlight
summary: Gretta finds something alluringly beautiful, yet horrendously terrible​ hidden deep within her apartment. It grows beneath the floorboards. Will it bring her happiness, or sink her into despair?

name: Resident Evil 2
summary: A port for Tiger Handheld device.

name: Realmz
summary: 1994 video game fantasy adventure and role-playing video game developed by Fantasoft

name: Rekoil
summary: Set in a world devastated by an unrelenting pandemic, Rekoil is a fast action & highly balanced arena shooter that allows players to frag each other to oblivion. With 7 different game modes, 10 maps, & over 40 different weapons, Rekoil is the action FPS refined to its purest form ensuring the fun is maximized & the best player with the greatest skills & most points wins. Whether you enjoy the free flowing acrobatics found in run and gun gaming, or prefer the patient tactical approach, Rekoil can be set up to play the way you want to game.

name: Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny - For the Gods
summary:
Delve deeper into the mystical lore of the Northland with 3 new heroic questlines in "For the Gods" the first DLC for Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny.
You've been entrusted by a nobleman from Clanegh with the difficult task of transforming the paramour of a Thorwalian leader's daughter into a worthy suitor.

name: Red Rose Rising
summary: Tower Defense - Red Rose Rising is the lazy TD you've been waiting for!

name: Returner Zhero
summary:
"There is One Last Chance to Save Everything 
 
Explore a story about friendship and sacrifice, as you take on the role of the scientist who risked everything to learn more about the aliens. 
Lose yourself in a captivating, tactile 3D world that broadens your imagination of what mobile games can look like. 
Immersive cinematic gameplay in a fantastic imagining of an alien ship."

name: Remy Raccoon and the Lost Temple
summary: A cute, Raccoon-based, dungeon-crawling, gem-grabbing arcade game. Join Remy Raccoon on a perilous journey through over 100 levels filled with fiendish traps and malevolent creatures. Only the bravest adventurer will collect all the gems and progress to the next level. Your adventure awaits...

name: ReHack
summary: The hacking simulator, which consists of many mini-games, which together all merge into one, composite game.

name: Record Scratch Fever
summary: A kitty rhythm game at a fishy club!

name: ReThink | Evolved 3
summary: ReThink | Evolved 3 is a Puzzle Game in a futuristic setting, that features a variety of Puzzles that utilize Lasers and the behavior of light and it's colors. Use new features and mechanics to puzzle your way through the game's beautiful world.

name: Recore: Eye of Obsidian
summary: Eye of Obsidian is a new chapter in the game's main story. It takes players to a previously unexplored region of Far Eden, the game's world. That's followed by two new overworlds, 10 new dungeons, and a sandstorm region where surviving the storms and dangerous enemies delivers valuable loot.

name: Reversi 32
summary: Play Reversi (32 piece style) on the Wii U GamePad against a friend or Bigley.

name: Retro Parking
summary: This parking simulation is a good opportunity to show your ability to drive in tight spaces.

name: Rebound Arena
summary: Enter the arena as a death row convict on the 80's hit gameshow of an alternative dystopian past where bloodsports are highly monetized and celebrated. Armed with only your discs, a battle-suit, and your wits, compete in this high-intensity competitive action game for fame, riches, and freedom.

name: Realm of the Dead
summary: This is a low-polygon 3D game with top-down and first-person perspectives. Control any character, switch perspectives, collect items, and rescue teammates. Use AI or the formation system to operate characters. Face hordes of zombies and respond based on your choices.

name: Reach the light
summary: The precision platformer where you climb the biggest mountain in the world to reach the light. Explore mysterious places and meet weird creatures on this difficult journey!

name: Rebels
summary:
Hello !!!
Welcome to the Space Rebels game!
The goal of the game is to eliminate all of the enemy spaceships and BOSS at the end of each level.
This is a spaceships shooting java game that was in a motorola cell phone.

name: Refracted Reality
summary: 15 maps of gothic/abstract glory. Linear and non-linear layouts, high detail, color in abundance and great gameplay making use of advanced port features. (GZdoom 3.7.2 or higher required)

name: Redemption Cemetery: Children's Plight
summary: Second game of Redemption cemetery series.

name: Relics: The Recur of Origin
summary: Relics: The Recur Of Origin is a remake of Bothtec's original Relics which expands the story of the original game and models the gameplay after CRPGs such as Diablo. Utilizing an isometric viewpoint, the combat occurs in real time and the spirit is controlled via a mouse.

name: Red Skull Reef
summary: Pirate themed tower defence.

name: Rendition
summary: Rendition is a 2007 work of interactive fiction by "nespresso", in which the player performs an interrogation of a suspected terrorist. The game describes itself as a "political art experiment in text adventure form".

name: Relumine
summary: Relumine is a puzzle adventure game. A child named Relu delves into an abandoned mine and discovers a magic crystal. With the crystal's power to rotate the world, she explores the ruins of an ancient society, is chased by a giant shadow and guided by mysterious spirits, in search of her long lost Papa.

name: Retro Rocket Raiders
summary: An old school fast action twin stick shmup, featuring more than 20 weapons that you can equip your ship with and 30 different enemies

name: Rescue Rover
summary: In this puzzle game by id Software the player must constantly save Rover, the protagonist's dog, from evil robots.

name: Rekt 2
summary: What if your car was a skateboard?! Play with up to 16 players and jump, grind and kickflip your car as you try not to get Rekt! Unlock over 50 cars and customize them into the perfect stunt car.

name: Reflected
summary: Think before jumping. In this puzzle platformer you will have to control a little rice ball called Ricy. Help him reaching his goal by teleporting him to his reflected position.

name: Retrold
summary: In RETROLD you can play many games inspired by old arcades from 70`s, 80`s and even 90`s.

name: Rescue Lucy 2
summary: A sequel of the mystical adventures of salvation of Lucy, filled with secrets and horror.

name: RePete
summary: RePete is a pixel art puzzle platformer about time travel and self-cooperation. You play as Pete, a special guy that can loop back in time to help his past self solve problems, collect gems, and reach new heights.

name: R.E.E.L.
summary: You need to fix units of the life support system at the station on Mars. Play and learn the basics of electronics. Explore the maze of printed circuit boards, learn how to use electronic components.

name: Reikai Doushi
summary: Reikai Doushi: Chinese Exorcist (Priest of the Spirit World: Chinese Exorcist), released outside Japan as Last Apostle Puppet Show, was an arcade fighting game released by Home Data in 1988. This was the first fighting game to use digitized sprites, motion capture animation, and claymation.

name: Redline Racing
summary: High Pace, High Skill Time-trial Racing Game

name: Reignfall
summary: Reignfall is a real-time strategy game with elements of city-building and third-person action. Build a city and defend your keep against waves of increasingly difficult enemies. Can you survive against the fallen horde?

name: Rekindling
summary: Rekindling is a settlement building and management game. You are tasked with rebuilding society after the ZTD virus has taken over and turned the masses into mindless creatures. Build, Harvest, Mine, and Fight with your survivors to build a sustainable society and take steps towards finding the cure!

name: Re:in
summary: Re:in is a Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Hanatsuki, a girl who refuses to leave her room, instead choosing to peek outside. Later, you can unlock another character, Tamashitsuki.

name: Rex
summary:
Rex, the thick-skinned mercenary, is here to do a job. He's come to Zenith to do away with the humans that have built their fortunes around the Great Tower.

Armed with the greatest weapon system yet seen, with it array of cannons, lasers, multiple spray guns and smart bombs, Rex leaps from cave to cave in a mad blitz that wreaks havoc and destruction on his chosen enemies, who explode in a mass of sound and colour, leaving behind their precious energy bubbles.

Once in the Great Tower itself, new challenges await the mighty Rex. A multi-level arcade extravaganza of epic proportions.

name: Repentance
summary: Repentance is an English Yume Nikki fangame. You play as a girl named Latanie who refuses to leave her room, so she explores her own dreams instead. Like most fangames, the main objective is to explore the protagonist's dream world and collect effects.

name: Remaining in a dream
summary: Explore the colorful world in which our hero is stuck and help him out!

name: Return to Yoshi's Island 64
summary: Return to Yoshi's Island 64 is a Super Mario 64 ROM hack/mod by Kaze Emanuar.

name: Regular Luckiest Guy: Love & Blocks
summary: Regular Luckiest Guy: Love & Blocks is a Brick Breaker ecchi game. You’re just a regular guy, who just happens to be around eight beautiful girls. You can learn their stories, break through the layers of their hearts and win their love. Play your shots right and you will... uncover all their secrets.

name: Revenge of the Beefsteak Tomatoes
summary: Your objective is to trap the Tomato Plants at the bottom of the screen by building three walls above them. At the same time you must avoid or shoot down all flying Tomatoes, dodge Tomato Bombs and stop the Brick-Eaters.

name: Reiner Knizia's Kingdoms
summary:
Kingdoms is a clever tile-laying game by top eurogame designer, Reiner Knizia. In a medieval kingdom, you must scout out resources and hazards to decide where to build your mightiest castles. Commit too soon and you might discover a tribe of ogres right next door, but commit too late, and your opponents will grab up all the real estate!
Six different opponents, each with their own personality, challenge you at a variety of difficulty levels to make the game very replayable.
Kingdoms is built on the same successful MobileEuroCard platform that was used to create Reiner Knizia's High Society and Reiner Knizia's Money. Simple gestures allow you to grab and move tiles. Everything is animated, for a colorful play experience.
This newest version uses Game Center for leaderboards and achievements. We plan multiplayer play for a future release.

name: Reflecting Fate
summary: This game represents detective thriller from the first person with elements of my mysticism. The action takes place in 1996 in Denwood and the player personates as its original resident. Suddenly cattle began to disappear on the island. Animals disappeared at nights absolutely without a trace, and it seems that nobody could prevent it. But everything changed in one day. Disappearances affected the family of the lead character, that's why he couldn't step aside. Step by step, trace by trace, proof by proof, he was to explore what happened and what scary mystery was kept by island Denwood.

name: Retro Pocket
summary: Retro Pocket is a fun and exciting video game that brings you back to the glory days of LED handhelds!

name: Regenesis
summary: Guide a group of survivors trying to strive in this alien yet familiar environment. Fight against mutated creatures and use their parts to craft and upgrade your weapons.

name: Rear Guard
summary: A horizontal scrolling shoot'em up written by John Anderson and published by Adventure International for various 8-bit platforms.

name: Redrum
summary: Redrum, a 1v1 arcade party-game! Fight until the last second to win the cure and regain your lost humanity!

name: Rebellion Again
summary: A short demo featuring a single procedurally-generated level, in which you need to eliminate the occupying enemy soldiers.

name: Red Alert
summary: Missile Command clone

name: Really Dog
summary: You see a dog. It pees the sea. You smash it! This is a refreshing small single player game.

name: Rebel
summary: To find his past, to choose his future.

name: Resident Evil: Uprising
summary: Resident Evil: Uprising is smartphone game released in 2009 by Capcom's Beeline Interactive subsidiary. It is a reimagination of Resident Evil 2. It features Claire Redfield as the protagonist.

name: Rebellion: A Rogue Souls Like
summary: Rebellion is a souls like action game, where you are trapped and your only option is to trust your fellow fates! Recruit other prisoners and make your way to escape, face enemies that have handcrafted AI. Explore the corridors of this prison, whose challenges will always be unprecedented.

name: Real Rode
summary: Real Rode is an RPG/otome game about an RPG/otome game fan named Nina who gets sucked into her favorite game “Rode”.

name: Reroute
summary: Redirect lasers with the help of boxes and portals in this challenging puzzle game with unique mechanics.

name: Recca no Honoo: Flame of Recca - The Game
summary: 2D fighting game based on the anime and manga "Flame of Recca"

name: Refraction
summary: Refraction is an addicting puzzle game using lasers and prisms. Use mirrors and prisms to split or combine colored lasers, while interacting with various environmental objects. Refraction offers distinct and creative levels, great graphics, a fantastic UI, and multiple solutions to each level for casual and intense players alike. With hours of playtime and various solutions, this game is sure to keep you entertained. Let's hope your logic skills are up to the task!

name: Realms of Illusion: Sentinel
summary: Realms of Illusion is an adventure game full of puzzles and mystery and features non-linear gameplay and 3D environments.

name: ReTux
summary:
ReTux is a 100% libre software and 100% libre culture action platformer loosely inspired by the Mario games, utilizing the art assets from the SuperTux project. The name "ReTux" is a play on the words "redux" and "Tux".

Although ReTux re-uses the art assets of SuperTux, no code from SuperTux is used in ReTux. The software portion of ReTux is entirely new, written in Python and based on the SGE Game Engine. ReTux also has several distinctions in its gameplay compared to both SuperTux and the Mario games.

name: Reset Memory
summary: In Reset Memory, you control Ashley, a girl who had a serious car accident and now has a serious memory problem, every time she sleeps her memory goes back to the day before the accident, Ashley now finds herself in an unknown location and afraid, what will happen to her...

name: Retro Racers
summary: Retro Racers sets the pace for 2D top-down classic racing games. Put the pedal to the metal while speeding by your opponents cars to unlock 12 exciting tracks. Collect the 4 classic power-ups along the way (Acceleration, Top Speed, Nitro Boosts and Traction). Avoid oil slicks and time the opening and closing of gates for shortcuts. Return to your childhood in Retro Racers!

name: Rescue Quest Gold
summary: The hit match-3 game is back! Join twin magicians Boom and Zap on their magical adventure in Rescue Quest Gold, lovingly remastered as a premium game with 200+ levels, enhanced effects, and improved gameplay. Match three or more tokens to clear a path and save the Spritelings from an evil sorcerer!

name: Ready 2 Rumble Boxing: Round 2
summary: Ready 2 Rumble Boxing: Round 2 is a boxing game port for the Game Boy Advance. It is also the sequel to Ready 2 Rumble Boxing.

name: Return to Sender
summary: Dodge in real-time, then tag bullets in slow-mo to shoot them back!

name: Reversi xVSx
summary: REVERSI xVSx is a Reversi game with modern features, including custom 3D graphics, user-created AI, online multiplayer, and streamer-viewer match functionality.

name: Resist
summary: Resist is a single-player action RPG designed exclusively for Quest. With a kinetic swinging system, intense combat, and a fully immersive story, Resist is the VR experience you’ve been waiting for.

name: Reversed Dreamland
summary: Travel across 4 different worlds in reversed dreamland while flipping gravity to help Penny reach the end of the level.

name: Remie and Alana
summary: A short Yuri RPG about two magical girls

name: Retro Three Kingdoms: Special edition
summary: We made the fun of MMORPG, the fun of hack and slash, and the fun of MOBA. We will do our best to become a game that records the history that players write. We do not provide auto-combat.

name: Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny - With Blade and Brilliance
summary: Celebrating the two year anniversary of Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny, Crafty Studios is proud to present an eventful blend of extra content - for free.

name: RetroRange
summary: A casual retro cyberpunk sandbox first-person shooter with object destructive physics.

name: Redux
summary: A puzzle game about destroying your past self.

name: Recovery Syndicate
summary: Recovery Syndicate is a prequel to Abeyance, in which you are the leader of one of the factions trying to reconstruct the economy of the galaxy. You must build and manage your colony's resources carefully, while watching out for rival factions who are also vying for supremacy.

name: RenderOrgan
summary: A single-player rhythm, adventure, and edutainment game.

name: RealSports Volleyball
summary: Atari 5200 port of RealSports Volleyball.

name: Rendezvous with a Stranger Girl
summary: An adult dating sim mostly made up of FMV scenes.

name: Restaurant Solitaire: Pleasant Dinner
summary: Make the tastiest dinner and enjoy it!

name: Redemption Cemetery: Salvation of the Lost
summary: Fourth game of Redemption cemetery series.

name: Ren Qi Dong Man Da Luan Dou
summary: 这是一款动漫呆萌与战斗激情完美交融的卡牌手游。

name: Reactivated
summary: A drone activates in a dark spaceship. After booting procedure it follows its last assignment. Only to find out there are decisions to be made accompanied by consequences.

name: Red Tie Runner
summary: Red Tie Runner is a simple but challenging 2D platformer. Put on a red tie and step into stick-figure shoes to navigate through 30 levels so intense you might just forget about the impending heat death of the universe.

name: Reverse Woman of Human Ball
summary: Ball Transportation instant-death and race game 'Reverse Woman of Human Ball'. You steer 156mph 'Reverse Woman' and do jobs transporting ball like human 'Human Ball'. To be delicate to deal with vulnerable human-ball like eggs and to be bravery to transport human-ball within the limit time.

name: Rebound Balls
summary:
Leisure game to remove lines of balls which can rebound at the boundary.
Balls with different colors will be dropped onto the board. Tap to choose one ball, and then tap on a target cell to move to when there is a free path. If 5 or more balls in same color are in a horizontal, vertical or tilting line, the balls will be removed and the score will be increased.

name: RE Encryption
summary: A multi-moded adventure/rpg/topdown/puzzler/platformer game which follows a story while testing your skills in multiple ways. This game varies from timing to strategy and to general skill. RE Encryption is a short experience.

name: Redshot
summary: Quick reflexes and clever strategies are required in REDSHOT, a bullet-time metroidvania where everything is deadly, but you are deadlier. Can you save the royal city from total destruction? ...Can you do it with style?

name: Realm Craft
summary: Craft equipment, Recruit heroes, , and Explore dangerous lands. Command and defend your castle in this immersive 2D strategy game. Face challenging waves of enemies as you shape the fate of your kingdom. Unleash your strategic prowess and forge your legacy in this epic fantasy adventure.

name: Reticent Retribution
summary: Reticent Retribution is a top down twin stick shooter. You must blast wave after wave of space enemies to progress. You can use the keyboard and a controller. 720p 60fps. Press 'esc' to quit, 'h' for help.

name: Rescue Troopers
summary: A Tactical FPS where you take control of airborne & ground troops to annihilate the enemy. Eliminate the enemies strongholds, which are spraying deadly chemtrails & dumping poisonous fluoride in your water supply. Protect your base and rescue the prisoners in this epic battle for survival!

name: Red Fox and the Four Seasons: Typing Game
summary: You can become a typing master with the help of this game. One huge benefit: The more you use our typing game, the faster you will be able to type the most frequent words faster, and you will be able to type everything else faster as well!

name: Restaurant Manager Simulator
summary: Try Restaurant Manager Simulator... As the leading person of the restaurant, you have to maintain a balance and harmonybetween all the stuff. Your job is a hard and very responsible one.

name: Retro Life
summary: create the life of your dreams, in this classic real time life simulation/rpg game. will you become the success story to make your parents proud? or a hopeless loser? the choice is yours

name: Ren'ai Shoshinsha
summary:
Nozomi, who works at the detective office of Une, will be asked to infiltrate the boys' school with the childhood friend Karin!
A thrilling trouble-loving comedy!

name: Reel Fishing Challenge II
summary: Reel Fishing Challenge II takes you to a pristine new freshwater environment teeming with fish that look and move just like the real thing.

name: Return the Backrooms
summary: Return the Backrooms is a Co-op horror game for 1-4 players where you can have a great time with your friends. Think, Explore, Wander, find the key items and try to escape. but be careful because something is lurking in the dark...

name: Refuge of Embers
summary: Vibrant hand-drawn visual novel with complex sprites, cinematic scenes, and frame-by-frame drawn animated h-scenes. Refuge of Embers features a wide cast of characters to romance and multiple endings in an original fantasy setting. Adult content can be toggled to your preference.

name: Rekea: GOTY Edition
summary: Cut, move and glue your way to the furniture of your dreams. Based on our iconic designs and your endless imagination.

name: Re-Bomber
summary:
Your mission:

You must redirect bombs that are falling from the sky onto the enemy (tanks and other war machines that are on the ground). To do this, you must fly over the bombs and press and hold the Joystick button (or SPACEBAR) to capture them.

To drop the bomb, just release the button (or spacebar).

Try to score 25 points (on the left scoreboard) before the tank reaches the left edge of the screen (or before the score on the right side reaches zero).

name: Rebel Forces
summary: Are you ready to be the ultimate soldier and fight until you defeat all of your enemies?

name: Redrock
summary: A map with a lot of red rocks and your mission is nothing else but blast the way to the nukebutton.

name: RealFlight Evolution: Blade Eclipse 360
summary: The Blade Eclipse 360 combines a fully-molded EPO body with futuristic looks and a high-performance airframe to deliver a unique blend of hovering, scale-like, sport, and aerobatic flying capabilities for intermediate to experienced heli pilots.

name: Relax Fly
summary: Relax Fly is a bird runner simulator that offers you to feel these very wings, to become a bird, although not really, but at least virtually! Feel the freedom, weightlessness and wind in the feathers, which is not given to feel any person on the whole planet!

name: Real
summary: "Real" is a unique immersion into the world of minimalism and moral challenges. This Art game offers players not just to solve puzzles, but also to reflect on their place in the world and the values they bring to society.

name: ReDungeon
summary:
Redungeon is an endless action platformer published by Nitrome released on Google Play and Apple App Store.
In this game, you have to cross an endless dungeon that is generated at random every new round is started. As you gain money and experience in the game, you can unlock new characters, each one with a specific abilty to further your way through the dungeons.

name: ReCaptcha V4
summary: A parody ReCaptcha in which you play chess against an AI to prove you are not a robot.

name: Refuge For Troubles: Episode 1 - Dear Stranger
summary: No more word: just the story of how the lobotomy was defeated by the forces of strong male friendship.

name: Retro Blaster: Mech Madness 1
summary: A single-player platformer and puzzle adventure through a colorful world of mecha madness, created by solo developer Kusuma Putra.

name: Retro Space Fighter
summary: There are 6 consecutive stages that the player can play. New enemies join to fight at each stage. The player has to complete a stage to play the next one. The player experiences new mechanics, assets, and effects as he or she plays through the final boss fight.

name: Real Chess 3D
summary:
The best 3D Chess game is here! Play Chess in immersive 3D graphics.
Challenge your friends to matches or play against the AI players in the best chess game.

name: Red Trees Rail. CO
summary: Red Trees Rail Co is a VR Horror Train simulator set in a Redwood Forest. Work a tiny night train by yourself, transporting passengers from town to town.

name: ReThink 2
summary: ReThink 2 is a Puzzle Game in a futuristic setting, that features a variety of Puzzles that utilize Lasers and the behavior of light and it's colors.

name: Retro Road Rumble
summary: Fast Paced, Head to Head Racing Action

name: Reddish
summary: Reddish is a 3d action platformer with a lot of combat and exploration, each level has different enemies and secrets, also the world map is highly explorable and hides some surprises. Some gameplay aspects are influenced by snes platform classics, bringing then to the new generation.

name: Reel Fishing 3D Paradise Mini
summary: Reel Fishing 3D Paradise Mini offers a fun and challenging experience for novice fishers and master anglers alike.

name: Restless Voronezh
summary: Restless Voronezh - A game in the Top Down Shooter genre, where the player controls a hero and, using various available means, deals with his enemies in cramped rooms of a huge building, clearing floor after floor.

name: Record Tripping
summary: An immersive gaming experience that begins with the scratch of a record.

name: ReDrawn: The Painted Tower
summary: When art becomes reality...

name: Ren the Summoner and the Erotic Dungeon
summary: Small fry with 0 attack power, “Ren” is a kind hearted summoner girl. However, a friend and summoner of the same village, “Croad’s” lover was killed by a rampant monster in the past, and with vengeance against all monsters, he thinks of a “Monster Eradication Plan”

name: Red Johnson's Chronicles
summary: Get ready to solve a unique puzzle-based investigation that will immerse you in a noir world. Red Johnson, one of the best private investigators in Metropolis City has recently gained a fame that turns out to be deadly. A price on his head and a brother that has been abducted will force him to give the best of himself. To sort out this situation, you will need to use you wit, your persuasion skills and even your fists sometimes.

name: Re:Dreamer
summary:
Zach, a broke college freshman and chronic underachiever who's been coasting through life without a purpose, just found a curious phone game called re:Dreamer. This incredible phone app has world-bending powers, and he accidentally turned himself into a sexy and voluptuous young woman before he even finished the tutorial. Even worse, unless he wins this perverted game, he'll never be able to change back!

With an impish and unreliable in-game A.I. as their only lead on how to change back and the ability to get help from a single friend he's allowed to invite, will Zach be able to win this predatory game without giving up the things that make him a man in the process, or will he lose and remain stuck as a woman?

name: Recall
summary: An enthralling adventure told inside memories. Navigate through the recollections of a quirky cast of characters and mold their destiny.

name: Reality's Reverse Side
summary: It's boring to work if you are the only employee in your department and there is no job and never was. Even if it is the department of investigation of non-typical cases of a successful detective agency. But as soon as work appears, life immediately rises upside down! Forever.

name: Remember, Lights Out
