summary: Can you survive using just your memory? Play this short and sweet game to put your memory to the test! Light is your resource, and it will disappear over time. As you collect orbs, your world will go dark. You'll have to remember the level's design to find the escape.

name: Reflection
summary: Reflection is a VR puzzle game with a traditional Chinese ring to it. Tracing back to the fifth chapter in Dream of the Red Chamber, the game draws inspiration from Jia Baoyu’s visit to The land of Faery, and advances to create a brand-new game using mirrors to solve puzzles.

name: Rettungssimulator Online
summary:
Take over the job of an emergency service dispatcher. Accept emergency calls and dispatch your vehicles! Expand your guard area by building more rescue departments on a real world map and invest in more fire trucks or ambulances. 
Bound together with other players and support each other on their rescue missions. 
Save the world!

name: Reiner Knizia's: The Confrontation
summary: A turn-based strategy game pitting two players of Light and Shadow against each other with asymmetric forces and hidden units.

name: Retro Three Kingdoms
summary: A game of oriental history made by a European War and war and war... Your time is precious.

name: Regular Human Workshop
summary: Regular Human Workshop is a 2D physics simulation sandbox. There are no predefined goals or objectives. Simply throw objects into the world and interact with them in various ways.

name: Reload
summary: ↻ is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame where you explore Umaretsuki's dream world.

name: RealFlight Evolution: 2024 Year Content Pass
summary: The RealFlight 2024 Year Content Pass gets you access to all RealFlight DLC for 2024, the moment it is released.

name: Reds Adventure A Seasons New Beginning
summary: Reds Adventure A Seasons New Beginning is the first game in a trilogy called "Red's Adventure". It is a short and fun little 2D platformer. Red has to collect the chests to break each of the season's curses.

name: ReverseRoom
summary: ReverseRoom is a "play mode" where you move your character, and a "puzzle mode" where you rotate the stage and change the terrain. This is a new type of action puzzle game that uses two modes skillfully to conquer stages.

name: Reach To Neighbor House
summary: Just a mini game about reaching neighbor's house with parkour.

name: Redneck Joe vs The Swamp Zombies
summary: In this exciting third-person shooter, play as brave Joe, a typical Redneck who must fight against hordes of zombies and scary monsters.

name: Red Sector
summary: Twin-stick roguelike that blends intense arcade-shooter-style combat with space dungeon crawling in randomly-generated "sectors."

name: Return to Kurgansk
summary: Return to Kurgansk is an virtual reality adventure game, where you need to survive in an area full of danger and mystery.

name: Realms of Conquest
summary: Realms of Conquest is a turn-based PC Wargame where you collect, build, customize, and command armies playing head-to-head battles online.

name: Recluses
summary: More than 30 orthodox sectarians underground. They locked themselves in man-made caves. You're a negotiator. Your task is to rescue recluses before Apocalypse.

name: RetroSpace
summary: Drive through futuristic maps on distant planets. Enjoy the endless drive on different planets while listening to retro music!

name: Red Bull BC One
summary: Red Bull BC One is a rhythm game developed by Smack Down Productions and published by Playlogic Entertainment and Ignition Entertainment for Nintendo DS in 2008. The game is based on the Red Bull BC One breakdancing competition organized by the energy drink company Red Bull.

name: Retro Snake Adventures
summary: It's a unique twist on the Classic Snake Game. It's kinda like snake, but adventure mode.  Collect keys to get through doors, but watch out for your tail and walls.

name: Real Football 2014
summary: Real Football / Soccer is a series of mobile football/soccer games by Gameloft that has been released annually since 2004.

name: Revival AO
summary: Revival AO is an online RPG based in a medieval fantasy world.

name: RedRaptor
summary: Blast off for a retro arcade experience in RedRaptor, a vertical shoot’em up inspired by genre classics of the ’90s!

name: Restricted Airspace
summary:
Restricted Airspace is a single player shoot em up in the style of Star Fox for the SNES. It takes place in a city made from an amalgamation of the old Ottoman buildings the developer grew up with in Beirut.

Upon the game's initial release, the city was under devastating attack and all players could do was delay the unavoidable before the city inevitably fell. After the 2020 explosion of a port in Beirut, the developer updated the game, removing enemies and turning it into a peaceful flying simulator.

name: Relyctum
summary: A new episode that replaces the first standard Doom II. The levels gradually introduce the player into a dangerous world of death by showing ways of survival and success in it.

name: Rescue 2013: Everyday Heroes
summary:
In this realistic mixture of simulation, RPG and management game you take part in exciting rescue missions as the head of fire department, assemble your force and gradually develop you station.

During complex missions where decisions over life and death are often made, you will get to know what it means to be a true hero of everyday life.

You can recruit personnel with different backgrounds for your rescue crew, e.g. firefighters and paramedics. You can also purchase new vehicles such as variety of fire engines and ambulances and furnish your fire station by buying various props, e.g. office desks, training materials, gym machines etc.

name: Reverse Fantasy Legend
summary: I have a dream that... will take over all kinds of races in the world beauties...

name: Rescue Rover 2
summary: Players must again save Rover from evil robots in this sequel to id Software's Rescue Rover.

name: Reaching for Petals: VR Edition
summary: Remade for VR, Reaching for Petals is a poetic adventure about love, loss, and ambition. You will travel to the peak of the ever-reaching mountain to uncover the true nature of your mysterious and seemingly unguided journey.

name: Resette's Prescription ~Book of memory, Swaying scale~
summary: "Resette's Prescription" is a 2D point-and-click adventure in which you guide Resette, a girl who can enter peoples' hearts, through the story by clicking onscreen, obtaining items, solving puzzles, and activating gadgets.

name: Retroids
summary: In Retroids you can play many nostalgic arcade games.

name: Reflex
summary: A casual puzzle game in which you add components to unknown enemy bases that will reflect, duplicate and split the Reflex missiles. Destroy the enemy power generators, communication systems and weapon platforms across more than 100 levels. Each new world brings with it new technology to utilise.

name: Rendezvous With Rama
summary: An adventure game based on the novel by Arthur C. Clarke.

name: Revenguard
summary: Evil creatures took your dog! They have taken over the kingdom and are threatening all the inhabitants. Can you pass the obstacles, uncover all the secrets and save them?

name: Red Tag Rendezvous
summary: A short and cute dress up game where you pick an outfit to impress your date!

name: Redeemer's Run
summary: Fight. Conquer. Reunite.

name: Recyclomania
summary: Build your own recycling plants and become a recycling master in this incredible Match 3 game!

name: RetroScape
summary: In RetroScape you're a lonesome astronaut in space. Your space station is hit by an asteroid and your goal is to make it to your escape pod and head back to Earth.

name: Remnants
summary: Remnants is a top-down exploration game about descending underground into a mysterious abandoned facility.

name: Return of Touhou Mother
summary: Return of Touhou Mother is a sequel to the indie adventure RPG Touhou Mother. It takes place six months after the events of Touhou Mother and 1 year after the events of EarthBound.

name: Redemption?
summary: Death came unexpectedly.It's time to understand whether I have lived this life correctly.It's time to finish the story of my life and understand what punishment awaits me for my actions, or were they right?

name: Regenisis Arcade
summary: Regenisis Arcade is a VR physics-based arcade shooter in futuristic setting. Waking up from a long period of hibernation, you'll discover a world ruled by different robot factions. Each one will try to use you for their own goals, ranging from protecting you as probably the last human on earth.

name: Rei
summary: A free supernatural high school romance visual novel by sonnet009.

name: Resogun: Heroes
summary: Survival Mode is Resogun turned up to 11 - you only have a single life to last as long as you can. However, a few things have changed to improve the odds in your favour.

name: Reconstruction/Decomposition
summary: A silver spaceship with custom textures. Loosely based on Termination by mrthejoshmon. The second map in the wad is just a small "outro" level.

name: Resonance
summary: Resonance is a musical platform puzzle game originally created during the Global Game Jam in 2010 in the Netherlands, where it won both the audience award and the jury 1st prize.

name: Redaction
summary: Powered by Unreal Engine 4, Redaction is a fast-paced, 4-person FPS squad-based PVE looter shooter set in a post-apocalyptic dystopian setting. Early Access coming in late 2022. Wishlist now to lock in a low low price on launch!

name: Rest to Landia
summary: Resttolandia: A thrilling adventure as you embody a determined streamer aiming for the top. Master precision jumps, dodge obstacles, and climb closer to streaming stardom. Can you reach the summit and join the elite? Jump into action now!

name: Relation Killer
summary: A true, funny, yet sad love story. Solve puzzles, defeat enemies to meet Ale.

name: Return to Planet X
summary: Return to Planet X is a close combat FPS in which you will have to smash tons of alien bugs.

name: Reaper of Immortals
summary: Reaper of Immortals is a 2D pixel-art adventure game that tells the story of a lost reaper who is seeking his true purpose. Fight your way through countless enemies, reap everything that stands in your way, and find out the ultimate truth.

name: Reasoning of Courage Nori Courage Journey
Revenge of the Slimes
summary: Revenge of the Slimes is a Genshin Impact fan game similar to Plants vs Zombies.

name: Reflections Path
summary: Start your journey, visit interesting places, and find out answers to fantastic mysteries. Travel through foothills, forests, mountains and more, in this adventure-filled, turn-based fantasy RPG

name: Realms of Despair
summary: Realms of Despair is the original Smaug MUD - an interactive multiplayer medieval adventure game - and is free to play. We have an active role playing community, an active player-killing (deadly) community, and a very active peaceful community. Players can choose from 13 classes - including one deadly-only class - and 14 races. Character appearances can be customized on creation, and we have a vast collection of equipment that is level, gender, class, race and alignment specific.

name: Retro Basketball Coach 2023
summary:
Coaching has never been so simple – draft and trade players, manage your line-up, and lead your team to a playoff title! With Retro Basketball Coach 2023 you can turn your favorite city into a dynasty over multiple seasons, and any fan young or old can experience the joy of guiding their team to glory!

Complete with stylish retro visuals for every team, simple menus allow you to focus on picking your best five players and keep things fresh by managing your team’s energy levels throughout the fixture list and using your entire roster. If your team isn’t up to the challenge you can trade your way to your own ‘all-star’ team in pursuit of success, or see how much your players improve by spending time out on court!

name: Red Bull Crashed Ice Kinect
summary: Fly down Ice Cross Downhill tracks at incredible speed, carve through turns, pull off crazy stunts and crash your way to victory across 5 authentic downhill tracks. Take the prize and become the Ice Cross Downhill World Champion on the leaderboards, battling it out with other players from all over the world.

name: Revelation
summary: Revelation is a text based first person 2D adventure game. In a world where detectives do not exist, investigate cases with main character Ryude.

name: Rescue Heroes: Hurricane Havoc
summary: A Fisher-Price based educational game.

name: Revenge Request
summary: Revenge Request is a Tactical, FPS, Roguelite set in a modern day world. Pick from multiple different classes with their own unique weapons and abilities. Combine skill and equipment in various ways to experience diverse gameplay.

name: Reload
summary: Kill waves of werewolves with procedural pistols!

name: Red Solstice 2: Survivors - Insurgents
summary: Experience a new story line with new characters and settings. Play as the Governor and take the fight to Elysium at every turn. Build up a resistance force and overthrow them.

name: Rec Center Tycoon
summary:
Rec Center Tycoon draws inspiration from the management classics like Theme Hospital to give you a deep business management game where you build and run a recreation center from the ground up. 
Micromanage employees, finances, customer needs and much more!

name: Relationship Anarchy
summary: Investigate procedurally generated hidden relationships in a casual mystery game. Explore, find clues, deduce, infer, solve the puzzle, and unravel the true meaning.

name: Reforger '88
summary: The campaign is set during the fictional combat between NATO forces and those of the Warsaw pact at the Fulda Gap in 1988.

name: Revenge of the Apes
summary: Planet of the Apes, later released as Revenge of the Apes, is a video game originally developed in 1983 by 20th Century Fox for the Atari 2600. Planned as the Planet of the Apes franchise's first video game, it was still in the prototype phase when Fox shuttered its game division during the video game crash of 1983. It went unreleased and was assumed lost until 2002, when collectors identified a mislabeled cartridge as the missing Planet of the Apes game. It was completed and released as Revenge of the Apes by Retrodesign in 2003.

name: Requiem of Hell
summary: When a master demon from Hell named Dalu raises an army of undead, demons and fiends to ravage the world, an old wizard (Shaman) steps forth to stop Dalu and his forces. In a pitched battle, Shaman uses most of his power to decimate much of the demon army and fools Dalu into fleeing briefly. However, the old man realizes his weakened state won't stand up to another assault once Dalu returns from Hell. Shaman tells the fairy accompanying him (Gigi) to choose and revive a recently killed corpse that can fight against Dalu's minions and eventually gain enough power to defeat Dalu. After the introductory cinema, the player can choose to revive either a male (Troy) or female (Linda) who will take on enemies in different (and increasingly tougher) levels as the game progresses. Each character has a back story that ties them together, but the tragic connection between the two only becomes apparent as the endgame approaches...

name: Rebel Moon
summary: A four-player co-op action game tie-in for the upcoming two-part Netflix movie from Zack Snyder. The game will be exclusive to the Netflix games service and more information will be revealed in 2024.

name: Retro Wave Thunder
summary: Take control of a hyper radical super-powered gunboat, and battle enemy drones through intense naval warfare! With stunning retro graphics, and chaotic enemy AI, this game will keep you on the edge of your seat! Prepare for waves of enemies, and unleash your thunder!

name: Repton Infinity
summary:
Repton Infinity is as much a development tool as it is a game. Its predecessor Repton 3 included a level and graphics editor but Infinity takes it one step further with Reptol, a scripting language that allows the user to alter the behaviour of characters and objects. This means that the user can not only create new Repton levels but also completely new games. Four games are included to demonstrate the tools: 
 
- Repton 3: Take 2 
- Repton 4 
- Robbo 
- Trakker

name: Realm of the hero
summary: Everything in this game like JRPG is random. Choose one in many classes to destroy enemies. You are a hero. Strengthen yourself before fighting very strong bosses. Try to learn skills and equip weapons in the adventure.

name: Renegade
summary: Apple II port of Renegade.

name: Red Triangle Super Collection
summary: Five classic quirky games in one free collection!

name: Really Bad Chess
summary: Chess with totally random pieces.

name: Red Beard
summary: Help Red Beard collect colored stones on each level. Collect all the stones and head to the goal to advance to the next level. Play Red Beard game online on your mobile phone, tablet or computer.

name: Redden: 100denarii
summary: It's nearing closing time at the thrift shop "One Hundred Denarii". The exhausted store owner locks up after the last customer leaves, and yet chatter is heard in this supposedly empty store. Jo, the cutting board was once an arrow, Frying pan Bi, a recycled kunai, and Cal, the knife, with the same iron ore as a bullet. The amazing stories of these everyday tools are about to unfold.

name: Relentless
summary: In this simulation, discover the impact of market finance on real economy. Take the lead of a trading desk and challenge your financial skills and instincts to earn as much money as possible!

name: Reconsider
summary: Reconsider is a cute point-and-click puzzle game.

name: Reunion
summary: An old classmate asks you to help decorate the auditorium for your high school reunion. You want to say no, but a part of you thinks, why not? A trip down memory lane could be nice. It might help you reconnect with people - and things - long forgotten... Play as Tom in this retro-style point-and-click horror game. Explore your old high school. Hang decorations. Learn about the past, think about the future. Uncover the true meaning of... Reunion.

name: Re:Night
summary: Re:Night is a roguelike deck-building & turn-based strategy game. Lead your team, slay monsters, collect loot, and defeat bosses. Utilize elemental power and tactical wisdom to end the loop of nights and bring back the dawn!

name: Recoil
summary: Recoil is a vehicular combat tank-based Microsoft Windows video game. It involves the player piloting an experimental tank known as the "BFT" (Battle Force Tank) through various missions. There is a heavy influence on collecting various weapons for the BFT throughout the game. It was developed by Zipper Interactive, a subsidiary of its parent publisher, Electronic Arts, and uses the same game engine as MechWarrior 3.

name: Return of the Things
summary: Fast paced action adventure game sequel to Halls of the Things.

name: Rescue Bomber
summary: Experience upgraded version of bomberman! Story: The evil Lord of Skull kidnapped all your fellows form the village and you have to rescue them my friend. Using bombs fight freedom for one you love. You are the hope, you are the rescue bomber!

name: Remnants of the Arcane
summary: Play as an Arcanist and use spells to solve puzzles while looking for the way out. Don't let yourself be killed by traps or the things living inside the ruins of the Order of the Arcane.

name: Reese's Snake
summary: Reese's Snake is a playable advertisement based on the game Snake.

name: RetroCube
summary: RetroCube is a unique puzzle action platformer. Swipe to jump from platform to platform while solving simple puzzles and defeating evil geometry in intense retro action! Play at your own pace, or race through the levels to compete for the fastest time.

name: Re:Stage! Prism Step
summary: A Japanese rhythm game released on iOS and Android devices.

name: Realm of the Undead
summary: An arcade adventure, the action in Realm Of The Undead takes place over three stages.

name: Re Parry
summary: Parry this, you filthy casual

name: Real Riders
summary:
The classic is back, stronger than ever! Enjoy the best physics simulation over two wheels and the best graphics.
Real Riders. Completely free without in-app purchases. Beat your friends on the scoreboards.
An indie game that will make you dream with impossible speeds.

name: Reflector Rhythm Master
summary: A hybrid of a block breaker and a music game. A strange and fun mechanic where all of the stages fit on one screen. And the antithesis of the easy-to-see music game.

name: Revenant in the Paradise
summary: The main character, a high school girl, is trapped into a world which is full of monsters when she was travelling to Tokyo. In this game, players will act as her and live throughmountains of fatal crisis and finally grab Freedom and Life.

name: ReThink 3
summary: ReThink 3 is a Puzzle Game in a futuristic setting, that features a variety of Puzzles that utilize Lasers and the behavior of light and it's colors. Use new gameplay mechanics to puzzle your way through the game's beautiful world.

name: Realm Revolutions
summary: Earning coins and resources is more fun than ever with this new idle game inspired by Swarm Simulator and Realm Grinder! Buy buildings and hire people, and be ready for a revolution! Your citizens will be very happy if you deal with their discontent, giving you a production bonus!

name: Revenge of Chickens
summary: Play as a rooster that wants to get revenge from humans and try to rescue chickens!

name: Readback
summary:
Readback is a new challenging game with more than 1000 questions. 
 
The main aim of the game is to read given words backwards and find out the right answer. 
 
It is a challenging and very exciting game, because the answers can be very tricky, simple and difficult. 
 
Did you know that reading words backwards helps to keep your mind active and improve your reading skills? 
 
Enjoy!

name: Retrowave Hexon
summary: RETROWAVE style puzzle, hexagons, complex tasks, great music, lots of levels. There is something to think about.

name: Restricted Footage
summary: “Restricted Footage” is a horror and survival game for up to 4 players. You are entering into an area, where reportedly paranormal stuff is happening. Your purpose here is to take a footage with your action cam and to solve the paranormal case.

name: Resistance Forces
summary: Save the areas seized by creatures. Complete all tasks and take over the area. Investigate the area and report the results.

name: Remember: A Horror Puzzle Game
summary:
You awake in a cold, damp morgue reeking of death and with no recollection of who you are, where you are, or why you're here. As you solve puzzles across an increasingly disturbing world, abundant yet disjointed clues will offer insights into those seemingly simple questions.

Will you Remember?
This horrifying new room escape experience from inDgenious is intended for adult audiences! Immerse yourself in our handcrafted world through our eerily beautiful 3D environments, formidable puzzles, intriguing story, and our expertly-crafted auditory experience! Objectives range from routine hidden object / item finds to interactive puzzles that will challenge you both in mind and manual dexterity.

name: Realms of Cronos
summary: Realms Of Cronos is a community hub for Hexen with 10 levels. The hub is non-linear, but you must complete certain goals and retrieve keys to unlock certain maps. There are extra enemies, decorations, and textures for new themes like an Aztec city, a snowy castle, and a Chinese village.

name: Return to Earth 2130
summary: 让自己沉浸在与数百个敌人的史诗般的太空战斗中。

name: Relaxing Rain Sounds: Amayadori
summary:
Amayadori is an idle game where you watch rain fall in the countryside.

Listening to the rain can help you forget your worries and relax when you'd like to sleep, meditate, focus, or study.

Unlock mini visual novel scenes by spending the points you've earned while idling.

name: Remnants of Dawn
summary: A string of campus killings. A newly-turned vampire struggling to adjust. A monster hunter seeking answers. Worlds collide as Dante Jones and Nick Torres, both in danger of being accused of the crimes, team up to reveal the true culprit in this chilling supernatural horror visual novel.

name: Red Sails
summary: Explore the desert aboard your sailboat, rescue stranded people on your way, bring them home, while looking for other members of your waning clan: the Red Sails.

name: Reky + Cyber Protocol
summary: Feast your eyes on crystal clear visuals of reky. Interact with your environment and find a way to reach the finishing...square. You can also try your puzzle solving skills in Cyber Protocol. An arcade puzzle game set in a Cyberpunk world. Why pick when you can have them both.

name: RetroShooti
summary: RetroShooti is a totally ridiculous shoot 'em up fantasy game. Fight through more than 30 levels on this crazy galactic trip and face the wackiest bosses and foes! Or battle with friends in local Co-op and vs. game modes!

name: Reef Shot
summary: Explore the Pacific as an underwater photographer and discover the mysteries of a sunken ancient city. Unwind in the depths of the ocean and submerge yourself in the atmospheric world and music.

name: Ready Action
summary: I'm keyboard, you're mouse! The actor has to jump over buildings, avoid obstacles, and film without a hitch But the cameraman shouldn't miss the actor Caution) do it with your friend, will fight your friend. do it alone, your left and right hand fight

name: Requiem
summary: We designed this as an experiment to use the concept of a game and a song to communicate something a little different than usual. This is best experienced first on your own with a pair of headphones and no distractions from beginning to end.

name: Red October
summary: Red October: A scientific thriller in the USSR. Physicist Sokolov is drawn into the race for the energy of the future in the closed city of Oktyabrsk-21. Intrigue, espionage, moral choices. The fate of the world is in your hands!

name: Return to Dust
summary: A fast and brutal (yet well balanced) map in beautiful ancient-temple textures.

name: Resplendent
summary: This game is a delightful blend of pixel art and fast-paced gameplay.

name: Regenesis Ultimatum
summary: Regenesis Ultimatum is a short cosmic horror game set in a dead universe where every planet is barren, every sun is burned out. Only one bastion of life remains; threatened by an unfathomable entity of your own creation.

name: Reality Raiders
summary: In the early years of the 31st century, a group of individuals work together to solve minor crimes in the past in hopes of restoring their desolate present. The player must embark on various missions to save the world, but will you be successful?

name: Retne
summary: In Retne you are a tourist traveling through VR Land. There's lots to see and so many things to do, but there's a catch; it's A DIY tour, so you have to do the hard work to visit all the magical attractions that the VR world has to offer.

name: Rebel Inc: Escalation - Dollars & Disasters
summary: Rebel Inc.'s explosive new expansion! Survive an erupting volcano in Devil's Peak, burn through money with The Billionaire, enhance your tactics with new Special Advisors and explore exciting new Official Scenarios.

name: Revizor
summary: "Revizor" is a visual novel, a simulator of an office employee. You can flirt with colleagues at work, go on dates, earn and spend money, do business, meet friends, conduct audits, get sick and heal, listen to the radio with exclusive tracks, make decisions, run errands, and much more!

name: Res Furtiva
summary: Res Furtiva is a roguelike rpg made by a small creator.

name: Refrain no Chika Meikyuu to Majo no Ryodan
summary: A Nippon Ichi dungeon crawler RPG developed exclusively for the PlayStation Vita

name: Ready 2 Rumble Boxing: Round 2
summary: Ready 2 Rumble Boxing: Round 2 is a boxing game for the Dreamcast, Nintendo 64, PlayStation, PlayStation 2, and Game Boy Advance. It is also the sequel to Ready 2 Rumble Boxing.

name: Refuge
summary: The third-person singleplayer rogue-like adventure - REFUGE, with an massive, handcrafted open-world and hardcore challenging action. Choose your fighting way through hordes of monsters. Unlock new loot, and find a way to survive and finish that path.

name: Re:Kinder
summary: Re:Kinder is a freeware horror game by Parun (Horafuki Yokochou) made in RPG Maker VX. It's a remake of Kinder, originally released in 2003 with RPG Maker 2003.

name: Record of Grancrest War: Quartet Conflict
reMovem
summary: Match up colored orbs by tapping groups of 2 or more to remove them from the field to score in this classic iPhone/iPod Touch game.

name: Revenge of the Sunfish
summary: Revenge of the Sunfish is a game made by Jacob Waldemar Buczynski.

name: Revolgear II Ver.D Revision+Ex
summary: Arranged installment of REVOLGEAR II -SECOND BRIGHTNESS-.

name: Resort Hotel: Bay Story
summary:
Help Alice and her new friends restore the old hotel and turn it into a successful resort! Dive into an intriguing story and start transforming the beach to your liking!
Resort Hotel is a fun arcade puzzle game where you'll restore a family mansion by solving the classical levels of three in a row puzzles. Build and design the estate and turn it into a first-class Resort Hotel. Become a hotel tycoon! To implement this plan, solve interesting Match 3 puzzles, get resources, and decorate the interior of the house, tropical island, and garden escapes. Enjoy new Match-3 game mechanics, adorable characters, and an exciting romantic story created in front of your eyes!

name: Red Embrace: Mezzanine
summary: Red Embrace: Mezzanine is a short, free visual novel/point-and-click game set in the vampire-themed Red Embrace universe.

name: Reborn Protocol
summary: Reborn Protocol focuses in after the events of the "Rebirth Program" RB is a reimagining of the mod, "The Hidden" Heavily focusing on the Asymmetric Multiplayer aspects both sides will have to be cunning and sharp to come out on top.

name: Reel Fishing II
summary:
Players can start the game in Free mode and choose from three different fishing spots. The majority of the action is experienced in the Season mode, however, where you are challenged to maintain a fishing career. From the Aqua Lodge menu screen, you will be able to travel between three different rooms: your work desk, the fish tank room, and the stock corner. At your desk, you can read "Fish Find" magazine for more information on how to catch fish, or you can search through your lure and fly organizer (empty at the beginning of the game).

If you catch some fish and decide to keep them, you have the option of placing them in one of the appropriate fish tanks. One is for salt water, one for fresh water and one for running water. Once you start fishing in the Season mode, you're able to choose between two fishing spots. When you catch a certain number of fish, you're allowed to go to more areas and gain levels.

name: Rescue Team: Magnetic Storm
summary: You find your world in danger once again, but this time by unprecedented natural disasters caused by intense solar activity. As you navigate a city in chaos, you'll act as the head of a team of rescuers tasked with helping people in need.

name: Renegade Legion: Interceptor
summary: Renegade Legion: Interceptor is a video game adapted from the board game of the same name. It is a two-player game in which players battle with squadrons of starfighters. One of the game's key features is a ship creation tool that allows players to design and build their own custom ships. The game was met with generally positive reviews. It was praised for its challenge and replayability,

name: Realms of Age
summary: Realms of Age is an online trading card game, which pits you against other players online to battle in the arena.

name: Reincarnated
summary: This was a fanmade project and video based on "Garten of Banban" by the Euphoric Brothers. This project was made purely for practice and fun and is not for profit. Please support the official releases of the Garten of Banban series.

name: Resident Evil Village: VR Mode
summary: Resident Evil Village: VR Mode is a virtual reality adaptation of the original survival horror game. It is available exclusively on PlayStation VR2 and supports the full main campaign. Players experience the game from Ethan Winters’ perspective with enhanced immersion. The mode includes motion controls for combat, exploration, and item interaction.

name: Resident Evil: Director's Cut
summary:
Experience Resident Evil Director’s Cut originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

The iconic Spencer Mansion is the setting for deadly traps, dangerous creatures and horrifying mysteries. Will you make it to the end? Enter the survival horror that started it all.

name: Real Boxing Manny Pacquiao
summary:
At last players can become the legendary fighter and take on the boxing world in Real Boxing Manny Pacquiao!

Manny Pacquiao’s tournaments bring excitement into the ring – show everyone who's the best fighter in weekly tournaments.

name: Retrowave
summary: Neon lights, palm trees, synthwave, 80's supercars speeding down an endless highway... Welcome to the world of Retrowave!

name: Rekindle
summary: Connect is a sokoban-like puzzle game which you need to connect bulbs to both positive and nagetive electrode by pushing conductor boxes.

name: Reign of Fire
summary: Based on the movie, Reign of Fire lets you play as either a human or a dragon in an epic battle. As a human, you'll take the role of a resistance fighter who's trying to defend the last remaining humans from attack. You must make your way to the site of the sole male dragon using a variety of well-equipped vehicles and high-tech weaponry.

name: Return of Egypt
summary: Return of Egypt is a very good Castlevania clone from Driven Phantom Soft, sporting fluid 2D sidescrolling action, plenty of well-drawn enemies, and excellent level design. You star Moses as he returns to Egypt to battle various undeads and even Egyptian gods. Similar to the hero in Castlevania, Moses wields a whip in this game as his default weapon. The castle is very well-designed, full of traps, optional routes, and secret rooms. Similar to most console platformers, you cannot save at any point in the game, but only at "save points" - which are conveniently placed every few rooms apart. One thing I like is the number of "special skills" and magic spells you will acquire as you play through the game, usually after beating each "boss" monster. Examples of these skills are rapid run and magical storm.

name: Reason: Casual Puzzle
summary: Reason - Casual Puzzle is a thinking game in which the objective is to push the boxes to the marked places. The difficulty of the game is in the fact that you can push the boxes, but you can't pull them, not to mention that they can fall into the void of space.

name: Relaxation balls
summary: Soothing game. Created to relieve psychological stress in people of different ages. Helminth Valera, Horse Anton Bober Vasily return!!!

name: ReRoad
summary: 'ReRoad' is a new concept Tower Defense game that makes a road by digging the ground. Considering the towers randomly placed on the stage and the towers to be placed later, We need to make the most of the tower's range and make a strategic path. Destroy the enemies from through your own road!

name: Ready Steady Play
summary: Ready Steady Play is a western-themed arcade game from Cowboy Games.

name: Regiment of Armour
summary: Fast reaction and strategic plans and laying traps are the cornerstone achieving victory in Regiment of Armor. Overcome the odds PvPvE against other players, zombies and soldiers. Start with teams or form them along the way, the rules of war are up to you to decide.

name: RealFlight 9
summary: RealFlight is a flight simulator for radio-controlled airplanes, helicopters, and drones. Fly more than 160 hyper-realistic vehicles in an immense, open world right from your desktop.

name: Retro Force
summary: In Retro Force, you get to play as one of the four members of Retro Force, you can get to choose either Paris, Hawtin, Pi, or Sinclair whatever suits your skill, but they each have their own aerial attributes, with your chosen character, you then have to shoot down your enemies from the sky and from the ground, you'll get to earn points by shooting down the enemies. And also, you get to collect Bonus crystals, the more bonus crystals you collect, the bigger the score, and of course keep an eye on the super crystals, they hide in hard to reach places and in secret hiding places.

name: Re into Another World
summary: "Re into Another World" is an RPG adventure game set in a fantasy world. Players need to accumulate souls by challenging monsters, using these souls to unlock characters in order to defeat the final demon. Character growth and upgrades, equipment combinations, and puzzle-solving included.

name: Real Football 2015
summary: Real Football / Soccer is a series of mobile football/soccer games by Gameloft that has been released annually since 2004.

name: Return of the Skeletal
summary: Return of the Skeletal is a small game about building up a settlement while surviving the monsters that come during the night.

name: ReBullet
summary: This is a local two-player tank battle game where two players control blue and red tanks; Players will use a limited number of bullets to eject and defeat enemies in the scenario!

name: Red Dead Redemption: Undead Nightmare Collection
summary: The Red Dead Redemption: Undead Nightmare Collection will combine the Legends and Killers Pack, Liars and Cheats Pack, and the Undead Nightmare Pack.

name: Reign of Guilds: Raubritter
summary: Continue your journey with this pack unlocking additional exclusive in-game content!

name: ReturnHome
summary: ReturnHome is a puzzle adventure game.You will become the hero to pass through 5 themes, "City of Fire", "North of the Desert","Land of Strife", "Land of Fish and Rice", "City of Wealthy", find out the security of your origins after many obstacles.

name: Reload Map Jam
summary: Map jam run by Slipgate Sightseer in cooperation with Reload Magazine, with the goal of picking 3 entries to write about in an article!​

name: Real Football 2017
summary: Real Football / Soccer is a series of mobile football/soccer games by Gameloft that has been released annually since 2004.

name: Red Haven
summary: Navigate through the Red Haven complex and uncover secrets and survive!

name: Rend
summary: Choose your side in this faction-based survival game, pitting groups of players against each other amid hordes of horrific demons in an ongoing epic war. Explore a mysterious and unforgiving world as you race against the clock to achieve victory before you are wiped from existence!

name: Resurrection: Nuke Island
summary: An alarm raised when CIA found that 8 scientists are missing from international virology conference. CIA started investigation and found that North Korean scientists are also missing and suspected North Koreans. Roman, special ops commando has to evacuate scientists from North Korea.

name: Rebirth of Island
summary: Survive, adapt, and research in the New World, with its rules, dwellers, and their laws. Head the colonization of these locations and ensure the independence and security of your population.

name: Retrobound
summary: "Indie Turn-Based RPG! Nostalgic Memories and Easter Eggs!

name: RetroShip: Hit the space ship
summary:
RetroShip is the 8-bit retro game for iPhones, iPads & iPods.
It is like snake on an old brick phone, it's fundamental.

name: Red Yet Capers: Math vs Mayhem
summary: Red Yet Capers is a mix of mathematics, and fun-filled running, jumping, shooting, and ducking. For ages 8 and up.

name: Reader Rabbit Math Adventures Ages 4-6
summary: Spend a day at the park where math is your ticket to thrilling rides and fun–filled games! Join Reader Rabbit and friends as they hop along from the arcade to the roller coaster, using numbers to solve puzzles and win great prizes. Even pre-readers can play independently!

name: Red Baron II
summary: Red Baron II by Dynamix, Inc is the sequel to Red Baron releases seven years prior.

name: Realm of Night: The Forbidden Knowledge
summary: Being in debt to an influential merchant, a young veteran Alexander agrees to a strange deal: to take an orphan girl to an abandoned forest station and thus redeem the debt. The task turns into a real adventure, because the nights in the Black Earth region are dark and cold.

name: Reproduction Man
summary: Reproduction Man is a 2D puzzler where you help some very simple-minded sperm get to the egg. This cult classic of the Windows shareware era was brought back for its 20th anniversary with all-new graphics, animation and sound. Its outward cuteness belies some very tough puzzles.

name: Return Null: Episode 1
summary: Return Null, a Point & Click Adventure, is set in a distant dystopian society under an oppressive force where you play the role of Jack Drebin; husband and soon to be father whose life is on the verge of chaos. Episode 1 sets up key characters and a plot that escalates into an intense finale.

name: RE:Jump Boy
summary: Jump one by one small steps, take a rainbow bath in the last toilet, and you will enter the next level

name: Recontact London: Cyber Puzzle
summary: Full Motion Video Based Detective Puzzle

name: Remindelight
summary:
Remindelight is an action role-playing game in which the player chooses one of four characters to play as, who have different abilities, weapons and magic styles for the player to use.
These include Surf Flood, who can use fire magic but is mostly focused on sword fighting; Kuurie Le Grasseld, who can use a bow, but is focused on water magic; Tolon, who uses a spear and wind magic; and Enju Fullhorn, who uses an axe and earth magic.
The player navigates the overworld, and uses the touchscreen to break obstacles; they can also touch enemies' sprites to engage in battle, and move to the separate battle mode.

name: Red Cap Zombie Hunter
summary: Human Resistence leader, hires Red Cap as ZOMBIE HUNTER. Red cap will receive information about the areas that are full of zombies and need to be "cleaned" and also about the most strong zombies that are starting to manage their own armies.

name: Red Zone
summary:
Red Zone, known as Hardwired during development and Commando Raid when demonstrated at Summer CES 1994, is a Sega Mega Drive game released in 1994 by Zyrinx.

It is noteworthy for achieving sprite rotations, 3D vectors and full motion video; things that were often considered impossible to do on Mega Drive hardware. No additional hardware (such as an extra chip in Virtua Racing is used. The game proudly announces this technical achievement before the title screen.

Zyrinx were previously responsible for Sub-Terrania, and the two games share similar graphics and logos. The soundtrack was again composed by Jesper Kyd.

name: Rewind Time
summary: Rewind Time is a puzzle game where you can go back in time. All moved objects return to their original location after using that power. Once a chest is placed in the right place, it will no longer be affected by time. You can't rewind time when you are standing on the original location of a chest (so you have to memorize the location of all the chests).

name: Ready 2 Rumble Boxing
summary: Ready 2 Rumble Boxing for Game Boy Color is the handheld adaptation of the 3D console game. It offers a selection of boxers and options of the original game, with simplified controls and 2D graphics.

name: Retro Synthesis
summary: Retro Synthesis is a tech-noir narrative game about being torn apart between obligations and conscience. You are a police detective named Harrison Noels whose wife just passed away but there is no time for grieve. You are forced to take a case that is more complex than you think.

name: Reverse Alice
summary: You went on a trip to England. An unexpected series of events has you wandering into a strange world.

name: Revenge of Anubis: Pyramid Adventure
summary: A key and item finding, platforming, destroy enemies side scrolling adventure!

name: Resident Evil: Revelations - Unveiled Edition
summary: The Japanese console port of the 3DS original.

name: Return of the Ancients
summary: A mod for Subnautica which brings quite a few ancient wonders back to life, with more lurking beyond what little you can see...

name: Renegade Line
summary: Renegade Line is a third person comic shooter featuring different classes with various abilities.

name: Retrograde Arena: Deathmatch Pack
summary: Deathmatch DLC includes an exclusive game mode and maps designed for maximum neon carnage.

name: Revenge of the Boxer: Moscow Criminality
summary: Russian fighting game.

name: Red Fox and the Four Seasons: Design My Forest 2
summary: Are you addicted to design & decorating? You can play with it now to design your dream forest with the most adorable foxes!

name: Retrograde
summary:
Retrograde takes place across various time periods and places in history. Players will have an intense Third Person Shooter experience while delving into the vast worlds Retrograde offers. Primarily focused on a multiplayer design , Retrograde offers full LAN and Online options to the player. Each character has a unique ability as well as a perk that increases stats or loadout of a given type. Various types of guns and grenades allow for further adaption to the players preferences. Maps are based around a variety of time periods and environments some even featuring dynamic weather and night/day cycles.
The single player mode allows you to practice on a map of your choosing against bots designed to boost your skill level.

name: Red Lightning
summary: A retro style, 2D top-down action/adventure game in the vein of NES archetypes. Couch style local co-op or solo.

name: Resfort
summary: Your story was started one autumn night. You and group of friends falls asleep in your tents, dying campfire flicks outside when night descended on forest with scary sounds. When you closed your eyes you heard terrifying loud cry that drove away dreams caused you to check out friends.

name: Rescape
summary: Rescape is a 2D vertical-scrolling action-adventure game. The player controls a child who goes on a journey to see the outside of the underworld. Climbing the seamless world, the player will make friends, get equipment for climbing, fight enemies, and discover the secret of the world.

name: Res Judicata: Vale of Myth
summary: It all started with a drunken bet - kill the Culebre and make a sack of gold. After being swindled out of the prize money, things got heated fast. Now Garbhan, a Scottish Highlander, and Francis, a bard notorious for his inability to sing, reluctantly depart on a journey together...

name: ReThink 5
summary: ReThink 5 is a Puzzle Game in a peaceful futuristic setting, that features a variety of Puzzles that utilize Lasers and the behavior of light and it's colors to create challenging problems to solve.

name: Regretful Ghosts
summary: You play as a ghost whose friend is bored of being dead and asks you to find 3 mages who can complete a ritual that will bring the both of you back to life!

name: Recondo
summary: From the creator of Mud and Blood. Recondo is a hardcore real-time tactics simulation that has you leading a Ranger team behind the enemy lines during the Vietnam war. Plan, missions, equip your team and patrol behind enemy lines in a procedurally generated open world.

name: Relic Adventure
summary: It is said that only the most brave and wise people could pass the exam, and get the treasure in the ancient relic. In the great maze, you should not only find out but also make the correct ways appear. Most challengers fails. could You Pass It?

name: Rektangle
summary:
Rektangle is an upcoming bullet-hell game for PC and Xbox One.

Hand crafted by the Crabs at Smashed Crab Studio, Hull, UK.

name: Red End
summary: A racing game. Under the azure sky, this is a huge racing park, dedicated to your race track.

name: Red Man Follows
summary: Red Man Follows is a short (20min - 30min) game that follows the story of a human of light who heads on the worlds darkest place...

name: Rescue Rina
summary: Rescue Rina is a 2D Top-Down Sci-Fi themed adventure game based on the story of Rina, a young girl, who got kidnapped by the Evil scientists of Magix Group, whose purpose was to channel her emotions into a Heart-shaped crystal to give life to Robots.

name: Regular Show: Fist Punch
summary:
Mordecai and Rigby decided to spend the day at the coffee shop, drinking coffee all day, eating, and having fun. Unfortunately, they cannot enjoy today very much because an evil character, whose nickname is Night Owl, kidnapped their friend.

They cannot stay and watch how this happens, so they decided to become superheroes and save their friend. In the end, we think that each one of us would do anything to help a good friend if we were in their place. So help Mordecai and Rigby to beat the Night Owl crew and rescue your friend.

name: Revolution Under Siege Gold
summary: Revolution Under Siege GOLD is the first complete historical simulation on PC of the Russian Civil War between 1917 and 1923. A wealth of historical events and geopolitical options, real or possible according to the player's choices, will bring a realistic tempo to the maneuver of your forces and those of your opponents. From the Baltic to the shores of the Pacific and through the arid steppes of Central Asia, relive the biggest civil war ever!

name: Rest House III: Chlorophilia
summary: Explore Rest House III intriguing world and step into a dark and wet Chlorophilia. Psychological first person adventure. All the population moved to the capital. You are special correspondent of the famous journal. Disaster! What will happen to the earth in the future? Psychological human dilemmas.

name: Restart Zero
summary: Restart Zero is an action shooter in cyberpunk style. Experience a fast-paced adventure single or local coop multiplayer.

name: Red Sun Raiders
summary:
Red Sun Raiders is a strategy game with elements of trading, levelling, looting, resource management, basic combat and exploration.

Join the last humans aboard the vast colony ship Tarian. Moving through the remains of the galaxy in front of a nameless dying sun destroying everything in its path. Take control of a clone salvage team, visit planets as they enter the suns goldilocks zone and make as much money as you can, by whatever means you can, before the planet is consumed by the sun. Your score for each solar system is the number of credits you can accumulate.

name: Remains
summary: 2 maps using textures from a cancelled megawad.

name: Regina & Mac
summary:
Regina & Mac is a 3D platformer that stands in the tradition of the classics from the late 90s and offers a fair challenge even for genre aficionados.
Join the macaw Regina and the tyrannosaurus Mac on their adventure as they try to escape a lifeless research lab. The only way out? To find the golden Floppy discs on which the memory of the lab's computer system U64 is stored so that it can help the duo to find an exit.

name: Really Boring Website
summary: An online word game similar to Scattergories.

name: Regiments
summary: Regiments is a Real-Time Tactics set in Germany 1989. The Cold War has gone hot, and the inferno is raging. Lead your Regiment through the fires of conflict and the fog of war. Break through the lines, call in artillery, maneuver, feign retreats, stage defenses, counter-attack. Do not relent.

name: Real Football 2013
summary: The 2013 edition of the mobile european football (soccer) simulator.

name: Real Bout Fatal Fury Best Collection
summary: Two Real Bout games in one pack.

name: Red Slash
summary: Slash your way through an endless swarm of wraiths.

name: Restless Nights
summary: The Shadow Stalker is out to get you, but why? Try to fall asleep while fixing anomalies around the house and keeping the fireplace lit in this horror experience as you uncover the truth of why your being haunted. How long can you survive?

name: Red Victory
summary: A tactical wargame from John Tiller's Squad Battles series that takes place on the Eastern Front of World War II during the Soviet push from Stalingrad to Berlin.

name: Red Tractor Tycoon
summary: This is your chance! It's up to you and your trusty tractor to create a flourishing agricultural industry. You take the wheel in this farm simulation and determine how your farm should look. The further you progress, the more options you'll have!

name: Red Aleph
summary: Annihilate waves of enemies & weave through a sea of bullets in Red Aleph!

name: Recoil vs. The World
summary: Use the recoil of your guns to make it to get to the end of these saw blade-filled labyrinths! Turn lasers off, switch guns mid-level, and much more throughout 3 different biomes, each with their own new obstacles and levels to make a fun but rage-inducing experience!

name: Retexo Mori
summary: Retexo Mori is a Pac-Man-like game in first person, with bullet hell elements and an aesthetic that clashes early 90's FPS pixel-art with vaporwave.

name: Retro Ride
summary: Lean back, drift into the golden sunset - and let the rhythm take control.

name: Reverie: A Heroes Tale
summary: A retro RPG adventure. Create your party, conquer dungeons, enter dreams, and choose your allies wisely in your quest to save the world.

name: Reproach
summary: Reproach is a narrative beat 'em up with time-travel and gay cowboys. Help 50’s detective Stout and his new friends, the hard-core band Potus Flotus, to close time rifts across space-time and save his detective partners scattered across time.

name: Retroman
summary: Guide the retro-man round the maze , gathering up the food pills as he goes! Watch out for the retro monsters in the maze, who will kill him if they touch him! But he has a trick up his sleeve , that if he eats one of the special retro pills he has a short burst of power which allows him to eat the monsters as well!

name: Red Wake Carnage
summary: Red Wake Carnage is an intense action shooter that will take you on an epic journey of fighting the world's most horrifying animals!

name: Retro Ball
summary: Enter the world of Retro Ball, a whimsical blend of past nostalgia and futuristic fun!

name: Reptiloids
summary: Reptiloids is a super third-person action game where the main character finds himself in the center of a reptiloids' alien invasion! Anyone can be a reptiloid, and your former colleagues try to kill you. Save your girlfriend and stop the alien invasion!

name: Reborn Tribe
summary: Reborn Tribe is a medieval style simulation INDIE GAME developed by one person. In this game, players build houses and hire staffs to run the farms, pastures, etc. You have to encounter a lot difficulties and find out the reason why your tribe disappeared.

name: RetroMMO
summary: RetroMMO is an online role-playing game in the early stages of development. It pairs the core game mechanics of classics such as Dragon Quest and Final Fantasy with the format of a modern MMO.

name: REM-9: The Yume Nikki Randomizer
summary:
REM-9: The Yume Nikki Randomizer is a randomizer created by vgperson for Kikiyama's Yume Nikki. It is generally recommended for those who have played the original Yume Nikki and know how to get around the dream world.

You can randomize the effects locations or lock nexus door but also you can set the ending to require any number of Effects, as well as any number of Essences (new bonus items given by notable "optional" side events).

name: Recapture the Castle
summary: Recapture the Castle is a third-person shooter game. The invaders have occupied the castle. Now you need to take up arms to destroy the invaders.

name: Reckless Driver
summary: Forget about bustling traffic as you race your way through the streets of Seaview in Reckless Driver!

name: Revenge of the Ninja HD Remaster
summary:
Included in the Taito LD Game Collection.

The player guides Hayate through the "Castle of Evil" avoiding dubious traps and fighting various enemies such as "the fire breathing Marco Killmore, the Wolves of Seidenfeld," and "the Immortal Skeleton Warriors of the Undead."

The gameplay is in the format of an interactive movie where the player has a limited amount of time to hit the right commands from the prompts on screen. The success or failure of completing these quick-time events will determine the set of animation you will receive, which will either depict Hayate delving further into the castle or humorously being squished between a wall of spikes. The player earns a score for how well they can run through each level and time the button presses.

If players were able to master the game and complete the game on hard mode, the publisher Renovation Products, Inc. would supply the player with a "Master of Ninja Arts" degree.

name: Real Puzzles
summary: This is a mind-bending, minimal puzzle game with 100 levels.

name: Recruta Zero
summary: Help Maçonaro find his way to the Hague tribunal. A disastrous government full of chloroquine and Viagra with a climate of famine and genocide. Recruta Zero encourages hatred in the population, leaving the country full of cracks.

name: Revoland
summary: Revoland is an e-sport game based on blockchain technology. Challenge yourselfwith various game modes. Play to earn has never been so easy!

name: Reckless Space Pirates
summary: You have a choice: join a crew of space pirates to steal priceless slime from a nest of mushroom-like aliens--or hoodwink the pirates and team up with the mushroom colony to prevent an interstellar war!

name: Repossessed
summary: VR zombie shooter built for Oculus Quest 3 120HZ. Close quarters akimbo combat with the infected.

name: Reign of Swords
summary: Build up a customized army and take your battles online with friends.

name: Recycle My World
summary: An adventure game where you travel across the country and recycle everything, sell to customers, build renewable energy platforms and save the world. Build up your portfolio and impress the company you want to work for. Choose how to progress in the game with unique results, what will you do?

name: Red Hero Adventure
summary: Red Hero Adventure is an adventure about a red ball in the arcade genre. Go through exciting puzzle levels, playing as the most bouncy hero! You will have to climb narrow ledges with high accuracy, jump over littered islands and dodge sharp spikes.

name: Replicore
summary: Replicore is a co-op shooter set in an ancient sci-fi world. Transform into your Core to roll, dash or throw your team members into the action or pull them out of tight spots to navigate the challenges of the mysterious ruins. Experience the first true Core-operative gameplay!

name: Rex Ronan: Experimental Surgeon
summary: Rex Ronan: Experimental Surgeon is an edutainment game that highlights the effects of smoking on the human body. Each stage, in which a miniaturized Rex Ronan moves through the body of smoke company sales rep Jake Westboro, features numerous facts about tobacco smoke inhalation.

name: Reaction: Block Buster
summary: Reaction is a 3D block breaker game for PC and Mac. It is inspired by Atari's Breakout.

name: Red: The beginning of the Melody
summary: In this mystery game you follow Mika through many puzzles. The storyline has multiple endings for games to unlock, some of which would potentially influence the following creating of the Second Dimension.

name: Reboant - Endless Dawn
summary:
Reboant - Endless Dawn, with its huge worldview under Sci-fi backgrounds, cinematic graphics through all game levels, creative gameplay based on VR hardware features, full arm IK performance generated from advanced technologies, targets to be a pioneer product in VR game industry.
Your thrilling experience is much more convincible and impressive than any words. Come to join us!

name: RedCat: De Spannende Stedentocht
summary: Brutus and Max have kidnapped the queen and will only free he if RedCat can give them 100.000 bones and 100.000 cheese. The place she's being held captive is marked on a special map which Max has ripped to pieces. RedCat has to use his topography skills to look for the pieces in all 12 provinces of The Netherlands.

name: Renegade
summary: Home computer port of Renegade.

name: Rearea
summary: Come explore this ever-changing and mysterious area, fight alongside your companions on the same screen, explore, collect, and build And discover new gameplay!

name: Rendezvous: Shadows of the Past
summary: He can't escape the memories that haunt him, and soon Setyo realizes he must return to Neo-Surabaya to save what's left of his family. Experience the upheaval of Setyo's mundane life in Bay City in this action-adventure prologue to Rendezvous.

name: Red Square
summary:
"A Yume Nikki Fan Game for the Nintendo Virtual Boy, with programming by Kresna and graphics by Nyrator. A submission created in six weeks for the 2019 Dream Diary Jam.

Play as Nina and explore her dreams, collecting various effects along the way. The ending will become available once Nina has collected all four effects.

This game is written entirely in NEC V810 assembly and is made to be compatible with actual Virtual Boy hardware. Hardware compatibility has been tested by a third party.

The game doesn't feature any sound, as there was not enough time to write an assembly sound driver during the Jam. There is also no saving in the game itself."

name: Resonance
summary: Deep dive into space and explore the story of Robert and Catriona. You will discover the catastrophic events that happened on the station and get to know mysterious Resonances while being confronted with a tragic past.

name: Restaurant Solitaire: Delicious Lunch
summary: Cook a delicious lunch and enjoy it! 200 levels with a romantic lunch theme!

name: Read, Write, & Type
summary: A game for kids following "Lefty" and "Righty" as they attempt to get back the letters than Victor the Virus stole. The game teaches kids how to read and type.

name: Relic Keepers
summary: Relic Keepers is an action game set in a fantasy setting. Helped by the village guards, keep the artefact inside the village walls and outlast a legion of evil creatures.

name: Red Titans
summary: Red Titans is a single player vertical shoot em up, use the resources available to stop the threat, you will have to be very skillful since there are no continues.

name: Red Bull MotoCross 2D
summary: Gorgeous graphics and effects, realistic physical models, all this awaits you in Red Bull Freestyle Motocross. Gather together all the power, skill, courage and talent to organize a real show for your friends. Discover new motorbikes and tricks. Improve your accomplishments. Red Bull Motocross game features: Six different game modes Four tracks (Mexico, Egypt, Moscow, Rome) and X-Fighters tour Four motorcycle, each one with its own behavior 12 different tricks, 8 of them must be unlocked Game keeps track of more than 20 different statistic data Full realistic effects Replays of your best races.

name: Reconciliation
summary: Psychological horror where you play as a young high schooler seeking reconciliation with an old friend. Unfortunately it won't be so easy, a perilous journey awaits you before you'll be able to reunite as friends once again.

name: Real Car Racing
summary: Race fast sports cars and with your friends in the best racing simulator!

name: Retro Drift
summary: "Retro Drift" is a small arcade drift game that can be played with one hand. The game advocates fast-paced play, a 10-second start, and a ten-minute game. It is suitable for a game anytime, anywhere.

name: Remember Valentine
summary: Celebrate the holiday with Remember Valentine, a festive card-matching memory game perfect for all ages! Flip cards to reveal delightful Valentine-themed icons like hearts, candies, and Cupid himself, while testing your memory across increasing levels of fun and challenge. With cheerful visuals, cozy music, and endless holiday spirit, it’s the perfect way to make your gaming season merry and bright!

name: Reincarnations: Awakening
summary: Reincarnations: Awakening is a hidden object game for the PC.

name: Rekuiemu Nikki
summary:
Find me, otherwise you will lose yourself.

Rekuiemu Nikki is a Yume Nikki fangame, about exploring mind of young Julie, who locked herself at home due to adverse circumstances.

It took quite a long time, and Julie even forgot about the incident, but in one of her many dreams she discovered a strange creature. Now she is forced to find out the truth, but what it will lead to depends on the player.

name: Red Desert Render
summary: Discover the secrets hidden in a vast desert, take a hot bath, and maybe grow a pumpkin.

name: Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny - Ogredeath
summary: Your quests through the legendary saga of the Northland continue in "Ogredeath" the latest DLC for Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny. Search for a missing member of Aventuria's elite messenger team. Join a band of huntsmen as you brave the legendary beasts of Torkil's Chasm and navigate the exacting currents of the Great Bodir River.

name: Rewinder
summary: Rewind time to dodge projectiles

name: Restricted-RPS: All Aboard the Icarus
summary: Restricted-RPS is an online multiplayer swindle'emup for 6+ players. Each player is given a set of Rock Paper Scissors cards and Star betting chips with which to play matches, trade, buy information and buy other players. As the cards dwindle down, two at a time, from being used in matches, who has what becomes critical information. Players each try to figure out who to face, who to avoid, who to work with or betray so they can hoard the most Stars.

name: Red Embrace: Hollywood
summary: Los Angeles, California, 1996. A young newcomer is turned into a vampire and thrust into the dark underbelly of society, forced to sink or swim. You are that newcomer.

name: Relaxing Drift
summary: Immerse yourself in the world of car adventures, where you will feel the real adrenaline, getting behind the wheel of powerful cars. Take part in exciting races, improve your driving skills and master the art of drifting.

name: Retro Golden Age: Goody
summary: Goody, the original spectrum action, platform and puzzle game from the eighties, puts you in the shoes of an expert bank robber in an updated version for Steam with improvements such as saving, filters and screen settings and achievements with the best Spanish hits.

name: Reality Layer Zero
summary: Let us begin the persuasion. Alas, mankind may forever live in absence of the truth. Verily, the resonant threads that extend across the many worlds spawn countless interpretations. Can insight be gleaned from the coalescing dimensions? It may yet all be for nothing. The meaning is up to you.

name: Retro Ninja Runner
summary: An 8-bit inspired infinite runner game.

name: Reclusive
summary: Robert Livingston sails to a remote northern island to spend the last days of his life on it and encounters unexplained phenomena and creatures.

name: Real War
summary: The Real War franchise was a series of real-time tactics video games developed by Rival Interactive and published by Simon & Schuster Interactive.

name: Re: Be
summary: Re:Be is a story-based action RPG 2D platformer game. In Re:Be, you become the protagonist and embark on a lengthy adventure to find the people who suddenly disappeared in an increasingly contaminated Earth.

name: Reveal! Multiplayer Edition
summary: Reveal Multiplayer Edition is a turn based picture guessing game where you can play against friends or random opponents. It's fast, fun and super simple - just scratch the image and guess the answer! The less you reveal, the more points you earn!

name: Real Football 2018
summary: Real Football / Soccer is a series of mobile football/soccer games by Gameloft that has been released annually since 2004.

name: Remnants of a Beautiful Day
summary: A unique artistic First Person Narrative experience!

name: Return to Castle Wolfenstein: Tides of War
summary: Return to Castle Wolfenstein: Tides of War is an updated re-release for the Xbox based on the original PC version Return to Castle Wolfenstein. Next to the full, original singleplayer campaign, there are 7 new prologue levels that show how B.J. and Agent One first met and how they got captured and imprisoned at Wolfenstein Castle. There is also a secret bonus awarded at the end of every level when every secret area has been found.

name: Reborn: Fate of Gods
summary: Reborn is a first person psychological horror game. You have to survive from gods awakening and need to find out how to get more strength while you are surrounded with enemies.

name: Refugees: Shelter
summary: Players will take on the role of an ordinary citizen living under the shadow of war. With no end in sight and resources becoming scarce, you must venture out daily to find supplies. While scavenging, you must always be on guard against threats from criminals and deserters...

name: Ressifice
summary: A dark 2D sidescroller hack & slash B-movie style game. Solve short puzzles, beat up anything that's getting in your way to stop the Ressifice.

name: Return to Grisly Manor
summary:
Return to Grisly Manor is a game in which you have to save your house as greedy developers want to build a new superstore next to your grandpa's newly renovated Grisly Manor. However, being the scatterbrained inventor you know and love, the last place Grandpa remembers seeing the deed was in the old manor - back in 1999!
Explore the new house, help Grandpa repair his time machine, and travel back to the original Grisly Manor - before all of its secrets and memories are swept away forever!

name: Redriver 2
summary: Redriver 2 is an unofficial PC port of the Driver 2, an open world car chase game. The game was known for pushing the limits of the PlayStation 1, resulting in performance and draw distance issues. These have been resolved in this port, along with fixes for long-standing bugs and other quality of life improvements.

name: Revasion
summary: Revasion is a minimalistic action arcade game with an energetic soundtrack. A challenging colorful bullet hell survival experience. A hybrid gameplay experience inspired by bullet hell and breakout classics.

name: Reikai Nikki
summary: Reikai Nikki is a Yume Nikki fangame where you explore and collect effects in Otsuki's dreams. Unlike most Yume Nikki fangames, it contains dialogues.

name: Remember Me
summary: Remember Me is a galgame with a male first-person perspective. Players will play a high school student Lin Yining, and three girls launched their own story. It's up to you to choose between the hidden past and the future to reveal.

name: Reader Rabbit's Preschool
summary: An educational game featuring Reader Rabbit.

name: Revenge of Black Bone
summary: Welcome to the seductive and perilous world of "Revenge of Black Bone," the eagerly awaited sequel to the smash hit game "Curse of Black Bone." Set sail once more for the sun-kissed shores of Port Royal, where treasures gleam, mysteries whisper, and beautiful women captivate.

name: Retro League Racing
summary: A League of over 20,000 spacecraft customisations are waiting for You! Race across alien planets over the galaxy, dive into valleys and between mountains; collect crystals to fine tune your vehicle; and do it all again!

name: Red Ops Arcade
summary: Red Ops Arcade is a survival and fighting game that takes place across different worlds. The player has to fight zombies, monsters, ghosts and many other enemies, using different weapons that he will find in mystery boxes. The player must reach the highest round possible, but be careful because as higher is the level, more difficult will be to finish it.

name: Read Only Memories: Neurodiver - Collector's Edition
summary: Each copy of the game includes: physical copy of the game on Nintendo Switch/PlayStation 5, art book, NEURODIVER plush, double-sided acrylic charm featuring ES88, prismatic sticker sheet, instruction manual, soundtrack download card, collector’s edition box.

name: Recoiled
summary: Join a friend in this free-to-play online multiplayer PvP game with insane 2D physics. Select from several unique game modes, such as Free-for-all, Racing mode, and Target mode. Note: both players must have a Steam account to play.

name: Restart Your Life Adventures of Tylenol
summary: Embark on your adventures in the fantastical land of Tenot. The mystical power of tarot will guide you to eradicate evil and darkness after your reincarnation. To be a great warrior, to increase your strength, to explore the unknown, to give you infinite joy. A Rougelike turn-based FTB game.

name: Red Ring of Immortality
summary: Get to the red ring of immortality!

name: Realms of Survival
summary: Realms of Survival is a Single Player / Online Multiplayer Action RPG, with a Multi-Class Character System, giving players a great variety of playstyles and customization. Fight against monsters, bosses, or other players in various open-world maps and battle scenarios.

name: Regular Fit
summary: Regular Fit is a 2D platformer. As a tramp, you embark on a dangerous and mysterious journey through a dense forest full of amazing creatures and unseemly obstacles. Your main goal in this game is to survive in this cruel world.

name: ReMix: Encore
summary: a unique musical rhythm action game that combines the elements of Rogue games. In this world, you are able to choose from a variety of heroes with different fighting styles and use the power of music to battle against evil void monsters.

name: Red Sword
summary: You can defeat many enemies by powering up your skills and swords!

name: Real World RC
summary: Racing game where you need to control real RC cars located all over the world. When you start the game you are able to see video from the car and you can control it to drive around the tracks.

name: Real Driving Simulator 23
summary: Do you love cars? Real Driving Simulator is the best driving simulator that features more than 100 vehicles and a huge open-world map to explore. A big selection of vehicles is waiting for you: sedans, supercars, off roaders, SUVs and more, with realistic engine sounds and accurate interiors! Drive across Europe, complete many challenges like track racing, drag racing, consumption challenge, high speed driving, no damage challenge and many more! Compete with your friends in the Online Multiplayer mode!

name: Reveal the Deep
summary: Reveal The Deep is a short exploration game set in the wreck of a 19th century steamship. Navigate through expansive levels, uncovering the stories of the ship's demise and it's passengers. Keep your nerve, your wits about you, and prepare to reveal the secrets of the deep.

name: Red and Blue: Cycles of Existence
summary: This is a tragic tale in which you will follow Salieka who is madly in love with Taralise, since the day she saved her life.

name: Reiterland: Meine Rennpferde
summary: Reiterland: Meine Rennpferde is a horse racing game. Select your horse and equipment for the race and beat the time or complete missions. Control the horse with the keyboard in three difficulty levels. Compete against up to 7 other players via the internet on different tracks in all four seasons.

name: Realm of the Titans
summary: Realm of the Titans is a Moba (multiplayer online battle arena) video game developed by Ningbo Shengguang Tianyi. The game is partially inspired by the Warcraft 3 custom map, Defense of the Ancients.

name: Return to the Roots
summary:
Return to the Roots is an open source fan remake of The Settlers II.

With a completely rewritten game engine 'RttR' aims to support modern hardware and operating systems and extend the original The Settlers II with features such as a multiplayer mode via internet.

You will need an original "The Settlers 2 Gold Edition" version to play as Return To The Roots uses the original sounds and graphics.

name: Revoltin' Youth
summary: The evil Big-Wig has covered the characters town in crummy marketing gibberish. It's up to you to control three rebellious characters through 50+ levels of headache inducing puzzles in Revoltin' Youth, a puzzle/platformer game featuring a unique pixel-art style and a robust soundtrack.

name: Red Bit Ninja
summary:
Red Bit Ninja is an old school platformer with a rope climbing physic and difficulty of the good old times.
It features classic pixel art, hair pulling levels and five mean bosses.

name: Redtape
summary: An indie adventure game in which players must get a document signed by Satan.

name: Rescue Frenzy
summary: Guide courageous rescue workers as they save towns from Mother Nature's destruction in Rescue Frenzy, a fantastic new endeavor from the makers of Farm Frenzy. Mother Nature is full of surprises and when she unleashes a series of devastating storms, catastrophic earthquakes and disastrous wildfires, your emergency rescue team must race in to save the day.

name: Rex! Your Interactive Pet Dinosaur
summary:
Dinosaurs aren't extinct. They can live, play and grow on your computer.

Nuture and care for Rex as you guide him through complete life-stages of infancy, adolescence and adulthood.

Teach Rex to play fetch, color cave paintings, sing, dance and more.

Explore 6 unique environments with Rex incuding caves, forests, deserts and more.

Watch as Rex grows and develops a unique personaility. Your interaction with Rex influences how he will behave and respond.

Own up to 5 different dinosaur pets - each with their own unique personality.

name: Requiem: Memento Mori
summary: Requiem is a MMORPG set in a post-apocalyptic universe. It uses Havok physics for some special effects.

name: Realm of the Undead
summary: A classic, round-based, co-op zombie survival game where you survive endless rounds of zombies with friends or solo.

name: Rescue Dash: Time Management Simulator
summary: Rescue Dash is a fascinating city rescue time management game. You'll save pets, restore a hotel, renovate a diner, and keep the city safe! Move through the story and help everyone on this adventure!

name: Redacted Life
summary:
Adrian has just moved into an old mansion with his girlfriend, Rebecca. After another couple hurriedly leave the mansion, a spooky backstory about the house is revealed, and some seemingly unexplainable events occur, Adrian comes to a conclusion...

He realises that he is in a horror game. A badly-written horror game.

And he wants to leave...

name: Reefland
summary: Reefland - is a colorful city-building simulator with a relaxing atmosphere, where you are up to paint the island by placing buildings.

name: Return.
summary: Return. is a a short platformer with atmospheric pixel art.

name: Ready Set Golf
summary: Ready Set Golf is an indie physics-based golf simulator that covers ALL aspects of the real sport. Drive your golf cart to your ball and use your rangefinder to gain information. From there it's up to you to choose the right club and execute the perfect swing. Play with 4 people online!

name: Realm of Simplicity
summary: Realm of Simplicity is a indie-developed MMORPG that will have you embark on your own adventure. Complete quests, master your skills, party-up and conquer dungeons all at your own pace!

name: Reborn to Veer
